**! [ Kasei Valles Maps of Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/kasei-valles-maps-of-mars.jpg?w=519&h=584 ) **  
    
**    **  
    
**2014              “  ”      ( Mars Climate Mission -2 )          !           ( 90 – 3870 )          .           485    ( 2009   )     .         “  ”   ( Maven – Mars Atmosphere & Volatile Environment Probe )    . 1998   327         -1  ( Mars Climate Orbiter -1 )    ,    (       )         !**  
    
**! [ fig-1b-maven-spacecraft-instruments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1b-maven-spacecraft-instruments.jpg?w=504&h=1013 ) **  
    
**           .      .                 ,              !        ,          .                   !                .        ( Solar Charged Particles )             .            ( Solar Wind )         !**  
    
**! [ fig-1c-climate-orbiter-equipment ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1c-climate-orbiter-equipment.jpg?w=503&h=719 ) **  
    
**    ?**  
    
**2013            .     ,  ,         . **  
    
**1\.      “   ”   ( Volatiles )      .     , ,  ,     ( Planetary Habitability )    .**  
    
**2\.        ( Upper Atmosphere )   ,    ( Ionosphere ) ,          ( Interactions with Solar Wind )   .**  
    
**3\.     ( Ions )     ( Neutrals )     . 4.           ( Ratio of Stable Isotopes )  .**  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/mars-atmospheric-gases.jpg?w=501&h=537 ) **  
    
**    **  
    
**         ( Thruster Boosters )           .      90   (   )  3870   (   )        .  (    ,    ) .      80        .            .      ( Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter & Mars Odyssey Spacecraft )     !          “   ”   ( Geochemistry )    .       “  ”     ·   ( Land Rovers : Spirit & Opportunity, Later Phoenix Lander )       .**  
    
**! [ Flood waters on Mars -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/flood-waters-on-mars-1.jpg?w=451&h=532 ) **  
    
**  “     ”   ( Mars Science Laboratory MSL )             !                 .         “ -  ”   ( ExoMars Rover )     .**  
    
**   **  
    
**             .      ,   ,    ( Ionosphere )   .**  
    
**     :**  
    
**1\.  ( Particles & Field Package PAF )  – ,   .**  
    
**2\.  ( Solar Wind Electron Analyser SWEA )  –      .**  
    
**! [ Kasei Valles of Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/kasei-valles-of-mars.jpg?w=451&h=532 ) **  
    
**3\.  ( Solar Wind Ion Analyser SWIA )  –  ,   ,  ,  .**  
    
**4\.  ( Suprathermal & Thermal Ion Composition STATIC )  –        .**  
    
**5\.  ( Solar Energetic Particle SEP )  –             .**  
    
**6\.  ( Lagmuir Probe & Waves LPW )  –    .     ,      .  ( Solar EUV Input to Atmosphere ) **  
    
**7\.  ( Magetometer MAG )  –    &     .**  
    
**8\.  ( Remote Sensing Package RS )  –    .**  
    
**9\.  ( Imaging Ultraviolet Spectrometer IUVS )  –  &     .**  
    
**10\.  ( Natural Gas & Ion Mass Spectrometer NGIMS )  – ,         .  ( Measures the Composition & Isotopes of Thermal Neutrals & Ions ) .**  
    
**! [ fig-1g-climate-orbiter-details ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1g-climate-orbiter-details.jpg?w=639&h=609 ) **  
    
**     !**  
    
**          .               .      .  18     :**  
    
**. . .   .     ( Humidity )  .**  
    
**. . .    : -80    ( -112 F ) **  
    
**. . .      : -30    ( -22 F ) **  
    
**. . .    8.55 .  (    100  1  ) **  
    
**. . .   : 13 mph  ( 20 km/h )    .**  
    
**! [ fig-2-mars-earth-atmospheres ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-2-mars-earth-atmospheres.jpg?w=657&h=531 ) **  
    
**       !**  
    
**         !                ! 1960           50%    ( 50% Failure Rate )   .   15     5     !                 !1999     “    ”   ( Mars Climate Orbiter )   /        ( Spaceship Navigational Error due to British-Metric Units Mix up )       !      “    ”   ( Mars Polar Lander )        !      “  2001  ”   ( Mars Surveyor 2001 Lander )        !      ·            ,   2001     .          “ · ”   ( Phoenix )     !**  
  
  
    
** (  ) ! [ Mars Exploration ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/mars-exploration.jpg?w=500&h=784 ) **

**   !**  
    
**,   !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   !**

! [ Pyramid 10 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/03/pyramid-10.jpg?w=584&h=476 )   
    
**        .**  
  
             .      "  "   [ Papyrus Plant ]   ,  "     "   [ An ingenious System of Waterworks ] , 4500    "   "   [ Ceremonial Boat ]   ,              2017  24      .  
  
! [ 3,800-year-old relief carving in Egypt depicts over 100 boats. Credit: Josef Wegner. ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.ancient-origins.net/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/carving-in-Egypt-depicts-.jpg )   
    
**_3,800-year-old relief carving in Egypt depicts over 100 boats. Credit: Josef Wegner._**  
  
   [ Pyramids of Giza ]      ,      [  2.3  ]    ,     ,        .  
    
**     ?**  
  
       [ Tura ]      [ Limestone ]      .        [ Granite ]  533       .    ,            .      2014     .              .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.ancient-origins.net/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/An-Ancient-Egyptian-Boat.jpg )   
    
**_An Ancient Egyptian Boat. Credit:_ _Canadian Museum of History_**  
    
**           **.  
  
    [ Wadi el-Jarf ]     ,     [ Papyrus Plant ]    ,         [ Waterway ]      [ Ceremonial Boat ]  .     170,000             .  
  
       ? .            [ Mark Lehner ]   .       .  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
! [ The Osirion at Abydos showing sophisticated stone construction. Photo by Hugh Newman. ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.ancient-origins.net/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/Osirion-at-Abydos.jpg )   
    
**_The Osirion at Abydos showing sophisticated stone construction._**  
    
**_Photo by Hugh Newman._**  
    
**  
  
Remnants of an Ancient System of Canals  
    
**  
    
**If this account is accurate, where are the canals that Merer speaks of? Until recently, there was little evidence of such a system of waterworks that could have been used to transport the giant blocks. However, archaeologist Mark Lehner has now revealed the discovery of a lost waterway beneath the Giza plateau.  “ We ’ ve outlined the central canal basin which we think was the primary delivery area to the foot of the Giza Plateau, ”  he told Mail Online**  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
4500         ,          [ Pharaoh Kufu ]         [ Supervisor Merer ]   .         .  
  
         .          .       .  
  
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
! [ Various depictions of giants in Egyptian art collected by Muhammad Abdo. Source: Muhammad Abdo. ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.ancient-origins.net/sites/default/files/field/image/Giants-of-Ancient-Egypt-II.jpg )   
    
**  
  
 **Transport Vessels Found**  
    
**  
    
**Seven boat pits have been found in the area around Khufu ’ s pyramid, two on the south side, two on the east side, two in between the queens ’  pyramids and one located beside the mortuary temple and causeway. In addition, archaeologists have found ceremonial boats, which reveal in detail how the ships were constructed, and detailed relief carvings of hundreds of transport vessels.**  
    
**  
  
The Diary of a Pyramid Builder  
    
**  
    
**The 4,500-year-old papyrus found at Wadi el-Jarf offers a significant insight into the construction of the pyramids. Written by Merer, an overseer in charge of a large team of elite workers, the ancient logbook from the 27 th year of the reign of the pharaoh Khufu, described in detail the construction of the Great Pyramid.**  
    
** “ The hieroglyphic letters … detailed over the course of several months the construction operations for the Great Pyramid, which was nearing completion, and the work at the limestone quarries at Tura on the opposite bank of the Nile River, ”  reportsHistory.com.  “ Merer ’ s logbook, written in a two-column daily timetable, reports on the daily lives of the construction workers and notes that the limestone blocks exhumed at Tura, which were used to cover the pyramid ’ s exterior, were transported by boat along the Nile River and a system of canals to the construction site, a journey that took between two and three days. ” **  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
! [ The Great Pyramid of Giza. Credit: BigStockPhoto ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.ancient-origins.net/sites/default/files/styles/large/public/The-Great-Pyramid-of-Giza.jpg )   
  
5000   , , ,        ,  ,  ,  ,      .    , ,  ,             ,      .   ,  ,     , , , , ,   .     ,    !      ,      ,  !  , , , , , ,     !      ,      .  
  
! [ Upper Cover ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/03/upper-cover.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   ,     .   ,        !      .     ,   ,  , , ,  .    ,   [  ]                 .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052aa.jpg )   
  
   ,    ,     ,     , , , , ,         .   ,     [ Khufu Pyramid ] .          480  , 750   , 2,300,000      !   ,   ,          !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052ab.jpg )   
    
**   **  
  
2500       ,   [ Herodotus ]    ‘     ‘   [ The Gift of Nile ]     .        ,   4160         ,    .          .      ,        ,       .         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052ac.jpg )   
  
  2700            [ Khufu Pyramid ]   100,000      .      [ Egyptologists ]   ,     20,000     .    2,300,000           [ Pharaoh ]    .        15   .    20   !    ,    [ Archaeologists: Mark Lehner & Zahi Hawass ]    20,000-30,000        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052ad.jpg )   
  
  
  
5000           .           .           5000       !                !                 !  ‘    ‘       ,     .

! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052ae.jpg )   
    
**     ?**  
  
    ‘    ‘   [ Step Pyramid ]  ..2750     [ Saqqara ]       [ King Zoser ]   .         ,       [ Dahrhur ]    . 150        !  !  ,  !    [ King Khufu ]     ‘    ‘   [ The Great Pyramid ]     .    .    !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052b.jpg )   
  
         .           .       ,      .       .           !       .          .  
  
! [ Pyramid 11 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/03/pyramid-11.jpg?w=514&h=785 )   
  
          !            ,       !         !       ,       .              .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2005/09/sc0902052d.jpg )   
  
        .    ,  ,       . ,        ,       .   ,   ,      .

! [  ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7f/Terremoto_de_Puebla_de_2017_-_Ciudad_de_M%C3%A9xico_-_11.jpg/1280px-Terremoto_de_Puebla_de_2017_-_Ciudad_de_M%C3%A9xico_-_11.jpg )   
    
**2017 Central Mexico earthquake in México City.webm**  
  
  https://youtu.be/Z8JF2PthRkg  
    
**https://youtu.be/kG3H5mQ5kwc**  
    
**https://youtu.be/AlrVYd6RPdw**  
    
**https://www.msn.com/en-ca/news/other/dogs-used-in-quake-search-in-mexico-city/vp-AAsmEfJ**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/80/Ciudad_de_M%C3%A9xico_-_Terremoto_Puebla_2017_3.jpg/1920px-Ciudad_de_M%C3%A9xico_-_Terremoto_Puebla_2017_3.jpg )   
  
2017        ,  ,     ,    .   7   8.1 M       . 100  .   ,     .      [  19  ]  400    [ 650 .. ]  7.1 M     342  . 6000  .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-3-pan-american-plates.jpg?w=646&h=1026 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/2017_Central_Mexico_earthquake_aftershocks_-_SSN.svg/618px-2017_Central_Mexico_earthquake_aftershocks_-_SSN.svg.png )   
  
1985       10,000  .           . 2017  19    2       .  
  
   [ Ring of Fire ]    , , , ,        ,  ,     .            [ Tectonic Plates ]     .  
  
! [ Earthquake 5 km ENE of Raboso, Mexico, 2017.jpg ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/ee/Earthquake_5_km_ENE_of_Raboso%2C_Mexico%2C_2017.jpg )   
  
! [ Image result for North American and Pacific Tectonic Plates ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/6fac9-mexico_tectonic_plates.png )   
  
 ,  ,  ,  ,               .    ,   ,       40   !  
  
    [ Soft Soil with Sand ]       .       .       [  28  ]   333    .  5400   .  38    .

**2014   **

    !    
,    !    
     !

! [ Location of Warning ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/location-of-warning.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
       “  ”   [ Mazca Tectonic Plate ]     3    .          “  ”   [ Aftershocks ]     .     ,        [ Beforeshocks ]    .  
    
**   [     ] **  
  
 “       .        .     .  (  8.8    )     1.26    .     2.7    (  8 . )   ( 3  )   . ”   
    
**   ( Richard Gross, Geophysicist NASA Jet Propulsion Lab, California ) **  
  
 “   2004   9.1           6.8       2.3    ( milliarc-sec )   ( 7 . )   ( 2.5″ )   . ”   
    
**  **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-1b-pan-american-plates2.jpg?w=584 )   
  
! [ Ring of Earthquake Fire ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/ring-of-earthquake-fire.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
    
**   ,    !**  
  
2014    8.2     , 7   [ 2  ]    ,   ,     [  [ Lquique ]   900,000     .  24     7.6     [ Aftershocks ]  14     ! 8.2    12.5    .    : 200,000.    .  2600    . 40,000    .        .  
  
         ,    .      6.2  ,    5.1     . 2010    8.8    700  .        : 30      !          .  
  
  
  
! [ Panama Canal on the Fault Line ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/panama-canal-on-the-fault-line.jpg?w=584 )   
  
      7.6     [ Beforeshocks ] ,  24   6.1    [ Aftershocks ]    .     14  , 12      . 1960    9.5    1655   !  
  
     [ , ,    ]      “   ”   [ Ring of Fire ]  .   90%    [  : 81 ]           [ United States Geological Survey ]   !        7000       [ Nazca Tectonic Fault Plate ]  .  
  
          !            . 2010  27     ,      ,         .

**! [ Earthquake damage -3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/earthquake-damage-3.jpg?w=584 )     
    
**  
  
 “              !    ,       ,     !    [ Crusts ]       [ Liquid Core ]      !   ,    [ Continental Drift & Plate Tectonics ]      [ Fossil Records ]      ” .  
    
**  ,    [ Dr. Alfred Wegener  ( 1880-1930 )  ] **  
    
**     !**  
  
   27   8.8                   ( Computer Simulation )   .  “       .        .     .  (  8.8    )     1.26 -  .     2.7    ( milliarc-sec )   (  8 . )   ( 3  )   . ”       ,   .  
  
  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-1a-recent-earthquakes.jpg?w=584 ) **  
  
       .            .     .  “      , ”                ( Andreas Rietbrock )  .       ( Concepcion )         ( Santa Maria )   2   ( 6  )    .              .  
    
**     ?**  
  
        ( David Kerridge )    ‘    ’   ( Ice Skater Effect )   .                  .               .  
  
! [ Earthquake damage -4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/earthquake-damage-4.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “     (   )          , ”    .           .    .  “   2004   9.1           6.8       2.3     ( 7 . )   ( 2.5″ )   . ”      .          !                .  
  
! [ History of Chile Earthquakes ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/history-of-chile-earthquakes.jpg?w=566&h=1608 )   
    
**       ?**  
  
   8.8   ,              .             ?      ‘    ’   ( Plate Tectonics Interactions ) .         .        ‘   ’   .  ( The Shift of the Earth ’ s Axis is called  “ Precession ”  ) .     24   .         25800  .           ‘   ’   ( Change in Torque )  .       ( Angular Velocity )  .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-2-comparison-of-two-major-earthquakes.jpg?w=584 )   
  
          .          .            .        ( Tectonic Plates )     .        .  
  
      ,     ( Nazca Plate & South American Plate )      7 .     .          .          ( Spring Wire )   .                 ,  ,   !  
  
! [ Locaton of Chile Earthquake ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/locaton-of-chile-earthquake.jpg?w=596&h=1090 )   
    
**    ?**  
  
     :  
  
1\.    :          ,    .     .  
  
2\.    :   8.8   .  (  27, 2010 )   
  
3\.    :      .  
  
4\.    :  ,      .  
  
5\.       ( Angular Velocity Changes ) .  
  
      , ,        .           .  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++  
    
**     **  
  
   2005  8             7.6     140           !        54,000   16   ,  79,000  [  20, 2005 ]      .        2     ,     !    2000    . 2005         20    ,        ! 2004               230,000   !      . 1991           140,000    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-5-poseidon-satellite.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
        !        !             !   ·       !          !  ,        !  ·      ,    !        ,      !    ,        ,         !  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-1c-precession-of-earth-axis.jpg?w=584 )   
  
      1.6   [ 40   ]    !     ,    [ Crust ]    !      .      ,        !    “   ”   [ Plate Subduction ]   .         [ Compressive Motion ]     [ Slip ]         [ Thrust Faults ]  .      : 2004      , ·  ,      .  
  
  
    
**   **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-5-worlds-earthquakes.jpg?w=665&h=1303 )   
    
**   **  
  
2010             .        ,        .     ( Qinghai )   14  6.9   ,  5    7.2   ,  13   7.0   ,  17   8.8      .     1973  7    13    !            !       !              !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/04/fig-7-chile-earthquake-2010.jpg?w=584 )   
  
                   !        ( 20 -30 sec )    .     !          !                     !              21           !

** **  
    
**  !**  
    
**  **  
    
** **  
    
**  **  
    
** **  
    
**   !**  
  
+++++++++++++++  
    
**    [ Led Zeppelin Lyrics  ( 1929 )  ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/what-we-can-do.jpg?w=605&h=681 )   
  
! [ hurricale-buildup-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricale-buildup-1.jpg?w=584&h=467 )   
    
**      .**  
  
        ,   ,  ,         .   ,      ,   ,        .    ,     [ Heat Content ]  .             [ Moisture Density ]  .         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/sear-water-temperature-heat-content.jpg?w=584&h=773 )   
  
 ,   ,  ,       ,          . 19    , 21           .       , ,     .          .           ,      .        :1.  2.  3.    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/fig-5-co2-temperature.jpg?w=606&h=1005 )   
  
   ,      90%     .        250   [ 250   ]     .       .   &   ,    . 2005      , 2012      , 2017  ,      .

**       ?**  
  
2017     , ,         .    ,      .   :         &  8   [ 25  ]     [  30 . ]   !  
  
   ,        [ Moisture Density ]       7% .         .

**    .**  
  
        ,      ,       .       ?      ,  ,      .  , ,   , 21  , ,         .            ?  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding.jpg?w=584&h=370 )   
  
! [ seawater-surging ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/seawater-surging.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
  
2004        ,      , 2017          !  ,      ? 1851  2012      . 2016       ,  ,     ! 2016       “  ”      [ , ,   ]      .    [ Category : 5 ]       ,  .  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
 ‘           .      [ The City Levee System ]         ,    ,   ,          .  ‘   
    
**    [ Ivor Van Heerden, Marine Scientist, Louisiana State University ] **  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-4.jpg?w=584&h=437 )   
  
 ‘    [ Lake Pontchartrain ]           .   , ,  ,    ,  , ,    .  ‘   
    
**   [ Walter Baumy, Manager, Army Corps of Engineers  ( Aug 31, 2005 )  ] **  
  
 ‘          .         .  ‘   
    
**   [ Louisiana Governor  ( Aug 31, 2005 )  ] **  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-1.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
    
**    **  
  
2300      ,         [ The Great Wall of China ]  1500    .                [ Levees ]  340   [ 560 . ]   ,           .      ,         .        [ Lake Pontchartrain ] ,     [ Lake Borgne ] ,     ,       !  ,      ,                .  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-2.jpg?w=584&h=388 )   
  
     1965  : 3-4  [ Category: 3-4 ]      [ Hurricane Betsy ]             .    ,      [ St. Charles, St. Bernard, Plaquemines Parishes ]    23    .   :  ( 4-5 )                     ,    .    ,   ,     .    : 3   ,              !       ,         !  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-3.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
    
**    **  
  
    , 2005  30         ,  80%    ,   .    150       ,  200      !     100  ,      500          20     .        ,  ,  , ,     !  
  
! [ hurricane-matthew-mapping ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-matthew-mapping.jpg?w=584&h=329 )   
    
**  **  
  
2003             [ Federal Fund ]    .     ,  ,       . 2004          20%     .  
  
1\. 2004          20%  [ 750   ]       .  
  
2\. 2005    20    ,  ,  3.9    .  
  
3\.    ,     .      ,  5      .  
  
! [ sheltered-people ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/sheltered-people.jpg?w=584&h=417 )   
    
**   **  
  
        .    CH-53    1360          .    !         .   !          22    ,             .         .      ,    .            ,       24  80    .  
  
! [ katrina-flooding ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/katrina-flooding.jpg?w=584&h=398 )   
    
**  **  
  
       6   .    20  ,      .     [ 907  . ]   ,      .         , , ,  ,         ,      .    [ 2.5 . ]           .      90 ..  
  
! [ new-orleans-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-1.jpg?w=584&h=767 )   
  
      1718            .          , ,      . 1965              ,      .  :  ( 4-5 )          .      ,        .      ,      .  
  
! [ new-orleans-city-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-city-1.jpg?w=584&h=417 )   
    
**    **  
  
    480,000    .           1.3     .   (   7, 2005 )    10,000      .  80%           60%     ,   ,     45,000      .              .  
  
! [ new-orleans-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-3.jpg?w=584&h=365 )   
  
         , 400,000  ,  ,       .   ,    ,     , , , , ,     ( 50-60 )        .   10    [ Army Corps of Engineers ]       [ Southeast Louisiana Urban Flood Control Unit  ( SELA )  ]   430    ,  ,  ,        .     ,     [ Infrastructure ]          .

## 022   [ Asteroid ]        .

! [ Image result for asteroid florence has two moons ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/0f9eb-minerva-asteroid.jpg?w=648&h=491 )   
    
**   **  
    
**    **  
  
2017           [ Goldstone Deep Space Communications Complex ]  , 70   [ 235  ]        [ Asteroid Florence : 3122 ]     .        .    4.5 ..  [ 2.8  ]     .   16,400         .       .  100 - 300   [ 300 - 1000  ]      .        .      8  ,     27     .        2.4     .      ,   .

    
  !    
      
      
  !    
      
     
  !    
      
  

  !

! [ nasa-probe-instruments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-probe-instruments.jpg?w=584&h=378 )   
  
    [ Bennu ]       4.5        .             .  
    
**   [      ] **  
  
       [ Asteroid ]      .  ,  ,   ,            .     ,     .  
    
**    [   ,    ] **  
  
! [ nasa-rocket-launching ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-rocket-launching.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**        .**  
  
2016  9              . 800         “  ”   [ ASTEROID BENNU ]     ‘ - ’   [ OSIRIS-REx ]          .     500,000        .    . ,      ,    .   ,      .  
  
! [ nasas-target-asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasas-target-asteroid.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    2018  .     , 2020        .     300   [ 10  ]      .    ,      .   ,   ,  .    4% , 0.5%  .        .  
  
! [ asteroid-bennu ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/asteroid-bennu.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   “   ”   [ Orbital Nudges ]      [ Yarkovsky Effect ]   .            .             .   2010        [ JAXA ]    “  ”     ,    ,    . 2014    -2   “  ”   [ RYUGU ]  ,    “  ”   [ MASCOT ]     2020   .  
  
! [ nasa-selection-of-asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-selection-of-asteroid.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
+++++++++++++  
    
**    **  
  
 “     ( Asteroid Belt )                   .         .          . ”   
    
**   ( NASA Administrator )     
**  
  
 “ 2025            .     “  ”    ( Dawn Space Probe )     . ”   
    
**  **  
  
  
  
! [ Fig 8 Japan Space Probe to Asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/fig-8-japan-space-probe-to-asteroid.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “                .            . ”   
    
**  ,    ( University of California, LA ) **  
  
 “        ( Metal Core )         .             .  
  
     .   20      . ”   
    
**  ,    ( UCLA ) **  
  
 “ ,           .        ( Inner Planets )     .     ( Outer Planets )    . ”   
    
**  ,    ( UCLA ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/asteroid-belt.jpg?w=512&h=417 )   
  
  
    
**      ** **.**  
  
     ,         “  ”   [ Asteroid Ceres ]     [ 2012  ]   . 2011  15              .           , 2012            .  
  
2007  7       2008  ,           2011  15         .     ,     .    93    [ 150 .. ]     .    [ One Astronomical Unit  ( 1 AU )  ]    .                ,   .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1-space-probe-dawn.jpg?w=530&h=639 )   
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/dawn-2012-may.jpg?w=795&h=729 )   
  
      ,        :    [ Ion Propulsion System ] .     16,300 .   7.3 ..   [ 2012  ]     166    [ 267  .. ]    .     37    [ 59  .. ]     .  
    
**      .**  
  
 2007               , 2011  17        ( Asteroid Belt )           ( Asteroid Vesta )    .                  .                     .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/dawn-orbital-path.jpg?w=810&h=509 )   
  
  
  
    530 ..  ( 300  )    .      .                    ( Asteroid Ceres )  2015   . 2015             3    .  
  
2007  27           -2   . 10 .           2011    , 2015       2015        3   ( 5  . )       .       475  .          ‘    ’   ( Flyby Gravity Force )        .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/asteroids-ceres-vesta.jpg?w=530&h=572 )   
  
   1807    ,         ,    326   ( 525 . ) .             .   117    ( 188  .. )          !            ,        ( Solar Electric Ion Engine )   .   6200        .       120   ( 200 . )        9      
  
                . ,       . , , , ,            .!        ,         .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/cover-image-6.jpg?w=400&h=397 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-3-dawn-launch.jpg?w=509&h=738 )   
  
      .        .    580   ( 930 . ) .           ( Dwarf Planet )     .   40 – 80   ( 60 – 120 . )           ( Sweet Water Storage )      .  
    
**     ?**  
  
  9   ,     5   .      10 .      ( Solar Electric Ion Engine )   .            ( Push by Impulse )   .       ( Xenon Ions )    .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1b-dawns-objective.jpg?w=520&h=765 )   
  
                .  
    
**    :**  
  
1\. ,   ,  ,  ,  .  
  
2\.   , ,  ,  .  
  
3\.  ,  .  
  
4\.         .  
  
  , ,     . 2011      120       .  ,  ,   ,  ,    .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/ion-engine-principle.jpg?w=530&h=1071 )   
  
  
    
** (  ) **

## 023             .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/life-in-mars.jpg?w=584&h=717 )   
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
    
**https://youtu.be/WH8kHncLZwM**  
    
**https://youtu.be/SoXzxmVdrE0**  
    
**https://youtu.be/MDb3UZPoTpc**  
    
**https://youtu.be/og67Xe5quEY**  
    
**http://www.cnbc.com/2015/09/28/ter-nasa.html**  
    
**http://www.msn.com/en-us/video/news/analysis-finding-water-on-mars/vi-AAeUdaw**  
    
**http://www.cbsnews.com/videos/mars-findings-what-to-expect/**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/creation-of-life-genes.jpg?w=584&h=438 )   
    
**   **  
  
     [ RNA ]     [ Borates ]    .     [ Boron ]            .         .   ,    .     ,        [ Organics ]   ,     .  
    
**   [ Postdoctoral Research Leader, Los Alamos National Laboratory ] **  
  
   "   "   [ Gale Crater ]    ,          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/evidence-for-life.jpg?w=584&h=1175 )   
  
3.8           [ Borates ]  .        .       ,     ,  ,       .  
    
**   [ Postdoctoral Research Leader, Los Alamos National Laboratory ] **  
  
         .        [ Ground Water ]  .    :     [ ChemCam ]   [ chemistry & Camera ] . 2020           [ SuperCam ]  &  [ SHERLOC ]          .  
  
! [ Solar Storms on Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/solar-storms-on-mars.jpg?w=611&h=791 )   
  
        .        ,    .      ,         ,           .  
    
**   [   ,     ] **  
  
      ,        .     .           [ Spectral Detection ]     .  
    
**   [ Lujendra Ojha, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, USA ] **  
  
! [ Mars brine water flow ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/mars-brine-water-flow.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    ,         .           .                .  
    
**   [     ] **  
  
       [ Hydrated Salts ]         [ Recurring Slope Lineae ]  .        [ Dark Streaks are sources of Hydration ]   .  
    
**   [ Lujendra Ojha, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, USA ] **  
  
! [ Martian glacier ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/martian-glacier.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**       **  
  
2015  28       [ MAVEN Spacecraft ]               [ Recurring Slope Lineae ]   .         .        ,   .      ,         ,             .  
  
! [ Ancient Water Flows hint life in Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/ancient-water-flows-hint-life-in-mars.jpg?w=584 )   
  
       100   [ 300  ]          .    .     [ Planetary Scientists ]      [ Hale Crater Slopes ]     [ Hydrated Salts ]   .         .     ,    [ Pyroxene Mineral ] .      [ Magnesium Percholate or A Mixture of Magnesium & Sodium Percholates ] .       .      .         10 F  [ - 23 C ]      ,    .   [  2015 ]              .            .

! [ Mars dust cover ice ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/mars-dust-cover-ice.jpg?w=499&h=812 )   
  
  
  
 “               ” .  
    
**   [ German Astronomer Johannes Kepler ] **  
  
    [ Mars Glacier ]      150  . ..  .       1.1   [ 3  ]     .          .  
    
**   [    ] **  
  
! [ MARS GLACIERS ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/mars-glaciers.jpg?w=584 )   
  
          ,    .   [ Glacier ]     .     ,    ,     .      [ Earth ’ s Glaciers ]    ,      .  
    
**   [   ,   ,   .**  
  
  
  
! [ Mars Ice cover ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/mars-ice-cover.jpg?w=497&h=599 )   
    
**      **  
  
2015  9    “  ”   [ Nature ]                  [ Climatologist & Glacier Expert  ]     :       [ Mars Buried Glaciers ]    .       ,    [ 1.1  ]    !        [ Glacier Belts ]      [ Frozen Water ]         [ Not Frozen CO2 ]   .    ,  ,            .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808071ac.jpg )   
  
 “        .        ;   :       , , ,  !           !            . ”   
  
 “               .       . ”   
    
** ,   ,   .**  
  
! [ MAVEN Spacecraft ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/maven-spacecraft.jpg?w=584&h=471 )   
  
 “              .    ,   !       !     !     .  
    
** ,  ,   .  [  2, 2008 ]     
**    
 “      :          .          ,    ..         .        . ”   
    
**    [ Dr. Tom Pike ]    ,  [ Imperial College, London, UK ]     
**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808071ad.jpg )   
  
 “      [ Sand Dunes ]      .        .       ,     .      50%       [ Topgraphical Evidence ]  .        !         . ”   
    
** ,      [ Mary Bourke  ( Sep 2005 )  ] **  
  
! [ Water Flow on Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/water-flow-on-mars.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**21      **  
  
                       !             .    100%    !           ,   !           2      (  30   )    !                !  
  
! [ Clipboard02 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/clipboard02.jpg?w=584 )   
  
           ,        ( Complex Organic Molecules )       .          ( Odyssey Spacecraft )          .                 .  
    
**     ( Toxic Molecule )  **  
  
          [ Microscopy, Electrochemistry, Coductivity, Analyzer  ( Meca )  ]      .  5             ( Perchlorate )    .          .          .          ( Atacama Desert, Chille )    .  
  
! [ Martian water ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/martian-water.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    ,  .      ( Oxydising Ion ) .    ,     .      .     .      .      .          ( Used in Rocket Fuel )  .  
  
         .       .      .         ( Metabolism )     !  “       , ”        ( Richard Quinn )  .  
  
! [ Clues for water in Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/clues-for-water-in-mars.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**       !    
**    
2008   30    420       ·       !  “         ”     !   12    ( 12 Retro Thrusters )            .            !               .        ( Robotic Arm )      .            !   ,       [ -300 C  ( -220 F )  ]           .  
  
  
  
! [ Flood waters on Mars -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/flood-waters-on-mars-1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
             6 ..  ( ~2.5  )      .            .        ,      21    .                 !               .         !  “    ”        “     ”   .           [ High Resolution Imaging Science Experiment  ( HiRISE Imager of Mars Orbiter )  ]      .  
  
  
  
! [ Fig 1A South Polar Ice Depth ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/fig-1a-south-polar-ice-depth.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
       .      ,       ,      .  ,         [ Polar Layered Deposits ]    ,     [ Polar Cap ]     .        90%    .     ,      .  
  
            .  “       .           .   ,   [ Crust & Upper Mantle ]        .           !  
  
! [ Fig 7 North Polar Ice Cap ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/fig-7-north-polar-ice-cap.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
       !       , -9  .   625    ,   185       ! -9       [ Infrared Radiometer ] ,     [ Equator ]    17 C  ,  -120 C    .              [ Dry Ice ] ,    .  
  
     [ Space Probe Instruments ]      ,       [ Frozen Water ]    .        [ Water Vapour ]      ,     ,   [ Dry Ice or Frozen Carbon dioxide ]    .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808071g.jpg )   
  
 (  )
