## 031             
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/moon-rocky-ice.jpg?w=453&h=618 )   
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++  
    
**http://www.cbsnews.com/videos/scientists-say-theres-water-underneath-the-moons-crusty-surface/**  
    
**http://www.onenewspage.com/video/20170724/8525368/Interior-Of-The-Moon-May-Contain-Water.htm**  
    
**https://astrogeology.usgs.gov/geology/moon-pyroclastic-volcanism-project**  
    
**+++++++++++++++**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/water-rich-rocks-i-moon.jpg?w=584&h=387 )   
  
       
      
      
 !    
     
     
   !    
      
     
     
   !    
     
      
   !    
     
    
     
     
  !    
      
   !    
, ,     
,     
 !    
      
     
      
  !    
    !    
      
     
       
     
   !  
  
  
  
+++++++++++++++++  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/fig-6-india-nasa-find-icy-water-on-the-moon.jpg?w=569&h=1255 )   
  
! [ Image result for water rich rocks on Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/2e0e8-h2omoonpool.png )   
  
  
  
      .    ?  -15 & -17           .      [ Lunar Pyroclastics ]  ,     .  
    
**   [     ,   ] **  
  
      .     .   .      .          .  
    
**   [     ,   ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/water-on-the-moon-1.jpg?w=544&h=1072 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://www.sciencedaily.com/images/2017/07/170724114125_1_540x360.jpg )   
    
**Evidence from ancient volcanic deposits suggests that lunar magma contained substantial amounts of water, bolstering the idea that the moon 's interior is water-rich.**  
    
**_Credit: Olga Prilipko Huber_**  
  
  
  
     ,        .   , ,       .           !  
    
**  :     **  
  
        .         [ Pyroclastic Deposits ]     .                 !        .  
    
**  :     **  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/water-on-the-moon-2.jpg?w=584&h=392 )  [ Click to Enlarge ]   
    
**     **  
  
          [ Shackleton Crater in South Pole ]         [ Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter  ( LRO )  ] ,    -1   .               .  
  
         .    .   12   [ 20 .. ]   , 3   [ 4.4 .. ]   .       .          600        .         /     2200       [ NASA Space Shuttle ]   .             .   ,           .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1-water-on-the-moom.jpg?w=553&h=857 )   
  
 “           !         .         .           .  
    
**   ( ESA Chandrayaan -1 Project Scientist ) **  
  
 “      .    ,    ,          . ”   
    
**   (    ,    ) **  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1a-huge-quantity-of-water.jpg?w=584 )     
**  
  
 “                 ?      2       .           .     ( -200  C ) .          ,  ,   . ”   
    
**    .**  
  
 “    ( LCROSS Spacecraft )            . ”   
    
**   ( Greg Delory Senior Fellow Space Sciences Lab & Center ) **  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1b-tons-of-water-found-on-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )     
**  
  
 “     ( Remote Sensing )      (   )   .            .     ( Bi-Static Experiment )    .          . ”   
    
**   ( Srewart Nozette NASA Mini-RF Principal Investigator, LRO ) **  
  
 “  , ,          .   .      .       -3   . ”   
    
**  ,     ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies )   (  26, 2008 ) **  
    
**    
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/fig-1f-sara-measurements-of-hydrogen.jpg?w=547&h=857 )     
**  
    
**     **  
  
2010  22       ( Journal of Science )                 ( Cabeus Crater )        .              .    (  9, 2009 )      ( LCROSS – Lunar Crater Observation & Sensing Satellite )                .   ,   ,     ,  , , , , , , ,     .   ,     5.6%    . 2009      200     .   ( 2010  )       341      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1c-chandrayaan-1-mapping.jpg?w=584 )   
  
                ,       .        ( , , , , ,  )     . 1960 -1970             50,000  .    ,      ! , -3      .    2020             . 1960 -1970         ,        !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1e-more-water-on-the-moon1.jpg?w=584 )     
2009      -1      “  ”    ( SARA -Sub-keV Atom Reflecting Analyzer )          .  
    
**      ?**  
  
         .    “   ”   ( Sponge )  .    “  ”    “   ”   ( Dust Grains Called Regolith )    .         ( Electrically Charged Particles )  .       ( Dust & Voila )      .            ( HO )     ( H2O )  .  
  
 -1            .    ,       .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1f-nasa-impact-splashes-water-on-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  , ,   .       ,     .  -1         ( , , ,  )  .          600         .  
  
         ,      “   ”       .         :  “             ,       ( Less Volatile Elements )      ( Strongly Depleted )    ? ”   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-1g-sara-instruments.jpg?w=584 )   
  
        – 387 F  ( -233 C ) .           .         !           21       !  
    
**      **  
  
2009  13        ( Shadow Craters )            ( LCROSS Spaceship – Lunar Crater Observation & Sensing Satellite )       .           ( Known Near-Infrared Light Signature of Water )             .    ( Infrared Spectrometer )               ( Composition of Materials )  .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/fig-water-found-on-the-moon.jpg?w=530&h=907 )   
  
    
         ( LCROSS Ultraviolet Spectrometer )            ( Energy Signature of OH Ions )       .         24   ( 7.6  )    .             “  - ”   ( Shadow Crater Cabeus -A ) . 25   ( 40 . )         .             .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-2-water-hydrogen-on-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   ,      **  
  
2009  20                  .       -1,     ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter -LRO )                   !             “  ”      ( Lunar Crater Erlanger in the Polar Region )   !       ,         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-3-search-for-lunar-water.jpg?w=584 )   
  
     ‘    ’   ( Bi-Static Experiment ) .        “     ”   ( Miniature Radio Frequency Instrument: Mini-RF )        .                !         ‘   ’    .              .             !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-4-south-pole-water-map.jpg?w=584 ) **    **  
  
             !          .      :             !                 !                 !     ,     .                 .           !              !

## 032     
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/cover-image.jpg?w=400&h=575 )   
    
** **    
** [    ] **    
**  : . , **  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++++  
    
**    ,**    
**     !**    
**    **    
** ,  .**  
    
**   [    ] **  
    
**  !      
 ,    ….    
       
       
   . **  
    
**   [    ] **  
  
+++++++++++++++++++  
    
** :**         52  37 ,      .  400     ,    .    , , ,  , , , , , , ,   , ,   .    , ,  ,       .       ,   ,   .   .   .   .    ,  .     [  23, 1564 ]     [  23, 1616 ]      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/othello-image-10.jpg?w=584&h=390 )   
    
** & **  
    
**   :**  
  
    400     ,     ,    .  ,     .      ,   ,     .    ,   ,    .      ,     .  ,   ,   ,    ,    .    "  "   [ Moore ]      .        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/othello-image-9.jpg?w=584&h=399 )   
    
**, , **  
  
     1565        [ Hecatommithi ]    .       [ Giraldi Cinthio ] .   ,    .  
  
20        ,  ,    [ 1600  ]           . 1940          [ American and the Son of a Slave ]          ,   !   ,     21      ,        !  
  
+++++++++++++++++++

** -1  -1  : 1**

**  :  [    ] **  
    
** :      [  ] ** ** [ 45  ] **  
    
** :   .    [ 25  ] **  
    
** :     [ 30  ] **  
    
** :   .  [ 30  ] **  
    
** :   **  
    
** :  .   [ 60  ] **  
    
** : .**  
    
** :  ,  .**  
    
** :  .**  
    
** :   .**  
    
** :   .**  
    
**   ,  ,  .**  
    
**    &  **

** & **  
  
  
    
** : 1  : 1  : 1**  
  
  
    
** :    .**  
    
** :   .**  
  
 :            .     .  
  
 :  !    ?     ?  
  
 :    !   .        !     !      !       !  
  
:   ?     ?  
  
! [ Image result for Othello movie images Lawrence Fishburne and irene jacob ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/static.tatler.ru/resize_cache_imm/iblock/b2c/ff92/660x827_Quality100_b2c0164af9af8c9fadea943ff898f827.jpg )   
    
****  
  
 :            .   .     !         !   !   !  
  
 :  ?      ?   !     ?  
  
 :  !        "  "   !  !   ,      !   ,   .      ?  ,   .    .      .  
  
 :      ?  
  
:   .  !  !  !     !       !   "  "    !    !     .  
  
:  ?       ?     ?  ,         ! ,  !     !        !         !  
  
 :   .     !   !     ?    !  !  .    !          !    !    !   !     !    ! ,    !      !              !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/villain-bruno.jpg?w=400&h=285 )   
    
** **  
  
 :    !   !  !      !  
  
 :      !          !  
  
 :  [    ,      ]    !  !   !     !  !  
  
 :  [     ]    !       !  !    !     !    ?      !  
  
 [     ,   ,   ]

**  :  [    ] **  
    
** :      [  ] ** ** [ 45  ] **  
    
** :   .    [ 25  ] **  
    
** :     [ 30  ] **  
    
** :   .  [ 30  ] **  
    
** :   **  
    
** :  .   [ 60  ] **  
    
** :  .**  
    
** :   .**  
    
** :   .**  
    
**   ,  ,  .**  
    
**    &  **  
  
++++++++++++++++++  
  
 :     
  
 :    
  
  :  , ,   
  
 :    ?   ?  (   )        ?    .  
  
 :    !     !   ,    !  
  
 :   ,   !     .  
  
 :    ?  
  
 :    .    !         !  
  
 :  .     .   !  
  
 :    ?    ?   ?    ?  
  
 :    ?        .    !  
  
 :  !          ?    ,   !      !   ?        ?  
  
 :  !  !  !  .         !      ?  
  
 :        .  .   !       .    !  
  
 :   !         .      ?      ?  ,        ?  
  
 :  !    !  
  
 :  ,     ,        !        !  
  
 :    !  
  
 :    !     !        !   !  
  
 :       !     !  
  
 :  !  !    ,       !   ,    [ Gondolier ]  !       !       !      ,    !     ,     , ,  !     ,      ?  
  
 :  [  ]      !     !    .     .     !   !  
  
 [     ]   
  
 :  [   ]       !     !       .     . .       !        .             .       !          !     ,   .      .   .  
  
 [   ]   
  
 [         ]   
  
 :  [  ]     !     .       .  !     ? ,  ,    ?     ?       ?     !    ?   .    .  !      ?     ?  
  
 : ,      .    .  
  
 :   !    ?    !    !    !  !  !     !  ,  , ,      !   !  !         ?     ?  
  
 :   !  .  
  
 :   .    ,       .   ?        ?  
  
 :   !    .         !  
  
 [       ]   
  
 [  ]

**MOLLER M100 SKYCAR  [ VERTICAL TAKE-OFF & LANDING ] **  
    
** ,   **.  
  
  ,      ,     !   .           [ Mary Missy Cummings, Duke University ]   .     ,     [ Drone + Robotic car ]  .      [ Transportation Network ]   ,        ,      .         ,   .     ,   ,      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/flying-cars-3.jpg?w=584&h=443 )   
    
**20      **  
  
  1. 1940     :  .  ,     .  ;    .  
  2. 1956 -1958            [ Volante Tri -Athodyne ]  3/8  ,  .       .   [ Three Ducted Fans with their Own Motor ] .    .    [ Drone ]      .     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/flying-cars-1.jpg?w=584&h=328 )   
  
  1. 1956       "   "   [ Flying Jeeps ]   [ Ducted Fan Based Aircrafts ]   .     ,     .   .           .  
  2. 1980       [ Fred Barker ]      [ Sky Commuter VTOL Aircraft ]   [    14   -  ]   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/flying-cars-6.jpg?w=584&h=359 )   
  
  1. 1942     .  
  2. 2006      [ American Urban Aeronautics X -Hawk ]         [ VTOL Turbojet ]  .     .  
  3. 2013  7           [ Terrafugia announced its Model TF -X, a Plug-in Hybrid Tilt Rotor Vehicle ] .        .   500   [ 800 .. ]   .    . TF -X    8  12  .   2021 - 2025       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/flying-cars-4.jpg?w=584&h=452 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/aviatorflight.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/future-car-2-copy.jpg )   
    
**      [ French SkyRider Xplorair PX200 ] **  
  
      2017      .    [ Drone Flying ]      .    , ,     [ Vertical Take-of and Landing  ( VTOL )  ]  . ,     : 10  .   /    .

! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/moller-m400-skycar-2.jpg?w=612&h=989 )   
    
**MOLLER M400 SKYCAR 180 HP  [ VERTICAL TAKE-OFF & LANDING ] **  
  
   40   100    ,   , M400  2010   .  2016    .  
  
   [ Prototype Flying Car ]        .   21.5 .   : 8 .  : 7.5    : 2400 . 8    : 530 cc.  : 180 HP.   : 330 mph.   : 300 mph.   : 800 ,   : 6  .   36,000 .   : 4800 ft/min.  
  
2017     M400   :  3  .  , , ,              .

 “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”   
    
**   ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab ) **  
  
 “      .  !  (    )     !     .    . ”   
    
**     ( Swiss Pilot Andre Borschberg ) **  
  
 “     .      .    . ”   
    
**   ( Flight Director & Former Space Shuttle Astronaut ) **  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Frpz6g-Nlr4T9wHeFpfWCiP8YbqMCNJPWhuvAJR92OWhj9VMShy5zIU7xr_zrDkKELhiJTm1RdfAFHBR1obyFAYnjZ2_LVP5CcISm5IC9zwb3R89jvd9Cbmy6uWdWfvXC7O_71ermysg7wB14UsUdtPhm4jO=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1-first-solar-powered-man-flight.jpg?w=584 )     
**  
    
**      **  
  
2010  8               26       ‘  ’     ( Payerne Airport, Swiss )  . 1903                    .           .         ( Bern )  50 ..  ( 30  )   .     12,000        .           .  10    ( 10 HP – 6 Kw Each )   .         ( Solar Cell Batteries )       .        8700   ( 28,500  ) .     :  ( 63  )  207 .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/mWFFM9UINvURwzMOxTG6_CWaLTOwMj3uK7KLxUc55yfrA_V_7ZxQeykkpfKWr95FRFTRV6cJhlSaQDDT9hkzo2cYbqdxKQ20O8RKlCsKFGYYnK9zbSuel0ji2AqJRiVvO6UdamBefBNDI5_XaxQwLE_ku2jRFDJF7A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1f-first-manned-solar-powered-flight.jpg?w=584 )          ,            .  
  
    ,             ..         ,   .              ( Former Fighter Jet Pilot, Andre Borschberg )     .   ‘     ’   ( Solar Impulse Deisgn Group )           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/M5Qib9-RG_jB8L7hU4d8TcUpUCNij-etMOZD-cXYTHUBkLdlHS0_lmqgwhpxb854pgtcHbpQsIFJk3fa2qdwA5zugAWxKmivDIE6HKfmRjMFBvblpj5dEeqEvLXpzUmpuswsfmMGoFhidTxFZfqAlHO0oyn3U-pzS9ReoA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1b-fact-file-of-the-solar-powered-plane.jpg?w=584 )   
  
            :    &       ( Andre Borschberg & Fellow Aviator Bertrand Piccard ) .  “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”      ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab )     !   2013              .

[  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dxqpdSP_K4tkw7ojICd4dDVxU5j3iwKvpW8f-_jGBgFXMDmInCloY22RcebU1hVAuLspC-XB6X7C2jQX3M5KBtwgug5YfVuKdqlJJplC1ID9y2vAc72GTjWWBcWvohDfYQP8L5plq1Y-_b8aEyx4kbAjp7xgtM8w=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1e-nasa-unmanned-solar-poer-flights.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
       ( 57  )     26      !     1999        .  ,      .      : HB-SIA.    :      ( Bern )  50 .  ( 30  )       ( Payerne Airport ) .   : 2010  7   : 06:51.   : 2010  8   : 09:00.    : 8700   ( 28540  ) .   : 26  9 .       14      .           . 63   ( 207  )      ( Similar to A340 Airbus Wings Length )  12,000    .  10 HP        .

                 !      .        : 1.     . 2.    , . 3.            ! 2013–2014        ,        .        ( 75   )  95   !           ( 1600 . )   .

2007          , ,    . 12,000    200    .      400 .   –   ( Lithium Polymer Batteries )   .     ( Electric Motor )  10    ( 6 Kw )   .      : 3.5   ( 12  ) .   .   72 .   208 .  21 .   2200  .   1.6 .    22 mph.   43 mph.   75 mph.   27900   (   ) .   39000 .

           .    ,    100 ..  (  60  )      .    ,      .    8000   ( 27000  )   -28         .  
    
**    /   :**  
  
1\. 2007  22 :       “   ”    .               .

2\. 2009  26 :      ****   ( Duebendorf )          ( Prototype Plane )   .  
  
3\. 2010  7 :    1.5     .  
  
4\. 2010  7 :              26       .  
  
5\. 2010  8 :   26         .    :    8564   ( 28540  ) .

[  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/tnvNMcKlUXmTx_5kKmCFj3XiNo0T7m7egmJyluqXNqKP6-sHEnXLEIqvwL11PGJlkMWpgldhx_1DohU5cQvoGHfCWjP5lFypsNrJOs_1l-5dDT7iYyE3RX6cfwJ5ySi4vLdeGnrxbbI22YbVSy6T1qtacpBN_Ss=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-5-various-views-of-flights1.jpg?w=530&h=2128 )   
  
6\. 2011  :      ( HB-SIB )   ,       .  
  
7\. 2012   :   HB-SIB         
           ,         .  
  
8\. 2013 -2014 :     ( Large & Improved HB-SIB )    ,   .

5\. Wikipedia – Electric Aircraft – electric aircraft is an aircraft that runs on electric motors rather than internal combustion engines with electricity coming from fuel cells, solar cells, ultracapacitors, power beaming and/or batteries.

## 034   100      [ Battery Bank ]    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/storage-batteries-1.jpg?w=561&h=470 )   
    
**World 's Largest Lithium Ion Battery Banks**  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
++++++++++++++++++++  
    
**  ,**    
**   **    
**  **    
**  **    
**   !**    
**  **    
**   !**    
**   !**    
**    !**    
**   !**    
**   !**    
**  !**    
**   **    
**   !**

**   !**    
**   !**

! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/insideevs.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/PR-Graphic_ES_6_11_15.jpg )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/solar-power-equipment-1.jpg?w=509&h=744 )   
    
** 100     [ Battery Bank ]   .**  
  
2017  7           [ Elon Musk's Tesla ]  ,  " 100  100    -       ,         . 2016       ,     ,   , 2017         . 2016            ,  100     100       .  1000                .  
  
! [ Image result for Lithium Ion Research ]  ( https://res.heraldm.com/content/image/2010/07/26/20100726001104_0.jpg )   
  
! [ Image result for Solar Power Fuel Cell ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/web-japan.org/trends/11_tech-life/images/tecb120806.jpg )   
  
 -    [ Battery Bank ]  30,000     .         .     230 ..  [ 143  ]   .     ,         . 2008      [ Neoen ]    300,000    .      ,   ,   ,   .             [ Recharging Station ]  .  
  
! [ Image result for Lithium Ion Technology ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/images.techhive.com/images/idge/imported/imageapi/2014/06/slide_image_050713-lithiumion-2-100304373-gallery.idge.jpg )   
  
! [ Image result for Solar Power Fuel Cell ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/genesisnanotech.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Solar-Fuel-Cell-U-of-T-energy_cycle.jpg )   
  
     -    .    -   . 2016  2     [ Electric Cars ]   .   2020  9 -20       . 2025      40 -70     .  
  
! [ Image result for Lithium Ion Technology ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/07/8fbac-nmat3191-f2.jpg )   
  
! [ Image result for Solar Power Fuel Cell ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/energywiseireland.ie/images/how%20does%20solar%20pv%20work.jpg )   
  
 ,    [ Cathodes & Anodes ]      -, -, -, -, -, -  [ Sodium-Ion, Lead-Acid, Sodium-Sulpher, Ni-Cd, Al-Ion, Li-Ion ]  .  -   ;   .  -    .  -   20%    [ Energy Density ]  .        [ Energy Density OR Energy Stroge Capacity ]      .      [ Direct Current ]  .      .     [ Inverter ]     [ Alternating Curent ]       . 2015       [ Stationary Storage Market ]   1.0    . 2023   13.5      .

! [ Image result for Solar Power Fuel Cell ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/electrical.bazaronweb.com/electrical/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Solarpanel.png )   
  
     ,          . , , , ,        [ Alternating Current ]  . , ,    , ,      ,    .       ,          .

 **         **

! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/CIKn83OffDj6Dodbp0dvVyU-ByLMaOzvY26VUkhAC0p70wNpZSEmnbiJ9AWntF2qehp9YSdGBRcnAzlzgOiyP7jK-OzNAoAoL94mxObnoltmAY1D9RpagZEADtEeIuFE6v0aFpY=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/first-manned-flight1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”   
    
**   ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab ) **  
  
 “      .  !  (    )     !     .    . ”   
    
**     ( Swiss Pilot Andre Borschberg ) **  
  
 “     .      .    . ”   
    
**   ( Flight Director & Former Space Shuttle Astronaut ) **

[  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Frpz6g-Nlr4T9wHeFpfWCiP8YbqMCNJPWhuvAJR92OWhj9VMShy5zIU7xr_zrDkKELhiJTm1RdfAFHBR1obyFAYnjZ2_LVP5CcISm5IC9zwb3R89jvd9Cbmy6uWdWfvXC7O_71ermysg7wB14UsUdtPhm4jO=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1-first-solar-powered-man-flight.jpg?w=584 )     
**  
    
**      **  
  
2010  8               26       ‘  ’     ( Payerne Airport, Swiss )  . 1903                    .           .         ( Bern )  50 ..  ( 30  )   .     12,000        .           .  10    ( 10 HP – 6 Kw Each )   .         ( Solar Cell Batteries )       .        8700   ( 28,500  ) .     :  ( 63  )  207 .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/mWFFM9UINvURwzMOxTG6_CWaLTOwMj3uK7KLxUc55yfrA_V_7ZxQeykkpfKWr95FRFTRV6cJhlSaQDDT9hkzo2cYbqdxKQ20O8RKlCsKFGYYnK9zbSuel0ji2AqJRiVvO6UdamBefBNDI5_XaxQwLE_ku2jRFDJF7A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1f-first-manned-solar-powered-flight.jpg?w=584 )          ,            .  
  
    ,             ..         ,   .              ( Former Fighter Jet Pilot, Andre Borschberg )     .   ‘     ’   ( Solar Impulse Deisgn Group )           !

            :    &       ( Andre Borschberg & Fellow Aviator Bertrand Piccard ) .  “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”      ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab )     !   2013              .

**     **  
  
       ( 57  )     26      !     1999        .  ,      .      : HB-SIA.    :      ( Bern )  50 .  ( 30  )       ( Payerne Airport ) .   : 2010  7   : 06:51.   : 2010  8   : 09:00.    : 8700   ( 28540  ) .   : 26  9 .       14      .           . 63   ( 207  )      ( Similar to A340 Airbus Wings Length )  12,000    .  10 HP        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ikZsiptbTK-i4URaR_gzde9cEPlXJCe2M82UGqXHKoPRjO-y5Bp8V_TTVC3EdQFF8OEt_EL46NOGzT0ynZDAmT6rUvq-bw471URoEBx0i5xoPXD1ji57zvu1n8_jccBme1-ag2jwaYDW=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1a-happy-swiss-pilot.jpg?w=584 )   
  
                 !      .        : 1.     . 2.    , . 3.            ! 2013–2014        ,        .        ( 75   )  95   !           ( 1600 . )   .

2007          , ,    . 12,000    200    .      400 .   –   ( Lithium Polymer Batteries )   .     ( Electric Motor )  10    ( 6 Kw )   .      : 3.5   ( 12  ) .   .   72 .   208 .  21 .   2200  .   1.6 .    22 mph.   43 mph.   75 mph.   27900   (   ) .   39000 .

           .    ,    100 ..  (  60  )      .    ,      .    8000   ( 27000  )   -28         .  
    
**    /   :**  
  
1\. 2007  22 :       “   ”    .               .

[  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/AnNFo5izvD9mWaHZigDfzEezM_FtZAk06NePN3hu9aTkoLfrdWTPfT3HBLfRpOmGKi0kPARmOoQWsN_G-8QyWXGiegG4lDtqN9uWbb5CC0-Kn4GW-Xs_osRCq4vxjUYs_bgOQHTdjvvSMriKBxNqa6vR=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-2-solar-powered-planes.jpg?w=529&h=1115 )   
  
2\. 2009  26 :      ****   ( Duebendorf )          ( Prototype Plane )   .  
  
3\. 2010  7 :    1.5     .  
  
4\. 2010  7 :              26       .  
  
5\. 2010  8 :   26         .    :    8564   ( 28540  ) .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/tnvNMcKlUXmTx_5kKmCFj3XiNo0T7m7egmJyluqXNqKP6-sHEnXLEIqvwL11PGJlkMWpgldhx_1DohU5cQvoGHfCWjP5lFypsNrJOs_1l-5dDT7iYyE3RX6cfwJ5ySi4vLdeGnrxbbI22YbVSy6T1qtacpBN_Ss=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-5-various-views-of-flights1.jpg?w=530&h=2128 )   
  
6\. 2011  :      ( HB-SIB )   ,       .  
  
7\. 2012   :   HB-SIB         
           ,         .  
  
8\. 2013 -2014 :     ( Large & Improved HB-SIB )    ,   .

## 035     25     .        
  
  
  
  
  
! [ An Argo float is deployed into the ocean ]  ( https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/aa8509fe918ab482582b8a5c1862b7b1ad4da373/92_0_3272_1964/master/3272.jpg?w=300&q=55&auto=format&usm=12&fit=max&s=a68c3edeb53bcc428891250558c36219 )   
    
**3800 AGRO FLEET Autonomous Devices Spread out Uniformly across Oceans**  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **

! [  ]  ( http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c90a49ea970b-pi )   
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://skepticalscience.com/graphics/Fingerprints_570.jpg )   
    
**       .**  
  
         ,        .     ,        **    [ Ocean Heat Content  ( OHC )  ] **  .   .      .      ?     ?        ?             ?  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.yaleclimateconnections.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/0116_oceans_2.png )   
  
      .      .         ,   .        . ,          [ Oceanographers ]   .    2017    [ Journal Climate Dynamics ]  .        [ Dr. Gonjgie Wang ] .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.world24monitor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/709.jpg )   
  
 "    1970            .        .            [ Slowdown ]  .       [ Comprehensive Evaluation ]   .  2000   [ 6600  ]            [ Ocean Monitoring Network ]    . "      .    3800       [ ARGO FLEET with 3800 Autonomous Devices ] .  2005     .

[ Icebergs in the Sea ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dtZX2hjBKDQBqtpy8QMZGmp_hcugXqMJq1bwjFr2zrlkz1dQzJrzssDM0ZdPjYty5-mU3k4fI39TBV5YTNyzS7AOljRkJxngL8ieIqeiQgEB86P1UIJ87mkD-Bex9hTutHMcaQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/icebergs-in-the-sea.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    25  **  
  
21           ,     .      :   ,   ,       .    [ Oceans Melting Greenland  ( OMG )  Mission ]   ,     ,        .     [ 5 Year Airborne & Ship-Based Mission ] .    ?  /         .       .  
  
     .       23  .         .      .         250       [ OMG MISSION ]   .

! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://skepticalscience.com/graphics/Total_Heat_Content_2011.jpg )   
  
  , ,          .    3   [ 1  ]       ,       .              .  
    
**   [   , ,    ] **  
  
    [ Paleoclimate Record ]       10   [ 3  ]     ,   .  
    
**   [ Cryosphere Program, NASA Headquarters, Washington.D.C ] **  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/cdn1.globalissues.org/i/climate/total-heat-content.gif )   
    
**       .**  
  
1992   2015  [ ? ]       3   [  8 .. ]  .     9   [ 25 .. ]            .                   .            ?  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/assets.climatecentral.org/images/made/1_25_16_upton_SLR_ocean_heat_FINAL_450_704_s_c1_c_c.jpg )   
  
,       1992   2015   23           . 2013           [ United Nations Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change ]  ,      1   3   [ 0.3  0.9 . ]       .        3   [ 0.9 . ]      .  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.digitaljournal.com/img/3/5/0/9/7/9/i/2/2/3/o/Captura_science_chart.JPG )   
  
 3   [ 0.9 . ]    1      ,  1   [ 0.9 . ]         ,  1         .   660,000    [ 1.7   .. ]    303    [ gigatons ]           .    .     5.4      [ 14   .. ]    118       .  
  
! [ Greenland Rivers -2 ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/6dQPpKY2wg8etWsZ1NlUgvDxgcZ1nrQPr5DCSPDhxo4ZMF8-1-P9gBzlI51IY55Fr_CpLda61DAboO5wZxHbWNhq8WU1uIuK-kmLIz_1md8S44d6gDAiW2R9ngw9=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/greenland-rivers-2.jpg )   
  
2000   2008     1500    [ 1 gigaton = 1 billion ton ]     [ 190 gigaton per year ]      .  2006  2008      273    . 2000  2008       : 4  .         0.75   .  
    
**Van Den Broeke  [ Dutch Researcher Spoke to SPEIGEL ONLINE ] **  
  
        !        , ,     [ Canyons ]   .

2015           ,      .  
    
**   [  ,    ] **  
  
           .     ,       .  
    
**  [  ,  &   ] **  
  
! [ Arctic Ice Region ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/FSjPdg14XJRPKKkVZHQkVIBEsqDp1RzDoPBo4z1jMyG5958hrqDU_eAvji3GLcquaHQfoAFAt3crGsagYYYGrSNbYhbvi8VGbyo6mS9j5XPopFQximcidLnHT4XV6cb3Ox1Ks9z9Qpc=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/arctic-ice-region.jpg?w=450&h=449 )   
  
 “           ,         .  ,         .            . ”   
    
**    [   ,  ] **  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.skepticalscience.com/pics/1_Hansen2012TempvsNino3.4.jpg )   
    
**     .**  
  
              .     2015  15         [ National Academy of Sciences Journal ]   .  80%    .             .    523   2000           [ Moulins or Sink Holes ]    .   : 23,000  46,000 ft/sec.  : 55,000  61,000 cuft/sec.               .  
  
! [ Arctic Ice Retreat ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/CBxgyKKY5FkK433uE5UTd0y5GDqEnl-tgVGp31XY4uVB2docRe5JHyvcm40LQRtELe2DeNWd8iCFMXL6QxQhKHQdR_DxyFKjUvNz4rqbueA0FBgR6yWSleg6ak8kPGwEiUWZ1pr4-6xtkA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/arctic-ice-retreat1.jpg?w=450&h=426 )   
  
 “    2050   9.1   !  , , ,        . 15     [ Mount Kilimanjaro, Tanzania, Africa ]      !         20     .        !

       !         !     ,        !       ?       ?   ,          . ”

 “          ,          .  
    
**    [ Co-Leader, NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory ] **  
  
 “            ( WMO )        [      ,      ]      .     , ,  ,         .      [ Super Computer Models ] ,   ,     ,     .            ,    . ”

 “ 2500                .            ,  ,          !            !         . ”   
    
**     [ Intergovernmental Panel for Climate Change  ( IPCC )  April 2, 2001 ] **  
  
! [ Greenland Location ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/hUsuL9fCsEj2e6pUUQO_M4WZocUd0DIiI1RZKpMzlG_T7dtNxe6Wsg5xmRbsc3-mzhy2NgxR_zkdXlX_TvImM1dFkGY3trrUi5IBLeJbFpi-bsY6s7JK2x7RzG6Q=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/greenland-location.jpg )   
  
 “           !       . ”   
    
**   [       ( 23  1999 )  ] **  
  
        !  ,        ,   !    ,      ,          !  
    
**     [ American Geophysical Union  ( Dec 2003 ] **  
  
! [ Melting Days ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/X6N38M7ITWZ2hFe2b16WGcLnXTiRzH95RclASCihNcCnuWpPAELuWzOS-04Ct0M5BN-SAI61w3SBwy0RTax8-O9FkU0G0f3dhML17KslK6ix2fzDrKIj=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/melting-days.jpg )   
  
 “        .            25%-30%  .  
    
**   :**  
  
1\.   1900  1  F  ( 0.5 C )   . 20      1.2 to 1.4  . 2000   2009        .  50  ,  ,    7  F  [ 4 C ]    .  
  
2\. 20        1990   .   1998      .

3\.  3000        20       !  20      4  8   .  100    2     .  
  
4\.   , ,  279    !      2      !  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8c/Global_Warming_Map.jpg )   
  
5\.  ( 1986-1995 )            .  
  
6\. WHO  [ World Health Organization ]     [    / , , ,   ,   ,    ]   150,000    .  
    
**  ,  [ Dr. Cecilia Bitz, Physicist, University of Washington, Polar Science Center ]  and  [ 11 Facts About Global Warming ] **

**        [  2012 ] **  
  
   ,      ,      50              .    ,       ,     . 21     “  ”               . 2012      “  ”   ,     .  ,           .

**  2012     :**  
  
26  47    10   ,       . 1992  2011    20        [ ERS Mission : European Remote Sensing Satellite ]   ,       .   [  3  ]     .           “       [ Sun-synchronouspolar orbit ]   . 1992           11     . 2012    ,    1990      .  
    
**        **  
  
! [ Antarctica ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/fyMzOgZx64I65JFdysKpYdIRzpSh93FNEqBpqpony0TUgbjUoT09IsYrexqWa5FU8PJvhBXJs5XiZxpXiOuRlIKX3HerbhmgWJPiqr7p7IPPckcVoIRvUYI0gQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/antarctica.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    ,          !             ,       !           .    ( 1979-1989 )         ,    !      ,             .     “    ”   [ Chloro Fluro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]   
  
! [ Global ocean mean temperature ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Xgz4kAxf6Ohvp8U3-nN7u1Gv0HwL453CdU1CqbU0DKfy82eW9NcYzBwUKiN9drF-G9L6BHq64TVdKdpbS6RqaKj-YvN-klEZ34IDY3bbLvIc6h7GI9IYUW07qMxVDLwE-zv1sGZcJ_67TsIW9nY=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/global-ocean-mean-temperature.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
         ,    !      [ Volume ]    ,     , !       ,      [ Carbon Dioxide ]         [ Density ]   !    ,    ,   .    “   ”    “    ”   [ Greenhouse Effect ]    .       !           ,       .  .·.  [ Chloro Fluoro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]            ,        .  
  
! [ Atmospheric CO2 ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Sv2iqyWOo3BGUnqzAXDH8U_rf5J7v0FBiaXr6voGo8MR5dhHyoype-nTmpAn-5inwoU-UBelphejSlpWZrUkxKGv1kjfzf-IlQ1J-KDVJ7daiU2LRXBr047dfZTs3Xxq=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/atmospheric-co2.jpg?w=584 )   
  
     ,       !           .         .           ,        .           ,        . 1940       1972     !          ,        !        !

     ,           [ Volumetric Thermal Expansion ] .          !       .    [ Tide Gauge Data ]        .  100       10-25 ..  !        100  2-7 ..    !       2-5 ..   !  4-13 ..      . 21                  !  
  
! [ Fig 1 Arctic Ice Melting ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/voxHXj6br_p8t4zND2U2CKDA2w9Hj2e_O68Y64bPYRwAHNAUvjurRVTk4UNhvVvDZx9ZzSFMqvbXsFbLlGQgHeAYS8ylwZ7KotW3wdFuP2_ksBk3f0srdHKT0HxM7aVzOhP4PmbeP4LX=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/fig-1-arctic-ice-melting.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    :**  
  
               .    , ,           [ CO2 ] .        [ Methane Gas ] .      [ Waste Treatment Plants ]   ,       [ Halo-Carbons ]  .    CO2    [ CO2 Equivalence ]  , 2003    CO2  : 2692.  2002   CO2    10.6%    !  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://trcs.wikispaces.com/file/view/What-is-global-warming-img.jpg/49805201/What-is-global-warming-img.jpg )   
  
2003     300,000        1810   CO2   “     ”   [ Glaxo Smith Kline ]  !    614       , 2002   91.5   CO2   2003   .     50  ,     12.6   CO2      !  
  
! [ Image result for oceans are warming rapidly ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.global-greenhouse-warming.com/images/thermohaline.jpg )   
  
 (  )

## 036      1000    

**June 29, 2017**

**       .**  
    
**2017  31         1000 MWe    .  ,   ,         2016  10       [ First Criticality ]  .         245 MWe   2016  29 , , , ,     .      ,         .            [ Atomic Energy Regulatory Board  ( AERB )  ]    )  . ,     ,      [ VVER-1000 ]       ,  , ,  ,      ,     .**  
  
! [ Image result for Power Plant in India ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.indiaspend.com/wp-content/uploads/1_desktop.jpg )   
    
**       1000 MWe       6780  .  1000     ,        .   VVER -1000     .       4000             . 2016 - 2017    189   100%         [ Nuclear Power Corporation of India, Limited ]   [ NPCIL ]  .   , 2013    11269    .     . 3.89   . **  
  
! [ Image result for www.npcil ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.world-nuclear-news.org/uploadedImages/wnn/Images/Kudankulam%20460%20\ ( AtomStroyExport\ ) .jpg )   
    
**       .**  
    
**2014  7        1000 MWe          .         ,    : 2013  14.    400       , .    2001  ,   ,           .          ,  1000 MW    ..**

** :**   ?   ?      .        ,        .                    .             ?            ?           ,      .      .   ,           .           .

     ( 435+284+220 )  939                ?       .    45            .           .           . ,         .     ,   ,                .

             .               .. ,       !     !         ,    .      ,      ,     ?  
  
2012          ,  1757  20           .       .  ,  .  ( 1809-1882 ) .    1831-1835            .        . 1757          .

**////       (   )   , 12  2011 ///**

/////   1, 2   , ,     . 1, 2       .    . 1, 2          ,    ( site Evaluation Study )   .    ( Safety Analysis Report )  ,  ,   .     ,  ,      .  
  
kudankulam_323   . 828  ( 29.4.1991 –  )    2 .        , 2  5 .        ( Sterilization Zone )     . ,     ,    .      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/reactor-building-cutaway1.jpg?w=530&h=1006 )   
  
i )  AERB       5 ..  20,000   .   10 .    20,000 ,   12,000 ,   450  .  
  
ii )  10 .            .           .

iii )  30 .  1,00,000-     .  2,00,000     28 .  .  
  
iv )  20 .   ,       AERB      15 .  .  
  
    30 .  10        ,   ,     ,    ,   ,        . 2004          .////
