## 058            
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano-5 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-5.jpg?w=584&h=385 )   
    
**     **  
  
! [ mars-volcano-olympus-mons ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/mars-volcano-olympus-mons.jpg?w=503&h=787 )   
    
**.  B.E.  ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
++++++++++++++  
  
      .    100   [ Meteorites ]     .        ,  100     .     [ Meteorites ]     [ North West Africa  ( NWA )  7635 ]   ,     . NWA 7635  1.1      [ Cosmic Rays ]       .  500      .    2        [ Magma ]     .     .  
    
**   [ Marc Caffee, Professor of Astronomy, Purdue University, USA ] **  
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano-8 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-8.jpg?w=547&h=547 )   
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano-10 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-10.jpg?w=550&h=450 )   
    
**      **  
  
2012        [ Meteorite ]   .          .       . 6.9         ,      2         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.space.com/images/i/000/026/895/original/OlyMons.jpg )   
  
  1000   ,     ,  .        ,      .  100      .     [ North West Africa NWA 7635 ]     . 2012    11       **  [ Shergottite ] **      .  
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano-4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-4.jpg?w=537&h=625 )   
    
**   **  
  
     .      ,    ,      .       .          ,        .  
  
! [ olympus-mons-meteorite ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-meteorite.jpg?w=503&h=780 )   
  
    100  30        [ Purdue Rare Isotope Measurement Laboratory ]   [ PRIME LAB ]   .           .  11         .  10   500  , **   [ Magma ] **      .       [ NWA 7635 ]   ,  2.4       .  
  
         [  Tom Lapen ]  2017        [ Journal Science Advances ]        ,       .  
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano.jpg?w=500&h=440 )   
  
          .        [ Tectonic Activities ]  .   ,       .    **  "   "   [ Olympus Mons ] **   .   **  "   "   [ Shield Volcano ] **  .    16   [ 25 .. ]   .   374   [ 624 .. ] .     .    .  4   [ 6 .. ]     [ Rim ]  .     [ Caldera ]  50   [ 80 .. ]  .     ** "    "   [ Mauna Loa ] **   100  .  
  
! [ olympus-mons-volcano-9 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-9.jpg?w=584&h=410 )   
  
! [ Ocean of Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/ocean-of-mars.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
                 .            ..  
  
          . ,      .  
  
    ,           ,       ?     [ Craters ]     .  
    
**   [  , ,    ] **  
  
! [ Mars Ocean ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/mars-ocean1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
       [ Mars Science Laboratory Rover ]               .      [ Sedimentary Conglomerates ]           .  
    
**    [     ] **  
  
     ,     ,         .      ,        ,         .  
    
**   [ Linda Kah, Associate Professor of Earth & Planetary Science, University of Tennessee, Knoxville ] **  
  
! [ Clues for water in Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/clues-for-water-in-mars.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1980      [ NASA ’  S Viking Orbiter ]        20          :         !     ,       [   — Oceanus Borealis ]          !  
  
   ,              .      :      [ Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter ] .     .            .  
    
**! [ Water flow in Mars -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-1.jpg?w=395&h=507 ) **  
  
         .      .        .  
    
**    [   ,  ] **  
  
,         .            .       .      .   ,    ,  ,     .          :  [    ]   [  3   ] ,  [      . ]   
    
**  .**  
    
**! [ Pebbles in Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/pebbles-in-mars.jpg?w=450&h=532 ) **  
    
**         **  
  
  4         [ MSL Curiosity Rover ]   [ MSL : Mars Science Laboratory ]  150 ..   ( 90  )     [ Gale Crater ]    ,       [ Rounded Pebbles within Sedimentary Conglomerate ]             .    2012   .       , ,      [ Golf ]    ,     .  ,          .         [ Aileen Yingst ]          .      275   [ 900   ]   ,     .  
  
! [ Martian water ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/martian-water.jpg?w=451&h=532 )   
  
          [ Electrical Discharges over Mars Iced Surfaces ]    .         [ Discharges ]     [ CO2 ]          .  
    
**    [ Arturo Robledo-Martinez, Mexican Geo-physical Team ] **  
  
 “            .      .                . ”   
    
**   ( Douglas McCuistion, Director of Mars Exploration Program NASA Headquarters ) **  
  
 “               ” .  
    
**   ( German Astronomer Johannes Kepler )   ( 1571-1630 ) **  
    
**! [ Water flow in Mars -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-2.jpg?w=448&h=918 ) **  
  
        ( Gale Crater )          ( Sediment Rocks ) .    4          . ,  ,        .  
    
**   ( Mars Science Lab Dy Project Scientist NASA ) **  
  
 ( 2012     )           ( Mound at the center of Gale Crater )  MFF    ( Medusae Fossae Formation Exposure )  .  ( MFF on Mars is an intensely eroded deposit **..**  )      ( Grand Canyon )   .          .    MFF    .          .  
    
**   (   National Air & Space Museum ) **

** [ Mars Science Laboratory  ( Curiosity Rover )  Mission Animation ] **  
  
 “    ”        .         .  “              .         ,           .      ,            , ”   
    
** ,   ,   .**  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/2011-nov-launching.jpg?w=540 ) ** “          .      ,      ! ”   
    
** ,    ,   .**  
  
 “       [ Svalbard Island ]        ‘     ‘   [ Microbiological Oasis ]   .            . 1996         [ Meteorite ]  ,            [ Magnetite Crystals ]   . ”   
    
** ,  ,   **  
  
 “          [ Barcodes ] .          .  
  
 ‘  **   [ John Grotzinger, Science Team Member  M.I.T. ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/mars-atmosphere-1.jpg?w=499&h=584 )   
    
**        ?**  
  
                     .          .          .                   .         . 2010           [ Kevin Zajnle ]          .               .  
  
! [ Methane Detection in Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/methane-detection-in-mars.jpg?w=540&h=759 )   
  
     “    ”   [ Dust Storms & Dust Devils ]     .          .          [ Electrical Discharges over Mars Iced Surfaces ]     .         ,    [ Laboratory Simulation ]       [ 1.41 x 1016 molecule of Methane per joule ]  . 40          .       .          .     “  ”            .         [ 100  1  ]   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/fig-7-north-polar-ice-cap.jpg?w=529&h=541 )   
  
! [ Kasei Valles Maps of Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/kasei-valles-maps-of-mars.jpg?w=519&h=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
2014              “  ”      ( Mars Climate Mission -2 )          !           ( 90 – 3870 )          .           485    ( 2009   )     .         “  ”   ( Maven – Mars Atmosphere & Volatile Environment Probe )    . 1998   327         -1  ( Mars Climate Orbiter -1 )    ,    (       )         !  
  
! [ fig-1b-maven-spacecraft-instruments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1b-maven-spacecraft-instruments.jpg?w=540 )   
  
           .      .                 ,              !        ,          .                   !                .        ( Solar Charged Particles )             .            ( Solar Wind )         !  
  
! [ fig-1c-climate-orbiter-equipment ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1c-climate-orbiter-equipment.jpg?w=540 )   
    
**    ?**  
  
2013            .     ,  ,         .   
  
1\.      “   ”   ( Volatiles )      .     , ,  ,     ( Planetary Habitability )    .  
  
2\.        ( Upper Atmosphere )   ,    ( Ionosphere ) ,          ( Interactions with Solar Wind )   .  
  
3\.     ( Ions )     ( Neutrals )     . 4.           ( Ratio of Stable Isotopes )  .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/mars-atmospheric-gases.jpg?w=501&h=537 )   
    
**    **  
  
         ( Thruster Boosters )           .      90   (   )  3870   (   )        .  (    ,    ) .      80        .            .      ( Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter & Mars Odyssey Spacecraft )     !          “   ”   ( Geochemistry )    .       “  ”     ·   ( Land Rovers : Spirit & Opportunity, Later Phoenix Lander )       .  
  
! [ Flood waters on Mars -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/flood-waters-on-mars-1.jpg?w=451&h=532 )   
  
  “     ”   ( Mars Science Laboratory MSL )             !                 .         “ -  ”   ( ExoMars Rover )     .  
    
**   **  
  
             .      ,   ,    ( Ionosphere )   .  
  
     :  
  
1\.  ( Particles & Field Package PAF )  – ,   .  
  
2\.  ( Solar Wind Electron Analyser SWEA )  –      .  
  
! [ Kasei Valles of Mars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/kasei-valles-of-mars.jpg?w=451&h=532 )   
  
3\.  ( Solar Wind Ion Analyser SWIA )  –  ,   ,  ,  .  
  
4\.  ( Suprathermal & Thermal Ion Composition STATIC )  –        .  
  
5\.  ( Solar Energetic Particle SEP )  –             .  
  
6\.  ( Lagmuir Probe & Waves LPW )  –    .     ,      .  ( Solar EUV Input to Atmosphere )   
  
7\.  ( Magetometer MAG )  –    &     .  
  
8\.  ( Remote Sensing Package RS )  –    .  
  
9\.  ( Imaging Ultraviolet Spectrometer IUVS )  –  &     .  
  
10\.  ( Natural Gas & Ion Mass Spectrometer NGIMS )  – ,         .  ( Measures the Composition & Isotopes of Thermal Neutrals & Ions ) .  
  
! [ fig-1g-climate-orbiter-details ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1g-climate-orbiter-details.jpg?w=540 )   
    
**     !**  
    
****           .               .      .  18     :  
  
. . .   .     ( Humidity )  .  
  
. . .    : -80    ( -112 F )   
  
. . .      : -30    ( -22 F )   
  
. . .    8.55 .  (    100  1  )   
  
. . .   : 13 mph  ( 20 km/h )    .  
  
! [ fig-2-mars-earth-atmospheres ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-2-mars-earth-atmospheres.jpg?w=540 )   
    
**       !**  
  
         !                ! 1960           50%    ( 50% Failure Rate )   .   15     5     !                 !1999     “    ”   ( Mars Climate Orbiter )   /        ( Spaceship Navigational Error due to British-Metric Units Mix up )       !      “    ”   ( Mars Polar Lander )        !      “  2001  ”   ( Mars Surveyor 2001 Lander )        !      ·            ,   2001     .          “ · ”   ( Phoenix )     !  
  
! [ Mars Exploration ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/mars-exploration.jpg?w=500&h=784 )

 ?  ?    
,     ?    
       
   ?    
      
  ?    
      
   ?     
  ?    
    
  ?    
      
     
 ,    
  ?    
       
  !    
      
   ?    
     
      
 ?  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
! [ Earth's Pole Reversal ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/earths-pole-reversal.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**        ?**  
  
        ,       .      .  20  ,    200,000  300,000       .      ** [ Brunhes-Matuyama Reversal ] ** 780,000   .   41,000   ** [ Laschamp Event ] **   .       ,   250   .  
  
! [ Earth magnetic field ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/earth-magnetic-field1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
,           .    ,    , ,     [ Equator ]    ,     10%  . ,    ,    ** [ Multiple Poles ] **  .  
  
   ** [ Geomagnetic Reversals ] **       .  ,      .     .    ,  ,   .     ** [ Magnetic Poles ] **     ** [ Geographic Poles ] **   ,    ** [ Equator ] ** ,    .  
  
! [ Image result for brunhes-matuyama reversal ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.nasa.gov/images/content/607067main2_world-226.jpg )   
  
    ** [ Doomsday Theorists ] **      ,       .         ?   ?     ? ,   ,  [ Geologic  & Fossil Records ]         , ** "    " **  .       ,     [  :  1000  ]      ?      ?      ?        !  
  
! [  ]  ( http://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?&id=OIP.M9ffd5c3a6091cc7ddc53326413b63409o0&w=300&h=250&c=0&pid=1.9&rs=0&p=0&r=0 )   
  
   [ 2017 ]      40      .  20      10      .        ** "   -    "   [ Brunhes- Matuyama Reversal ] **   .     ,  -          [ Fossil Records ]   .  
  
   [ 2000 - 2016 ]         [ Sediments Cores ] ,    [ Oxygen Isotopes  ]     .  ,     [ Earth's Rotation Axis ]   .       ,   [ Climate & Glaciation ]   .      ,   .  
  
       ,      .  3  ,        .       [ Sediments ]  .      .  
  
++++++++++  
  
 “             ( Secondary Magnetic Source )             .        ,             ! ”   
    
** ,   -  **  
  
! [ Image result for brunhes-matuyama reversal ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/strangesounds.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Magnetic-Pole-Reversal-1.gif )   
  
     [ Earth ’ s Magnetic Pole Reversal ]  1000  10,000  .      [ Realignment ]  ,     .    ,   [ Sudden Flip; but a Slow Process ]   .      .          ,     .        [ Realigns in the Opposite Direction ]     
    
**   [ Scientific Director, Niemegk Geomagnetic Observatory, Germany ] **  
  
! [ Iside the Earth ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/iside-the-earth.jpg?w=584 )   
  
         .  400,000       .     .      800,000        .      .       .      . ”   
    
** ,    ( Utrecht )   **  
    
**      ?**  
  
          .         .     780,000         .            “   ”   [ Fire Power ]    .  
  
! [ Earth's Core ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/earths-core.jpg?w=584 )   
  
      ,      .   10    .     .    250  F    , 12     .          [ Liquid Iron Outer Core ]   .             .      ,    [ Geophysicist Daniel Lathrop ]    ,       .        “    ”   [ Voice of Russia ] .   :  29, 2014.  
  
        .           .    780,000   .     .       [ 1000  10,000  ]  .         ?      ?       ?     !       .     400,000      .  
  
! [ Fig 1 Polat Shift in Earth ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1-polat-shift-in-earth1.jpg?w=500&h=650 )   
  
 “    ,       ( Solar Wind )         .  ,        ( Navigational Direction )      !       ,     . ”   
    
** ,    ( Utrecht )   **  
  
 “                !      ( Single-celled Organisms )   ,       !          .              ! ”   
    
** ,   , .**  
    
**! [ Fig 1B Magnetic Pole Shift ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1b-magnetic-pole-shift.jpg?w=500&h=742 ) **  
  
 “                .        .       ( Paleomagnetic Direction )   . ”   
    
**  .**  
    
**      !**  
  
          !        [ 1000 – 10,000 ]        ,     !    65   130        ( Geologists )   !           !               ( Orientation of Earth ’ s Magnetic Field )    !  
  
! [ Fig 1C Structure of Earth ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1c-structure-of-earth.jpg?w=450&h=490 )   
  
                  !        “   ”   ( Normal Direction )        “   ”   ( Reversal Direction )      !  150   ( 1985 Factual )         ( Latitude )   ( 79  )   !       ( Longitude )   0. 042      !         2.6        !  
  
! [ Fig 1E Relative Size of Sunspots ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1e-relative-size-of-sunspots.jpg?w=450&h=1178 )   
  
2004  26                  ( Earth ’ s Tectonic Plate Crust )      .             .  11      “    ”    ( Peak Sunspot Cycle )      !   “    ”   2012     !      ( Magnetic Flux )     ( Solar Equator )       .             !  
  
! [ Fig 1 Polat Shift in Earth ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1-polat-shift-in-earth.jpg?w=500&h=580 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
       .     780,000   .       .        ( Electric Current )           !       ( Needle of the Magnetic Compass )        !          100   .  “             ( Secondary Magnetic Source )             .        ,              ! ”   -    ,   .  
  
! [ Earth magnetic field -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/earth-magnetic-field-2.jpg?w=584 )   
  
       ·  ( Kenneth Hoffman )       ( Tahiti )     30           ( Patterns )  .                !  “                .        .       ( Paleomagnetic Direction )   . ”     .  
  
! [ Fig 4 Power of Geodynamo ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-4-power-of-geodynamo1.jpg?w=536&h=631 )   
    
**      **  
  
2012  21          !  11              !     ,    !         “   ”   ( Harmonic Cycles ) .     “     ”   ( Sun Spots or Sun Acnes )    .     .  
  
11,500               .       ,   ,  , ,        ! 2008     200         !                .  
  
+++++++++++++++++++  
  
 [  ]     
+++++++++++++++++++

 “     ”     
  .  
  
            !       , !      , !          !  
    
**   [ Victor Guillemin ] **  
    
**    ?    
**    
  ,    ,      ,     ,         ?           ,   !         ,        !  
  
   !   !    ! ,   ,      ,     !          ,          !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/o7fXlTo72DmqlrEdkwlgR4j5PDFhqArhnwuqhq7wFfnptdxjNZn5lSJLnyBQsnHJltQInCEuFdiYpIhm6reOsPXz3HlEWE83pyfGbzwRdgvu5wcz=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181a.jpg )   
  
        ,                    [ Leukemia ]       !             ,     !  
  
,       50    ,  ,    ,   [ Batteries ]  ,   ,       !           ,      [ Background Natural Radiation ] ,       ,      !  “     ” ,   ,           !  
    
**     ?**  
  
     ,      “   ”   [ Background Radiation ]      !       [ Cosmic Rays ]    !  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,   ,          !   , , ,      [ Unstable Elements ] ,  ,    -239, -233   ,   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/UOP2SMu4crdvrQt23ynlci9Q423FJ4KH5xjcagizVDVg5IjaRRK8amVTorzhuyHbsP1Nx1rxq6lbXbo2FGGR_4pWLJIF05GwnMg5F1o4gWxUVuD95A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181aa.jpg )   
  
    80%     !         [ Radon Gas ]    !    !    !  !          ,        !     ,            !  
  
       [ Radiation Sources ]  !   ,   [ Radiography ] ,  ,  ,   ,    ,     , ,  ,               ,    !     18%    !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/J7XtpcoJNoZvH3MRr-qKF-aBpo7wDhDO10uE6D9guJ3qg1c-xzHQ5JfY9GodFToKaC7OVzLRj9OUmLLDLf_tL7Z8XHnxlQKz6JxkgeJvXC0GeiNIVw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181af.jpg )   
    
**,    ?**  
  
    1895       !   , 1896   ·             “  ”   [ Radiation ]   .     ,    ,         ,  “  ”   [ Radioactivity ]   !        ,  1903    ! 1934        [ Artificial Radioisotopes ]  ,          !       1932            !  ,         !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/hxIYpXEvozT-MA3Z_N2KgVING8OUnXjkgnNFARFUOXrO2X4BrqCCedRiWTgx3rUyOtyzfUIjCyVmlaIYrbdGBjrJMkW5C8xEPBH_l37ZR1S_V0H-=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181e.jpg )   
  
    ,    [ Elements & Isotopes ]    ,  .   ,    [ Accelerators ]   200  ,   ,     .  ,     ,  ,    [ Alpha Particle, Beta Particle, Gamma Rays ]   ,   !      ,       !     ,         [ Electromagnetic Waves ]    . , ,       [ Particles ] .    ,       [ Ionizing Radiations ] .        [ High-energy Radiations ]  .    , ,   , !   ,  !  ,    !

** ,  **  
  
   [ Positive Charge ]     ,   ,   ,    .       !   ,    ,    ,    !  
  
    ,        [ Negative Charge ]   !       !    ,  ,     !   ,      ,   !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/35HZVdnGTG5itVyrCiPUwWoxYmoNEPDuF5e7dUwYUlq7eYmG9Q7hSO2geezRJuJ8hsHqSa5QXF52_0wvWp15uorcAEm7ctsJMM1hwRl8AipdGBCLTA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181ae.jpg )   
  
             !        ,  !   ,      ,         !  
  
 ,        .     ,           !  
  
  ,  ,     .     [ Neutral Charge ]   !    ,      ,    !

**     :**  
  
          ,                    [ Leukemia ]       !           ,    !  
  
 , 40,      : 200-300 m.rem.  [ milli rem. 100 rem = 1 sievert ] .  
  
    : 1.0 m.rem.  
  
   : 50 m.rem.  
  
   [  ,   ] : 2.0 m.rem.

  :  200-300 m.rem.  
  
     200-300 m.rem , 10,000      !  
  
  10 rem    , 1000  1    !  [       , 1000  160-200  ] .    
100 rem      .  1000  10       !    
300-600 rem        ,    !     !     . 450 rem   50%   !    
1000 rem     ,       !    
5000-10,000 rem     !

**    !**  
  
     !     [ Somatic Effect ] ;      [ Genetic Effect ] .   , , ,   ,  ,    1000 rem    !  
  
        [ Ionizing Body Cells ]  .     !       [ Biological Damages ]  !      [ Half Life  ( Time taken to become half by Decay Process )  ]  ,     !     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/qrWZ_-xa-dx9CYD8ObQVGMsQln6TxNiy-j-NFHZuckazbB2E8ZVS3Gx0gy2GWiGu8gN1mo48k66ldZZWl7tAMs_3Pg8dC_9sDxXm1-pEw1XSDmrt=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181g.jpg )   
  
 ,     -131   [ Isotopes ]   : 8 ! -90   : 29 ! -137   : 30 !  90         ! -131       ! -137        !      !  
  
       [ Genes Mutations ]  ,      ! ,       !         !   ,      ,   [ Random ]  !     ,   !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/rcsUHm1EJvvwKt-8R2odJCZlGYONKUK_SQI6AiJzO9oDbCDfXj-JI-DoqGJE0SJbrnpUY-q50OoXkTDsqQFVTeTVWDnUdp2jFiLmAnFBWiw7ucXz=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181c.jpg )   
    
**      **  
  
1986  26              , ,   ,     ,      !    ,              !       ,      !      ,       ! 20    135,000         !   31  !     700,000    ,     !      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ipysdCFylfP2dsuYCSxU7FDI7_rvEclq0j1v6keqYDvYjvCnvRscEusEdFVQGt_WCGJq8MKYT-9OyE4-DI64wWgj52PZHhuzNO1J645_jZjLEtBT=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/10/40710181d.jpg )   
    
** !  !**  
  
    ,          ,    !  ,     ,     !    ,            !   , ,       !            !  
  
 ,   ? ,      [ I.A.E.A International Atomic Energy Agency, Vienna, Austria ]     !      !   !     !       [ Radiation Shieldings ]   ! , ,      !  “ ,    ”     ,          !            ,  ,   ,  , ,  ,         ,        !

14 National Geographic Magazine Radiation Effects  [ April 1989 ]     
15 Facts About Radiation by Ontario Hydro Nuclear Division    
16 Ascent Magazine By Atomic Energy of Canada Ltd.  [ Summer 1989 ]     
17 Understanding Ionizing Radiation  [ August 1992 ]     
18 Radiation is Part of Life  [ March 1985 ]

21\. <http://www.thinnai.com/?module=displaystory&story_id=20309252&format=html>  (       )

## 061     -         [ Quasars ]     
  
    
  
! [ How fast is the universe expanding? ]  ( https://3c1703fe8d.site.internapcdn.net/newman/csz/news/800/2015/howfastisthe.jpg )   
    
**   **  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **

! [ Image result for Expansion of universe ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/cdn.zmescience.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Lambda-Cold_Dark_Matter_Accelerated_Expansion_of_the_Universe_Big_Bang-Inflation.jpg )   
  
         !       !       ,   !     ,      
    
**  [ Seneca  ( First Century )  ] **  
    
**     [ New Cosmology Project ] **  
  
2017            , **    [ Hubble Constant ] **      .   "    "         .        [ Standard Cosmological Model ]         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/cover-image-edwin-hubble-1.jpg?w=441&h=561 )   
    
** ( 1889-1953 ) **  
  
         ,        .     **  "    [ Lambda CDM ]  " **      ** [ Standard Cosmological Model ]  72 km per sec per megaparsec  [ a megaparsec is about 3.3 million light-years ]   [ 42 miles per sec per megaparsec ] **   .    **    [ Hubble Constant ] **  .            .        3.8%   .        [ Royal Astronomical Society ]   2017  27   .  
  
! [ Image result for Expansion of universe ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/planck.cf.ac.uk/files/Universe_history.jpg )   
    
**Click to Enlarge**  
  
1920         [ Georges Lamaitre ]         .          [ Edwin Hubble ]    [ Galaxies ]    ,        .            [ Accelerating Expansion ]  .  
  
! [ Image result for quasars ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/astro.unl.edu/classaction/outlines/galaxies/quasars.jpg )   
  
        .    **    [ Gravitational Lensing ] **       .           [ Quasars ]    .        .       [ Supermassive Black Holes ]     .     .  
  
! [ Image result for Expansion of Universe Nova ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/planetfacts.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/massive-star-supernova-gamma-ray-burst.jpg )   
    
**   [ Quasar ] **  
  
   [ Luminosity of Quasars ]       .       .        .     .     **  "    [ Lambda CDM ]  " **      ** [ Standard Cosmological Model ]  72 km per sec per megaparsec  [ a megaparsec is about 3.3 million light-years ]   [ 42 miles per sec per megaparsec ] **   .    **    [ Hubble Constant ] **  .  
  
! [ Image result for quasars ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.astronomynow.com/news/n1307/01quasars/cartoon_large.jpg )   
    
**Click to Enlarge**  
    
**     !**  
  
  ,        [ Chaos ] !   , !   !   !  ! ,   !   !    !  !    [ Particles ] !   [ Sub atomic particles ] !  !      , ,    !     !  , ,       [ Chaotic Particles ]   !     !     !  ,     !    !    ,     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1c-the-giant-eye.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 !  ! ! !   ,  !    ,        ,   [ Universe ]     !    [ Region ]       !   ,   [ Cooling ] !        !     ,   !

       !   !    ,      !     ,      !      [ Giant Gravitational Force ]       !   !   [ Galaxies ]  !   !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1e-mount-wilson-telescope.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     !**  
  
      ,  ‘     ‘      .     ,  ,    [ Extremely Dense, Compact & Hot ]  ! 10-20   ,      [ Cosmic Explosion ]     ,   ! 1915      ‘      ’   [ Field Equations of General Theory of Relativity ]     !  
  
! [ Image result for gravity lensing ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.spacetelescope.org/static/archives/images/wallpaper2/heic9910c.jpg )   
    
**   [ Gravity Lensing ] **  
  
    ‘     ‘   [ Big Bang Theory ]  !   ,    [ Density ]     [ Mass ]       !     !         !   ,          !   ,  !    1922        [ Alexander Friedmann  ( 1888-1925 )  ]        [ Georges Lemaitre  ( 1894-1966 )  ]      ,     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1a-the-bing-bang-universe.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1923        ‘      ‘    !         ,     !  
  
  ,    [ Edwin Hubble ]  1929            !     [ Galaxies ]      [ Light Spectrum ] ,        ,       [ Redshift,   ]  !  ‘    ‘   [ Doppler Effect ]              !     ,   ,     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1b-edwin-classification.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
1925    D.C.       [ American Astronomical Society ]    ,    [ Pasadena ]  ,         !      100    [ Mount Wilson 100  ‘  Reflector ]   , 32 ,       [ Edwin Hubble ]      [ Giant Star, Cepheid ]  !   ,   [ Luminosity, Size ]     [ Variable Star ] !    ,       [ Absolute Magnitude ]  .   [ Andromeda or M31 ]     ,         [ Great Nepula ] !      [ Cosmic Distances ]    !      [ Milky Way ]         !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1-edwin-with-the-huge-telescope.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   ,     [ Mount Wilson Observatory ]  100           ,     !  , ,      !      [ Galaxies ]   ‘    ‘   [ Island Universes ]     !      ,   ‘     ‘   [ Classification System for the Galaxies ]  .      !   ,  ,        1929   .          !  ,     [ / ]   ‘     ‘   [ Hubble Constant ]     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1j-wmap-probe.jpg?w=584 )     
**   **  
  
1889    20       .     .    .   1898    .          .      !      [ Jules Verne ] ,    [ Rider Haggaard ]   ,     [ Solomon  ‘ s Mines ]    .               !         1910  B.S.  .  
  
      [ Rhodes Scholarship ]        ,    !   .    ,  1913  .          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-2-hubbles-tuning-forkdiagram.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    ,    1917  Ph.D.  ! 1917-1919      ,       [ George Hale  ( 1868-1938 )  ]     ,    [ Pasadena, California ]      [ Mount Wilson Observatory ]    !  
  
1970    &    [ Mount Wilson & Mount Palmer Observatories ] ,     ‘    ‘   [ Hale Observatories ]     !        ! 1919     100      ,  200      !   ,      [ 1953 ]    ! 1973     200     ,    400      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1h-andromeda-nebula.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1924       [ Grace Burke ]      .      30     ,  1953   28       [ Cerebral Thrombosis ]   .  
    
**   ,  **  
  
1915            !    ,            !               [ Framework ]  .            !          ,      [ Constant ]  ,     !       ,     [ Cosmological Contant ]   ,  ‘     ‘      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-1d-einstein-meets-hubble.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1924   ,     ,       !       [ Melvin Slipher ] ,    [ Edwin Hubble ] ,    [ Milton Humason ]           ,        !     [ Flagstaff Observatory, Arizona ]  , ,        [ Mount Wilson Observatory, CA ]    .           ,     !    [ Doppler Effect ]         [ Red-Shift end of Spectrum ]    ,     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-5-expanding-galaxies.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   ,       [ Equations in General Theory of Relativity ]     ! 1929     [ Hubble  ‘ s Law ]  :  ‘   ,                ‘    ! 1929     ,  45   [ 162,000 mph ] !  
  
       ! 1931          ,    ,      !  ,      [ Princeton Institute of Advanced Studies, New Jersey ]       !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-6-doppler-effect.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
1920        .     [ Spiral Nepulae ]       ,   !          ‘   ’   [ Island of Universe ]     ! 1924   100     ‘    ‘   [ Andromeda Nebula ]   ,            !     [ Milky Way ]   ,          [ Separate Galaxy ]   !  
  
     ,               !       ,       ,    ‘    ’   [ Doppler Shift of Light ]       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-7-spiral-galaxy.jpg?w=584 )   
  
     [ Railway Crossing ]           !     ,     !         !    ‘    ‘   [ Doppler Effect ]    .  ,    !     ,        [ Light Spectrum ]    !            !     ‘    ‘   [ Redshift ]    !      [ Sensitive Spectrograph ]  ,      ‘    ‘  1929      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-11-cobe-space-probe-2.jpg?w=584 )     
      [ X axis ] ,       [ Y axis ]    ,      !   ,          [ Redshifts or speeds of the Galaxies are directly proportional to their distances ]        !  ,       ,  ‘    ‘   [ Hubble ’ s Law ]   .     [ Red-Shift ]  ,       !  
  
   ,     !    ,     ,     !          !            !     [ General Theory of Relativity ]  , 1915      ‘   ’   [ Theory of Gravity ]    ,  ,   ,       ‘    ‘   !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-3-edwin-hubble-opens-the-window-to-cosmos.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
   1917        !   ,      [ George Lemaitre ] ,      [ Willem de Sitter ] ,      [ Alexander Friedmann ] .     ,     ,      ! 1940     [ George Gamov ]         [ Ralph Alpher ] ,    [ Robert Herman ]   ,             .  
  
 ,       .     [ Sea of Radiation ]   , ,   [ Proton, Neutron, Electron ]     [ Subatomic Particles ]     [ Ylem ]       [ Primordial State of Matter ]   !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-9-hubble-telescope-launch.jpg?w=584 )   
  
        ,         [ Heavier Elements ]   ! , ,         [ Sea of Radiation ]         !  
  
      [ Cosmic Background Radiation ]     [ 3  K  (  )  ] . 1965      [ Bell Laboratories, Crawford Hill ]    ,        [ Radio Astronomers: Arno Penzias, Robert Wilson ]       ,      !   ‘      ‘   [ Cosmic Microwave Background Radiation ]    ,   1978    !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-10-hubble-space-telescope.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
  [ NASA ]    ,   1990           [ Orbiting Hubble Space Telescope ]    .   94.5      370  ,     .   ,           ,   !         [ Electromagnetic Spectrum ]  ,    [ Infrared, Ultraviolet Regions ]    ! ,     [ Wide Field, Faint Object Cameras ] ,  ,       [ High Resolution, Faint Object Spectrographs ] ,      [ High Speed Photometer ]      .  
  
     ,  ,          !        [ Black Hole ]      ,    1994      !           M87    !     , 1994       [ Shoemaker-Levi 9 ]      !  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/fig-8-edwin-hubble-stamp.jpg?w=750&h=485 )   
  
  
  
  ‘   ’   [ COBE Spacecraft, Cosmic Background Explorer ]  1989-1993       [ Cosmic Background Radiation Mapping ]   !       ‘     ‘         !      ,        !      ,          !

## 062 65      ,   .

! [ Asteroid impact on Earth -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/asteroid-impact-on-earth-1.jpg?w=560&h=424 )   
  
   ,    [ Chicxulub ]   ,       .    [ Cretaceous Era ]   ,               .  
    
**   [  ,     ] **  
  
  [ Asteroids ]    ,         ,   .      26    .    27  C  5  .    30  .       .  
    
**   [  **

! [ Image result for fossil dinosaurs ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/01/8dc00-stegosaurstegosaurusarmoureddinosaurdinosaursfossilskeletonjurassicplatesspikes.jpg )   
    
**65        **  
  
65        ,     ,        .       ,       [ Computer Simulation Models ]  ,               ,      .  
  
! [ Image result for darkness cold killed dinosaurs ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/static5.businessinsider.com/image/57f3a9d6dd08959f358b46c9-1190-625/dark-cold-days-may-have-been-what-actually-drove-the-dinosaurs-extinct.jpg )   
  
   .    .          ,    .   [  2017 ]        ,    [ Droplets ]        .          .         ,   ,   ,     [ Marine Ecosystems ]     .  
  
! [ Image result for fossil dinosaurs ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/736x/86/23/01/8623012235ac37e5ed4cd2d3e2220f53.jpg )   
  
     [ Sulphate Aerosols ]      .  3     ,     .      30        .      ,   ,   ,        [ Food Nutrients ]   .      [ Toxic Algae ]  ,     [ Like Ammonites ]  .     ,    [ Mammals ]    .       ,     .  
  
! [ Asteroid Impact-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/asteroid-impact-1.jpg?w=810&h=956 )   
  
  
  
   ** [ Chicxulub, Yucatan, Mexico ] **   ,        100    ** [ megatons TNT ] **      .        “   ** [ Heat Pulse ] **   , ,  ,       .    “   ”  ** [ Kinetic Energy**  ]    ,  ,      !  
    
**   [  ,    ] **

**65       **  
  
65    6          ,             .     [ Cosmic Impact ]           ,         .       ,       ,   [ Chicxulub, Yucatan, Mexico ] .  .    6   [ 10 . ]    .  12       .     : 100     [ trillion TNT Power ]    .         -    !        110   [ 180 . ]   
  
! [ Chicxulub Seismic Expt ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/chicxulub-seismic-expt.jpg?w=584 )   
  
65             .       ,     .  ,         .      300,000    180,000         .       :      “   ”   [ Shiva Crater ]   . 2013      [ Radiometric Dating ]    ,  11,000              .

** [ Asteroid 2012 DA14 is about half the width of a football field  ( 150 feet, or 45 meters ) , and will fly within 17,200 miles  ( 27,700 kilometers )  of our planet on Friday, Feb. 15, 2013, zooming closer to the planet than the ring of satellites in geosynchronous orbit. ] **  
  
! [ Path of Asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/path-of-asteroid.jpg?w=768&h=441 )   
  
        . 6                      ,  ,   .     ,      .      ,    [ New Ecosytem ]    .   ,   ,     .  
  
! [ Impact Evidence ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/impact-evidence.jpg?w=584 )     
  
       ,              .  
    
**    (    )   ( Major Tim Peake, ESA, European Space Agency ) **  
  
      .       .          ( Earth ’ s Geostationary Orbit )       .   ,     ( Robotic Impact Spacecraft )         ,       .        .     2025       ( ESA )       .  
    
**    ( ESA   ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/asteroids-1.jpg?w=750&h=776 )   
  
  ( Galaxy )             !  
    
** .**  
  
 “  (    )          ( Asteroid Belt )        .               .           . ”   
    
** ,    **  
  
 “          .  2   ( Asteroid 2 Pallas ) ,  10   ( Asteroid 10 )   ( Hygiea )     ,      . ”   
    
**   ( Dy Principal Investigator, NASA Dawn Mission**  
  
! [ Arizona Crater ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/arizona-crater.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**       **  
  
2013  15      [ Asteroid : 2012 DA14 ]      17,000            6   .       ** [ WISE  ( Wide-field Infrared Survey Explorer )  Spacecraft ] **   . 2011     [ NASA Orbiter ]     100   ( 300  )     20,500      .   100        .     [ 2012 DA14 ]     17,000         .   239,000     .     ,      22,200   [ 35,800 .. ]        [ Geosychronous Orbit ]   .  17,000       , ,         .     .     .  
  
! [ WISE Spacecraft ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/wise-spacecraft.jpg?w=591&h=654 ) ** ** **  [ 2012 DA14 ]     **  
  
  [ 2012 DA14 ]  2.7     , 2012  23          .   150  , 130,000    .       2013  15  .     :   5   [  8 .. ]     ,         .     17,200   [ 27,700 .. ]    .     17,180   [ 27,650 .. ]            .         33      .  16         .   , ,     “   ”    “  ”   [ Eclipse ]        .  
  
! [ Asteriods -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/asteriods-1.jpg?w=768&h=1118 )      [ Asteroid 2012 DA14 ]        500,000   .  1%         .       40           .    1200          . , , ,          240    .     17,000        .         ,     2.5    . 1908          [  100- 130   ]   750       .     “   ”   [ Tunguska Event ]    .      [ NEOO – NASA Near Earth Object Observation Program ]         .  
    
****
