! [ early-earth-spin-altered ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/early-earth-spin-altered.jpg?w=584&h=584 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
  ,     ,      5     .     "    "   [ The Giant Impact Theory ]  .         ,       .  
  
! [ Is Earth a Satellite to the Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/is-earth-a-satellite-to-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 -          [ Theoretical Computer Modelling ]   ,      ,    ,        .           [ Computer Simulations ]   ,  "   "   [ Big Whack ]     .     [   ]    [ Orbit ]    .     ,   **   [ Ecliptic ] **      [ 23.5  ]    .    ,     ,  ,          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/61/AxialTiltObliquity.png )   
  
  ,     [  1.5″  ]       ,         . ,      ,    .  ,     .     5   ,   24   .  
  
          .     [ 2012 ]       &    [ Cuk & Sara Stewart ]       .    ,  ,    2     .  
  
! [ Protoplanet Impact ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/protoplanet-impact.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “   ,   . ”  ****  
    
**  ,    ( 1865-1939 ) **  
  
             .  
    
**,     ( 1596-1650 ) **  
  
,      .  
    
**,    “   ”   ( 1608-1674 ) **  
  
     .  
    
**      ( 1564-1616 ) **  
  
! [ Fig 1 The Theia Planet Theory ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/fig-1-the-theia-planet-theory.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**        ?**  
  
    95             2014  2     “   ”   [ Nature Journal ]    .      , 4.470        [ Proto-Earth ]    ,           .      32   ,  .    4.567         .       [ Oldest Meteorites ]       .     150        ..  
  
! [ Moon birth Era ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/moon-birth-era.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    ,        .            .        ( 30 -200 )         .    ,          [ Radioactive Decay of unstable Elements ]     .  
  
2014  2         .   , ,     [ Planetary Scientists ]    “    ”   [ Computer Simulation Model ]   .        ,      “    ”   [ Planetesimals ]     .    , , , ,     [ Planetary Embryos ]   .            .          0.5%   .        95    ,             .  
  
! [ Earth Moon comparision ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/earth-moon-comparision1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
                ,  ,   ( Liquid, Solid & Vapour )      .              !              !           !   ,              !                      .  
  
    , ,   (  ) ,        ( Solid Matter )  .        .    , , ,        ?          .            .  
  
! [ Moon formation ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/moon-formation.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
    
**     **  
  
   ,    .         .   .    63 ,  62 ,  27 ,  13    .                .   “   ”    ( Co-Accretion )     .                   .    ( Capture Theory )    ,          .    ( Fission Theory )  :           ( Semi-fluid State )          .   “   ”   ( Condensation Theory )  .        “  ”   ( Nebula )      ,   .  
  
1969-1970         ( Apollo Moon Missions )             .       “    ”   ( Oxygen Isotope Materials )    .  ,        ( Same Region of the Solar System )     !           ( Volatile Elemets that melt at high Temperatures )    !           .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711d.jpg )   
  
          ( Earth ’ s Mantle )   .          .               ! -11         “  ”   ( Anorthosite )  .    ,     ( Sodium & Calcium Aluminiuam Silicates )   .  
    
**     **  
  
                :  
  
1\.      [  ( Moon ’ s Density 3.3 gram/c.c )   ( Earth ’ s Density 5.5 gram/c.c )  ]    ,     ( Iron Core )       .  
  
2\.        ( Volatile Substances )  .          ( Baking of Lunar Surface ) .  
  
3\.             ( Relative Abundane of Oxygen Isotopes ) .       ,   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802712.jpg )   
    
**     **  
  
              .      ,   “    ”   ( The Giant Impact Theory )     .  
    
**1\.    ( The Fission Theory ) **  
  
                    .             !           .   .     ( Earth ’ s Mantle )      .   ,          .           “    ”   ( Fossil Evidences )    ?         .        ( Baked Rock Substances )        .  
  
! [ The big impact ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/the-big-impact.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**2\.    ( The Capture Theory ) **  
  
   :       ,           .           ,        .                  .        ( Baked Rock Substances )        .  
    
**3\.    ( The Condensation Theory ) **  
  
     “  ”   ( Nebula )  ,                !           “    ”   ( Same Dense Iron Core )      .        ( Composition of Materials )   .        ( Baked Rock Substances )        .  
    
**4\.       ** ** ( The Giant Impact Theory or The Ejected Ring Theory ) **  
  
       .        ,      ,            .     .       .         !      ,          .          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802717.jpg )   
    
**     **  
  
1970             ( The Giant Impact Theory )  .       ,  “ -  ”   ( Off-center Impact )    .          ( Fast Inititial Spin )    ,          .             .     “    ”    . 1984        ,         .  
  
50                     !     ,        ( Robin Canup, Southwest Research Institute ) ,  ·      ( Erik Asphaug )      “    ”   ( Computer Simulation )   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802716.jpg )

## 074     !        

   ?    
      
     ?    
       
    ?    
     
, ,     
     
   ?    
 ,     
       
  ?    
      
    ?    
      
     
  

! [ comparison-of-our-sun-and-dwarf-star ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/comparison-of-our-sun-and-dwarf-star.jpg?w=584&h=390 )   
  
     30    .     [ Red Dwarf Star : AW10005x3s ]      [ Carina Stellar Association ]  .  40   .        ,     .  
    
**   [    ] **  
  
45            !         .           .  ,   ,         [ Benchmark System ]       .  
    
**   [ Carnegie Institution of Science ] **  
  
! [ dwarf-with-disk ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/dwarf-with-disk.jpg?w=584&h=359 )   
    
**  ,  **  
  
        .         .  .    **   [ Red Dwarf Stars ] .**         .  ,   **** 7.5%        [ Nuclear Fusion Process ]   ,    !  
  
! [ red-dwarf-star-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/red-dwarf-star-1.jpg?w=530&h=398 )   
  
      .            1   10,000  [ 1/10,000 ]  .    , 10%  **  [ Luminosity ]   .**     ** [ Radioactive Zone ] ** .       [ Convective Zone ]       .    ,     .         .         ,    .   ,  10%   , 1000     !     12     .  
  
! [ our-sun-and-red-dwarf-with-disk ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/our-sun-and-red-dwarf-with-disk.jpg?w=584&h=438 )   
    
**      **  
  
2016  24    ,      ,     [ Exoplanets ]    ,        [ Red-Dwarf Star ]  .    ,          [ A Primordial Ring of Gas & Dust ] .         .        [ Extrasolar Pllanets ]       .        [ AW10005x3s ]       [ Proxima Centauri ]    .          ‌-B   . 2014    30,000   ,  ,  2     [ Celestial Objects ]     .         [ The Astrophysical Journal Letters, October 24, 2016 ]  vawthuLLathu.  
  
! [ Oigins of Solar System ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/oigins-of-solar-system.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  [ Meteors ]        .         ,      [ Building Blocks ]  .            .              .  
    
**   [ Post doctorate, MIT Dept of Earth ] **  
  
        ,  ,   ,        . . . .    (  1990 )      !  
    
** ,        ( European Space Agency )   [  15, 2008 ] **  
  
! [ Violant beginning ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/violant-beginning.jpg?w=498&h=1008 )   
    
**     **  
  
          [ Asteroids ]      [ 2015  15 ]        .         .         [ Building Blocks ]        ;    [ Purdue ]     ,   ,  ”            [ Planetary Embryos ]    , ”  .  
  
! [ Hypergiant Star with disks of dust. ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/hypergiant-star-with-disks-of-dust.jpg?w=608&h=469 )   
  
       [ Meteorites ]  .  100        [ Beads like Chondrules ]   .       .      [ Computer Impact Model ]     .  
    
**  :**  
  
1\.    [ Asteroids ]       .       .  
  
2\.    [ chondrules ]    .     .       .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/solar-family.jpg?w=642&h=506 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
 ,   ( Astronomers & Geologists )             .        “     ”    ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )      4.6      .         3.9      !     ( Plate Tectonics )                !  
  
     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172c.jpg )   
    
**     ?**  
  
     ,        250   . 1755        ( Immanuel Kant )   ( 1724-1804 )       ( Nebular Hypothesis )  :       ,   ,       ! 1796         ( Pierre Simon Laplace )   ( 1749-1827 )      .           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172d.jpg )   
  
       :          ( Mass Gravity )     .             ( Gravitational Contraction )   ,  .  
  
      .         ( Molecular Gas Cloud )      100 AU  ( Astronomical Unit )   [ 1 AU = Average distance between Sun & Earth  ( 93   /150  .. )  ]  ,     2  3   .       ( Cloud ’ s Gravitational Collapse )        ( Supernova )          .         .       .        .      ( Gravitational Potential Energy )        ( Density )  .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172a.jpg )   
    
**     ?**  
  
     ( Conservation of Angular Momentum )         .    ,         ( Proto-Planetary Disk )        “  ”    ( Pancake )  .                  ?               !            .                ( Tropical Hurricanes )    !  
  
        ( Infant Proto-Star )      .   50                 .                .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/ulysses-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
              .        .       ,       ,   ( Silicates & Metals )  . ,           .  
  
       .          .       .       “   ”    ( Oort Cloud of Comets )  .       .      .     250       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172g.jpg )   
    
**      !**  
  
         ?        ? ,         ?               ?              ?        .         .        “   ”    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172h.jpg )   
    
**     !**  
  
 15, 2008      1990          “    ”   ( Ulysses Solar Probe )        2013      !        !                  !  125            ( Helio Centric Orbit )          .        250   2010   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/fig-1-the-thermonuclear-furnace1.jpg?w=556&h=490 )

** !  !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   **  
    
**   !**  
    
**   **  
    
**   **  
    
** ,  ,**  
    
** ,  ,**  
    
** ,  **  
    
** ,  ,**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   **  
    
** !  **  
    
** !  !**  
    
**   !**  
    
**   **  
    
**   !**

S. Jayabarathan  [ jayabarathans@gmail.com ]  October 25, 2016  [ R-1 ]   
  
## 076    -9     

      
       
      
 !    
      
      
  .    
   .    
  .    
     
  .    
  .    
     
  .    
 -9 ,      
 .    
   -9    
 ,    
  ?    
  ?

! [ planet-9 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/planet-9.jpg?w=584&h=557 )   
  
  -9    .          .  
    
**   [ Professor, Planetary Science Caltech Researcher ] **  
  
          -9    !          .  
    
**   [  -9      ] **  
  
! [ Earth's Planet -9 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/earths-planet-9.jpg?w=575&h=509 )   
    
**   -9   **  
  
2016      ,         -9.  ,  ,   .      ,   &  .  2016  18       [ American Astronomical Society Annual Meeting ] ,       -9      [ Tilt ]    .      -9      [ Wobble ]    .       .  
  
! [ New Planet 9 orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-9-orbit.jpg?w=584&h=346 )   
  
           .      6   .       !         .     .  -9   10  .   :       20  .  -9         30    .  -9   ,    [ Kuiper Belt ]       .  
  
! [ New Planet System 2016 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-system-2016.jpg?w=584&h=278 )   
  
 -9   "   "   [ Angular Momentum ] ,   ,         [ Outsized Impact ]  .  [ Angular Momentum = Mass of the Planet X Its Distance from the Sun ] .   -9            [ A Multi-billion-year Wobble ]   !   6        .  
  
    ,  -9       10  .      ,   ,    .      10,000 – 20,000    .       5000  .  
    
**  &    [ Caltech Researchers ]  **  
  
! [ New Planet System ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-system.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**      **  
  
         ,           .   -9         .     10,000 – 20,000     .   ,      ** [ Computer Simulation Model ] ** ,   :     [ California Institute of Technology –  ( Caltech )  ]     :    &  . ** [ Konstantin Batygin & Michael Brown ] **  
  
! [ Batygin & Brown ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/batygin-brown.jpg?w=584 )   
  
                  .   ,       .   2.8     .   -9   20    [ 5.6   ]      .  
  
! [ New planet Nine ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-nine.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    -9       . 2014          [ Chad Trujillo ]  &    [ Scott Sheppard ]      13    .           [ Kuiper Belt ]    .            .  
  
! [ Hypergiant Star with disks of dust. ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/hypergiant-star-with-disks-of-dust.jpg?w=584 )   
  
              .       30      .            .          ,    .   -9    10    ,      10,000 – 20,000    . 2003       [ Dwarf Planet Sedena ]     .   -9   .        -9    .  
  
! [ Oigins of Solar System ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/oigins-of-solar-system.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  [ Meteors ]         .         ,      [ Building Blocks ]  .            .              .  
    
**   [ Post doctorate, MIT Dept of Earth ] **  
  
        ,  ,   ,        . . . .    (  1990 )      !  
    
** ,        ( European Space Agency )   [  15, 2008 ] **  
  
! [ Meteorite impacts on Planets ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/meteorite-impacts-on-planets.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
          [ Asteroids ]      [ 2015  15 ]        .         .         [ Building Blocks ]        ;    [ Purdue ]     ,   ,  ”            [ Planetary Embryos ]    , ”  .  
  
! [ Violant beginning ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/violant-beginning.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
       [ Meteorites ]  .  100        [ Beads like Chondrules ]   .       .      [ Computer Impact Model ]     .  
    
**  :**  
  
1\.    [ Asteroids ]       .       .  
  
2\.    [ chondrules ]    .     .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/solar-family.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
 ,   ( Astronomers & Geologists )             .        “     ”    ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )      4.6      .         3.9      !     ( Plate Tectonics )                !  
  
     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172c.jpg )   
    
**     ?**  
  
     ,        250   . 1755        ( Immanuel Kant )   ( 1724-1804 )       ( Nebular Hypothesis )  :       ,   ,       ! 1796         ( Pierre Simon Laplace )   ( 1749-1827 )      .           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172d.jpg )   
  
       :          ( Mass Gravity )     .             ( Gravitational Contraction )   ,  .  
  
      .         ( Molecular Gas Cloud )      100 AU  ( Astronomical Unit )   [ 1 AU = Average distance between Sun & Earth  ( 93   /150  .. )  ]  ,     2  3   .       ( Cloud ’ s Gravitational Collapse )        ( Supernova )          .         .       .        .      ( Gravitational Potential Energy )        ( Density )  .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172a.jpg )   
    
**     ?**  
  
     ( Conservation of Angular Momentum )         .    ,         ( Proto-Planetary Disk )        “  ”    ( Pancake )  .                  ?               !            .                ( Tropical Hurricanes )    !  
  
        ( Infant Proto-Star )      .   50                 .                .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/ulysses-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
             .        .      ,       ,   ( Silicates & Metals )  . ,           .  
  
       .          .       .       “   ”    ( Oort Cloud of Comets )  .       .      .     250       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172g.jpg )   
    
**      !**  
  
         ?        ? ,         ?               ?              ?        .         .        “   ”    .  
    
**     !**  
  
 15, 2008      1990          “    ”   ( Ulysses Solar Probe )        2013      !        !                  !   125            ( Helio Centric Orbit )          .        250   2010   .  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
 [  ]

! [ hurricane-flooding ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding.jpg?w=584&h=370 )   
    
**    .**  
  
        ,      ,       .       ?      ,  ,      .  , ,   , 21  , ,         .            ?  
  
! [ seawater-surging ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/seawater-surging.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
  
2004        ,      , 2016         !  ,     ? 1851  2012      . 2016       ,  ,     ! 2016       "  "      [ , ,   ]      .    [ Category : 5 ]       ,  .  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
 ‘           .      [ The City Levee System ]         ,    ,   ,          .  ‘   
    
**    [ Ivor Van Heerden, Marine Scientist, Louisiana State University ] **  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-4.jpg?w=584&h=437 )   
  
 ‘    [ Lake Pontchartrain ]           .   , ,  ,    ,  , ,    .  ‘   
    
**   [ Walter Baumy, Manager, Army Corps of Engineers  ( Aug 31, 2005 )  ] **  
  
 ‘          .         .  ‘   
    
**   [ Louisiana Governor  ( Aug 31, 2005 )  ] **  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-1.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
    
**    **  
  
2300      ,         [ The Great Wall of China ]  1500    .                [ Levees ]  340   [ 560 . ]   ,           .      ,         .        [ Lake Pontchartrain ] ,     [ Lake Borgne ] ,     ,       !  ,      ,                .  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-2.jpg?w=584&h=388 )   
  
     1965  : 3-4  [ Category: 3-4 ]      [ Hurricane Betsy ]             .    ,      [ St. Charles, St. Bernard, Plaquemines Parishes ]    23    .   :  ( 4-5 )                     ,    .    ,   ,     .    : 3   ,              !       ,         !  
  
! [ hurricane-flooding-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-flooding-3.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
    
**    **  
  
    , 2005  30         ,  80%    ,   .    150       ,  200      !     100  ,      500          20     .        ,  ,  , ,     !  
  
! [ hurricane-matthew-mapping ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/hurricane-matthew-mapping.jpg?w=584&h=329 )   
    
**  **  
  
2003             [ Federal Fund ]    .     ,  ,       . 2004          20%     .  
  
1\. 2004          20%  [ 750   ]       .  
  
2\. 2005    20    ,  ,  3.9    .  
  
3\.    ,     .      ,  5      .  
  
! [ sheltered-people ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/sheltered-people.jpg?w=584&h=417 )   
    
**   **  
  
        .    CH-53    1360          .   !         .   !          22    ,             .         .      ,   
  
  .            ,       24  80    .  
  
! [ katrina-flooding ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/katrina-flooding.jpg?w=584&h=398 )   
    
**  **  
  
       6   .    20  ,      .     [ 907  . ]   ,      .         , , ,  ,         ,      .    [ 2.5 . ]           .      90 ..  
  
! [ new-orleans-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-1.jpg?w=584&h=767 )   
  
      1718            .          , ,      . 1965              ,      .  :  ( 4-5 )          .      ,        .      ,      .  
  
! [ new-orleans-city-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-city-1.jpg?w=584&h=417 )   
    
**    **  
  
    480,000    .           1.3     .   (   7, 2005 )    10,000      .  80%           60%     ,   ,     45,000      .              .  
  
! [ new-orleans-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/new-orleans-3.jpg?w=584&h=365 )   
  
         , 400,000  ,  ,       .   ,    ,     , , , , ,     ( 50-60 )        .   10    [ Army Corps of Engineers ]       [ Southeast Louisiana Urban Flood Control Unit  ( SELA )  ]   430    ,  ,  ,        .     ,     [ Infrastructure ]          .

**  **  
  
! [ earth-hottest-core ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/earth-hottest-core.jpg?w=467&h=683 )   
  
           &              .          .  
  
     ,       ,    ,   .  
    
**   [  Oak Ridge Researcher, USA ] **  
  
 ! [ earth-fuel-calculation ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/earth-fuel-calculation.jpg?w=565&h=916 )   
  
             .    .    ,     .  
    
**   [  ,    ] **  
  
! [ earth-core-cutaway-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/earth-core-cutaway-1.jpg?w=400&h=444 )   
    
**    **  
  
  , ,     [ Plate Tectonics ]  ,       [ Fuel ]  .        .       [ Primordial Heat Energy ] ,        .       ,     /    .

2016      ,     2025           .   2016   "  "   [ Nature Journal ]    .    :  
  
  1.    .  
  2. ,    .  
  3.    , .  
    
**      ?**  
  
2025        ,      [ Tiniest Subatomic Particles like Geo-neutrinos ]     .     [ Antineutrino Particles ]     , , ,         .           [ Radioactive Decay ]  .  
  
! [ canadian-sno-facility ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/canadian-sno-facility.jpg?w=505&h=955 )   
  
     ,         [ Light Flashes ]    .       &        .    ,          .     -3    /     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dvrmQanjStF8oP4ZPa6UbZIL9RWQZ84qApAQfTKmw0xdRZnRYXu59A50BiyxZiyoH6g4woP3BzVqzzg5yUovr3eMBMgTonEjZLPywyyHc5sUtYRKdO_roXv3A1Jep8dWiR9z0Nc=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1-earthquakes-volcanoes.jpg )   
  
     .        16   .    [ KamLAND ] ,   [ Borexino ] ,   [ SNO+ Detector ] ,   [ JUNO ]  &   [ Neutrino Dtector ]     . 2022       536  .           .   4      ,   4.5     ,   ,  2     !

 “           ?        5          .    ‘    ’   ( Geo-Reactor )   . ”   
  
 “ ,      ,        .      . ”   
    
**  Ph.D.,  ( Marvin Herndon, President Transdyne Corpn, San Diego, California ) **  
  
 “     ( Plume )        ( Boon to Science ) . ”   
    
**   ( Brian Handwerk, National Geographic News ) **

**           
**  
  
                 !     .       .     ‘   ’   ( Tom Chalko, inspired by Desmarquet ’ s Report )        ( Earth ’ s Solid Inner Core )       2000  .        [ + ]        .           .       ( Eccentric )  .                ,    !

                  !           ( Overheating of the Earth ’ s Core )            !   ,                  ‘   ’    ( Crystallization )   !         ( Danger of Over-heating )       !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ZFoJySz7XJ_XpJqZgxPnXuLne1VcQ9p9-fkcO_Jy1V0tvpm8A_NQIQ62TQ2kESMtd4i1k1iJm5zHFWfRRXV2NdiDczLiCWUL24NcVo3EHEuhqR-b7eH1TJ7cckj5iu4Hto69O5Ws=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1a-iceland-volcano-burts.jpg )   
  
,             ! 2000 – 2003       8    !               !         !    5 ..  ( 3  )    ,      ( Less Dense & Less Salty )         !           ?  .               !

** ,       
**  
  
     , ,     . 1973       ( USGS -US Geological Survey )  7.0      6    .             5     !    :              ( 0.85 MegaWatt per Sq km )   .     .         ( Sun Spots )  2012    . 2000 -2003          8   ?               !       .                 .

         ,        !               .         ,  “   ”   ( Heat-Sink )         !               !  
    
**      **  
  
    ( Baby Earth )           .          ( Primordial Disc )         !      ( Densest Metals )    ,         . ,      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/matxUpI1dlJp-pCOgrknH6PbcZRlRHfPW2iOozlsBZzHo4qGJ8gecNpnQ8905_RJ7k3PHEbdrEx8XF-IHjTWBgHn5sMFQ7u3NxIxRHTRVYfyMK7a-TNv57ctKYT4vF6ONFNFUveS=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1d-earths-core-chemistry.jpg )   
  
    ( Density )  : 19  / ..  ( 19 gram per cubic cm ) .    1.6   .   : 11.7  / ..   : 19.7  / ..               .  
  
          :  -235,  -233,  -239.  238     ,  -238  -239  .   -232    ,  -232  -233  .

 -235,  -233,  -239               .     -238    -235 .     -235    ,     .     -235   , , 3   .        .        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ajo3kg9J4cfc7HJUScVluVLJ-1a31SsBGRgI6u7PNH13ivCvJr8i_hG9vnTEy6HBjfrx5NhXaMr5Hoz8zGmnLCrT6uO47GXIhJu8n0-P_3Aimy_jXZtj47_GOy2iY9i-e43KeQM60TE=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-2-heavy-metals-in-the-core.jpg )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/cE0oBMzFobrYu_QmJunyIeI0bG4awx3TsnywqkVcVzI6YGNvHUJLGZAQYv7QtYeVJTmMCQkIXVC6CyatkgifhojpGnCdhXcsgEsRhpfFqO0ByC-9BJQv4a7W12tXvIN37Gykpa3iEGL4jg=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-5-sodium-cooled-fast-reactor.jpg )   
  
   -238      -239   .     -232    .  -233  .         ( Fast Breeder Reactor )   ,      .             .     .              .                     1993           !  
  
! [ earth-magnetic-field ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/earth-magnetic-field.jpg?w=581&h=487 )   
    
**           
**  
  
    ,       .              ·         ( Natural Nuclear Fission Geo-Reactor )          .        ,          ( Fast Breeder Reactor ) .      ( Moderator )  .    ,     ( Georeactor )   .   .         .             .        .     -235        !     1993         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/2NYPsbY3Ls128-a5mD3LibwUV9FnVHSmT4kaVrd1iomPlCAmZf5Exyhq0etEF8VgNLEYbNnpMAvoybuKtlHxRECVp4iQMbFl8Bl76fIxKJ9AVJL4JCR0aptaUtIv1Q=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/inner-core-of-earth1.jpg )   
  
     !        !         1000    .        ( Geomagnetism )       .         .               !           ,               .                !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/3jsCYKrCoykMOoQGrL5Ya59zDS2XbG3DliksmgtNtllvxd1NoZXEbl3fbIucQkZizKgUagXv2P_Olx3ywdUhoWl-IitT7vK1vwjYnlio1VWmqIJWWM5fw4EEI_cF=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/marvins-geo-reactor.jpg )   
  
4.5            -235,  -238,     -239    5   ( 10 .. )             .     4    ( 4000   ) ,  ( 4   )   [ 4 terawatts  ( 4X10^12 watts )  ]       .        ,  ,          !

## 079 2030          .

  !    
      
  

 

! [ esa-moon-village-4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/esa-moon-village-4.jpg?w=584&h=389 )   
  
   .    ;  ,  ,       .     [ Moon Village ]        ,      .  
  
  :            .        ,          .  
    
**   [ Jan Worner, Director, European Space Agency  ( ESA )  ] **  
  
! [ esa-moon-village-5 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/esa-moon-village-5.jpg?w=584&h=402 )   
  
      ?        .    .    .   .    :     .  
  
   ,      ,   ,       .           .    .    ,     ,     .      .      .  
    
**   [ Professor, Planetary Science, University of London ] **  
  
! [ esa-moon-village-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/esa-moon-village-3.jpg?w=584&h=365 )   
  
       ,   . 1960-1973      ,        ;    .   ,        .  
    
**   [ Lunar Scientist, Manchester University ] **  
    
**       **  
  
         [ Jan Worner ] , 150       ,    ,      ,         .  
  
! [ esa-moon-village-6 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/esa-moon-village-6.jpg?w=584&h=329 )   
  
''  , ,    ,      [ Moon Village ]   .  "      ,    ,     .  
  
         [ Moon Habitats ]        [ Robots ]     .       , ,          .      .  
  
! [ Moon Russian Colony ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/moon-russian-colony.jpg?w=584 )   
  
2030         .  ,      .       ,    ,   ,       ,       .  
    
** ,    .  [  11, 2014 ] **  
  
          [ Moon Colony ] .               [ Spaceport ]    .     ,       .          .  
    
**   [ Chief Scientist, Institute of Space Policy ] **  
  
! [ Moon Colony Extension ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/moon-colony-extension.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**Moon Research Colony**  
  
                  .     ,   [ Asteroids ]           .  
    
**   [ Russian Academy of Cosmonautics Member ] **  
    
**    **  
  
1957                   . 1638        “   ,     ”   [ A Discourse Concerning A New World & Another Planet ]    “       ”   .      [ 1857 – 1935 ]       .  
  
! [ Moon Camp ground ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/moon-camp-ground.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
         , 1950    ,  ,  ,    . 1954        [ Arthur C. Clarke ]         .        .      [ Igloo Type Models ]  .     ,  ,      .    1959           . 1961              , 1969     .  
  
! [ Moon Colony Model -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/moon-colony-model-1.jpg?w=487&h=369 )   
  
! [ Moon Control centre ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/moon-control-centre.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  
  
          . 1972        . 2004   , ,  2020     , 2024      .      [ European Space Agency ]  2025        . ,   2030      .  
  
 “          .           .        ( Useable Resources Like Water & Hydrogen )         . ”   
    
**   ( Todd May, Manager Lunar Presursor Robotic Program ) **  
  
! [ Fig 1 Lunar Reconaissancs Mission ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1-lunar-reconaissancs-mission.jpg?w=530&h=893 )   
  
  
  
 “       ( LRO -Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter & LCROSS -Lunar Crater Observation & Sensing Satellite )            .       ( Images ) ,     ( Lunar Landscapes )     .        .          .    
**    
   ( Douglas Cooke, Associate Administrator of NASA ’ s Exploration Systems ) **  
  
 “      ( LRO )     .              . ”   
    
**   ( Craig Tooley, LRO Project Manager at NASA ) **  
  
  
    
**! [ Fig 1A Atlas Rocket Launch ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1a-atlas-rocket-launch1.jpg?w=518&h=875 ) ** “      “  ”    ( LCROSS )       (  2009 )  ,              . ”   
    
**   ( Daniel Andrews LCROSS Project Manager NASA ) **  
  
 “       [ Fossils ]    ,     !         .       . ”   
    
** ,     [ Guillermo Gonzalez, Iowa State University ] **  
    
**    **  
  
2009   17        ( Cape Canaveral )        -5      .    : 2020               ,    ,       .     ( LRO -Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter & LCROSS -Lunar Crater Observation & Sensing Satellite )     .      45    .     LRO     50 .  ( 30  )     .      ( Centaur Rocket )    LCROSS     (  2009 )              .           583    ( 2009   )  !  
  
! [ Fig 1B Second Stage Centaur Rocket ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1b-second-stage-centaur-rocket1.jpg?w=544&h=900 )   
  
   LRO         .      2   30   ( 50 . )    .          ,         ;          .            50,000  .       ,           .  
    
**   ,   **  
  
1969          1972     12     . 1959   2009       ( , ,  , , ,  )    17  .           !        .           ! 2020              .  
  
! [ Fig 1E NASA Lunar Satellite ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1e-nasa-lunar-satellite.jpg?w=450&h=600 )   
  
LRO      50      .  “ LRO        ( High Resolution Maps )        ”   LRO      ( Richard Vondrak )  .          ,    ,          . LRO   ( 50 .. )  30            .  
    
**LCROSS    **  
  
LRO         .    LCROSS       . LCROSS     .  41         ( Second Stage Centaur Rocket ) .         ( Shepherding Spacecraft ) . 2009         .     4        .             .  
  
! [ Fig 2 LCROSS to Impact on Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-2-lcross-to-impact-on-moon.jpg?w=538&h=696 )   
  
       54,000   ( 87,000 .. )    .        4958   ( 2249 . )    5216   ( 2366 . )   .   1369   ( 621 . )   1909   ( 866 . )   .     66  , 13   ( 20  , 4   )   .       : 46   6    ( 14  , 2   )  .           LRO ,         .  
    
**      **  
  
LRO       :  
  
1\.  ( CRATER )   ( Cosmic Ray Telescope for the Effcts of Radiation )  :     .  
  
             .              .        .  
  
2\.  ( DLRE )   ( Diviner Lunar Radiometer Experiment )  :      
  
  
  
! [ Fig 6 LRO Instruments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-6-lro-instruments.jpg?w=450&h=360 )   
  
  
  
  ,      .  
  
      ( Ice Deposits )    ,   .      ( Lunar Landing Module )     .  
  
3\.  ( LAMP )   ( Lyman Alpha Mapping Project )   ·  .  
  
    ( In the Far Ultraviolet Spectrum )         .   ,    ( Ice & Frost )   .        ,     .  
  
4\.  ( LEND )   ( Lunar Exploration Neutron Detector )  :     .  
  
     .        .        .  
  
5\.  ( LOLA )   ( Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter )  :       ( Landing Site Slopes )   .  
  
   .       .         .  
  
6\.  ( LROC )   ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter Cameras )  :      .  
  
   -       ( Two Narrow-angle High Resolution Cameras )   .. 100      .  ( One Wide-anglle Camera )   
  
7\.  ( Mini-RF )   ( Miniature Radio Frequency )   ( Technology Demonstration )      .  
  
    .            .  
  
! [ Fig 3 LRO & LCROSS Together ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-3-lro-lcross-together.jpg?w=450&h=431 )   
    
**       ?**  
  
     40           2020              !            “     ”   ( International Space Station )   .            .           .  2010     “   ”   ( Space Shuttles )       ..  
  
                .           .          .       “    ”     .  
  
  
  
! [ Fig 4 LRO & LCROSS in Lunar Orbits ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-4-lro-lcross-in-lunar-orbits.jpg?w=450&h=1128 )   
    
**   !**  
  
            .    ,  !            .      ,      .           .          .          .      .      .   ,     .      ,   2020         .         .     ,        .  
  
! [ Fig 5 Future Plan to the Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-5-future-plan-to-the-moon.jpg?w=450&h=1325 )   
  
  
    
**21        !**  
  
1969                     . 240,000           .   20         21           ?               ?          ,         . , ,   , , ,         ,              !

## 080     :         

**. , B.E.  ( Hons ) , P.Eng  ( Nuclear ) , **  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
      
     
   .    
      
     
  .    
     
  ,    
       
     
      
  !    
       
     
   !    
     
     
    
    
  !    
  
