       
       
       
    
   !  
  
++++++++++++++++++  
  
! [ New Horizon Spaceship -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/new-horizon-spaceship-1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 2015             .    .             .  
  
                        .     ,        .  
    
**   [     ] **  
  
! [ Pluto Surface ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/pluto-surface.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    [ Cryovolcanoes ]  10  ,    .       .       .        ,  , ,     .  
    
**   [ New Horizon Spaceship Researcher, NASA Ames Center**  
  
  !         [ Wobbling ]  .      !     .       ? ,           .          .  
    
**   [ Investigator, SETI Institute in Mountain View, California ] **  
  
! [ pluto-volcanoes-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/pluto-volcanoes-1.jpg?w=530&h=526 )   
    
**Pluto Mountains with Enormous Volcanoes.**  
  
          [       ]  .          .          .  
  
        .           .            .        .  
    
**   [ Astrophysicist, John Hopkins University, Applied Physics Lab ] **  
  
! [ pluto-emitting-x-rays ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/pluto-emitting-x-rays.jpg?w=503&h=646 )   
    
**       **  
  
1930          [ Clyde Tombaugh ]   .    9     ,  2006      [ International Astronomical Union  ( IAU )  ]     [ Dwarf Planet ]   , 9    .        [ Flyby Power ]        [  5, 2016 ] ,   ,       .  
  
2006  19    9.5 ,  31,000  ,     ,     7750         [ 2016  ]        .      4.5   .       5.5   .      ,           .  
  
! [ Pluto and its moons -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/pluto-and-its-moons-1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
+++++++++++++++++++  
  
   .          [ Habitats ]     .            .    ,         [ Data ] .     **   [ Tectonic Features ] **  .     **     [ Thermal Evolution Model ] **   **.**          .  
    
**   [  ,    ] **  
  
! [ Pluto with methane ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/pluto-with-methane.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**      **  
  
2015  15         ,         [ Liquid Ocean around / under Icy Crust ]      .   ,        .               [ Thermal Evolution Model ] .       ,    .        .      .       ,  [ Icy I & Icy II ]  , ,  .  ,  .  
  
! [ Pluto core ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/pluto-core.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 ..      ** [ Giant Tectonic Features ] **       .          [ Radioactive Elements ]   .      300 ..  [ 180  ]     .  
  
   ,     ,   50     .      .       .          ,      .  
    
**   [    ] **  
  
! [ Pluto Like Moons ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/pluto-like-moons.jpg?w=584&h=510 )   
  
  
  
         [ Astrobiological Potential ]    .     ,          .           [ New Revelation ] .  
    
**   [      ] **  
    
**        .**  
  
2015  14          3           7750   [  –   ]           .  50       ,     . 2006         .  
  
! [ Pluto image -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/pluto-image-1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
       ,     30,000         . 15           ,       [ Kuiper Belt ]    . 700             [ Cosmic Debris ]       .  
    
**     **  
  
      1472     .        .       [ Impact Craters ]     [ Plateaus ]     .     : ** [ -230  C ] .**  ****           .     11,000   [ 3400  ]        .     4.5   ,    100       .  
  
! [ Pluto Core & atmosphere ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/pluto-core-atmosphere.jpg?w=584&h=484 )   
    
** , **  
  
     ,       .       [ , , ,  &  ] .     [ Numerical Simulations ]              !    .      !      .   2015    !  
    
**   [ Alan Stern, Principal Investigator, New Horizon Mission to Pluto ] **  
  
! [ Pluto & Charon Cores ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/pluto-charon-cores.jpg?w=584 )   
  
           !       ,     .        5000       [ Odometer ]  .    -  .      ,  ,   [ Icy Geysers, Craters, Clouds ]   .  
    
**   [ Alan Stern, Principal Investigator, New Horizon Mission to Pluto ] **  
  
! [ Pluto Satellites ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/pluto-satellites.jpg?w=530&h=424 )   
    
**    **  
  
        :          [ Radioactive Potassium Quantity ]   [ 75 parts per billion ] .        [ -230  C ] .    [ Density ]   40%  .     ,     [ Mixure of Nitrogen & Water ]     .  
    
**  &    [    ] **  
  
 “             .         2015         .                      !      ,   , ,      . ”   
    
** ,    ,  , . ..**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1b-new-horizon-orbital-path1.jpg?w=530&h=775 )   
    
**        ?**  
  
2006      “   ”    [  15, 2015 ]         .       ,  3   ,  2015         .  2015  15  6000   [ 10,000 . ]       .  
  
    ( -230  C )   ,                .           [ 75 ppb ]   [ parts per billion ]    .  
  
! [ Eris and Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/12/eris-and-moon.jpg?w=584&h=329 )   
  
      .       [ Voyager 1 & 2 Spaceships ]      .      /     .         [ Geysers ]      .     [ Charon, Styx, Nix, Kerberos & Hydra ]     .        . ,      ,         ! 2015-2016             .  2020    ,     ,         .  
  
! [ New Horizon Travel Path ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/new-horizon-travel-path.jpg?w=504&h=774 )   
  
         .            .           .             .   “       ”   ( Certification of Hibernation Cruise Science ) .              . ”   
    
**   ( Alan Stern, New Horizons Principal Investigator ) **  
  
 “      (  **SDC** – Student Dust Counter )       .          .      ,    . ”   
    
**   ( James Szalay, University of Colorado Graduate Student & SDC Instrument Leader  ) **  
    
****  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1-first-mission-to-pluto-beyond.jpg?w=530&h=798 )   
  
 “         30  ,      1 & 2  ( Voyager 1 & 2 )   ,         . ”   
  
 “      ( Solar Wind Plasma )   ,    ( Solar Flares ) ,     ( Coronal Mass Ejections )        .                 . ”   
    
** **  ( New Horizon PEPSSI Instrument Scientist, Johns Hopkins University, Md )   
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1c-purpose-of-the-launch.jpg?w=529&h=791 ) **  
  
 “                .     .              . ”   
    
** ,    ,   , **  
    
**         **  
  
2006               2015  14            .       ( 22.65 AU )   ( 1 AU = One Earth Distance from Sun ]   [ One AU = 150 million Kms or 90 millian miles ]         8.76 AU  .  
  
             “   ”   [ Hybernation  ]   .          .     2013    .          .  
  
       [ Heliosphere ]  ,          .                 .        .         ( Thrusters )     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-11-relative-sizes-of-solar-planets.jpg?w=528&h=1065 )   
  
         [  ( SDC )  Student Dust Counter in Heliosphere ]      .  SDC       .          .       SDC                .             .  
  
   [ SWAP -Solar Wind Around Pluto & PEPSSI – Pluto Energetic Particle Spectrometer Science Investigation ]  1970     10 & 11,  1 & 2   , .           .  500 ..   (  1    )       . 2012     80  SDC, SWAP & PEPSSI         .  
  
! [ New Horizon Spaceship ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/new-horizon-spaceship.jpg?w=753&h=1103 )   
    
**     **  
  
1977      -1 & -2    2006  19       ( New Horizon Spaceship )       ,        . 2007  28           ( Jupiter Flyby Swing )       .          ( Satellite Lo )          .          13  .        2015  14      .             ( Kuiper Belt )   .  
  
! [ Current Location ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/current-location.jpg?w=510&h=604 )   
  
2006  19           -5  ,    ,  48B     .         .            ,       .     ‘ -   ’   ( Earth -Solar Escape Trajectory ) . .     10    (  36,370   )   ( 16.3 ./ )   (  58,500 .  )    .              ( Charon )    .       ( Lo )        .    2008  8           .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1a-new-horizon-spaceship-instruments1.jpg?w=529&h=1066 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
    15   ( 2001–2016 )     650  .   , ,  ,  ,  ,  , ,   .          .      478 .  ( 1054  ) .           .       ( Dwarf Planet )         ( International Astronomical Union )  .      ,   ,     .  
  
 2011     .   2014     . 2015   ,        . 2015   14        5      .   100,000        ( Icy Dwarf Worlds )            ( Kuiper Belt Globe )    !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/07/solar-planets-relative-distances.jpg?w=812&h=1257 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
           .     ,     .            ,      3  .      .         13   (  28, 2007 )        .  15   (  8, 2008 )      .  
  
       ,       .   2003       2007     .     ‘   ’   ( Jupiter ’ s Red Spot )       ( Supersonic Winds )        . 2005         ( White Oval Cloud )  .      .            ( Clumps of Fine Dust Particles )   .  
  
! [ Project Details ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/project-details.jpg?w=873 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
         “  ”   ( Jupiter Moon Lo )       .       ‘    ’   ( LORRI – Long Range Reconnaissance Imager )       ( Tvashtar Volcano )      .     200   ( 320 . )    .     , 20    .  
  
          .               .       .       ,     ( Jupiter ’ s Orbital Energy )        .        ( Gravitational Slingshot )      9000   ( 150000 ./ )   !                !               !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-3-oort-cloud-comets.jpg?w=540 )

## 081      [ Mantle ]      

** [  14, 2016 ] **  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
++++++++++++++  
  
      
  !    
       
  !    
       
       
  !    
       
   “  ”     
     
      
   !    
      
     
      
   !    
      
     
   !    
       
     
  !

! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802715.jpg )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711b.jpg )   
  
      [ Isotopic Study ]      [ High Energy Model ]   .  2016  12     [ Online Edition ]   .   ,            .  
  
   [ Giant Impact Hypothesis ]    .      ,         !     .     .  
    
**   [  ,  ,    ] **  
  
! [ Fig 5 Relative Size of Earth & Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-5-relative-size-of-earth-moon.jpg?w=561&h=504 )   
  
 “     [ Stereo Space Probes ]             ( Remnants of an Ancient Planet )        !             !      "   ( Theia )  "  .    .     .    4.5           . ”   
    
**   ( NASA Stereo Space Probes Project Scientist )   (  14, 2009 )     
**    
 “       ( Bulk Silicate )         ( Isotopic Composition )  .        “   ”   ( Isotopic Equalibration )         .  
    
**    ( Nature Science Journal ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711d.jpg )   
    
**       [ Mantle ]    .**  
  
2016  -                . -      ,       [ Analytical Techniques ]      .  2015       [ Isotopes ]    10       .   ?           [ Kun Wang, Geochemist ]  &    [ Stein Jacobson ] , ,  ,    ] .  
  
 &   ,       [ Isotopic Differences of Rocky Elements ]   ,        .       [ Low Energy Impact ]   ,     [ Silicate Atmosphere ]   .      ,  ,    ,     [ Super Fluid State ]    .  
  
! [ Fig 4 STEREO Twin Probes Looking at the Sun ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-4-stereo-twin-probes-looking-at-the-sun.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1970         :         ,  .      . 2001      ,        . 1970              [ Three Stable Isotopes of Oxygen ]    .       [ Numerical Simulations of Impact ]   60% -80%  ,      .  
  
2015        ,     [ Vaporized Mantle of Proto-Earth ]  ,       .    [ Nature Publication ]     ,         [ Three Isotopes of Potasium ]   .     [ -39 & -41 ]     .  
  
! [ Fig 3 STEREO Probe's Tools ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-3-stereo-probes-tools.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
1969-1970         ( Apollo Moon Missions )             .       “    ”   ( Oxygen Isotope Materials )    .  ,        ( Same Region of the Solar System )     !           ( Volatile Elemets that melt at high Temperatures )    !           .  
  
! [ Fig 1 The Theia Planet Theory ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1-the-theia-planet-theory.jpg?w=554&h=542 )   
  
          ( Earth ’ s Mantle )   .          .               ! -11         “  ”   ( Anorthosite )  .    ,     ( Sodium & Calcium Aluminiuam Silicates )   .  
    
**! [ Fig 1E NASA's STEREO Probes ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1e-nasas-stereo-probes.jpg?w=584 ) **  
    
**     **  
  
4.5                     “    ”   ( The Giant Impact Hypothesis )     !       “  ”   ( Theia )   .    :         ,  .    ?       .        ( Relatively Small Iron Core )  .  .       .     :           ( Iron Oxide or Siderophilic Elements )   ( Siderophile Elements : Any element that has a weak affinity for oxygen and sulfur and that is readily soluble in molten iron. Siderophile elements include iron itself, nickel, cobalt, platinum, gold, tin, and tantalum. )      ( Ratio of Volatile Elemets )   ?           ( Magma Ocean )         !  
  
! [ Fig 1A Planet Theia's Collision ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1a-planet-theias-collision2.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
1898       ( George Howard Darwin )   (       )          .            ( Centrifugal Force )          .                  .     ,       .               ! 1946          ( Reginald Aldworth Daly )     ,             .      1975     ,      .          .  
  
! [ Fig 1B The Birth of the Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1b-the-birth-of-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
     .     .      . 4.5           .     ,     .      .         ( Lagrangian Points L4 or L5 Relative to Earth )         .       60    60      .             !             !  
  
! [ Fig 1C Earth & Moon Axes Tilts ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1c-earth-moon-axes-tilts.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   –   ,   .      ,       !    ( Mantle )            !           .    ( Computer Simulations )    2%              .         .  
  
! [ Fig 1D Lagrangian Points ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1d-lagrangian-points.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    “   ”   ( Angular Momentum )    ( Mass )      .    ,         5    !         !       ,        .    ,         100          !  
    
**   **  
  
     ( NASA ’ s Space Weather Monitoring Spacecraft STEREO )        2006   25       .         ( NASA ’ s Solar Terrestrial Probes )  .           ( 3D Probing )      ( Anatomy of Solar Storms )    .    ( Sun Spots )   !     .           ( Lagrangian Point Zones L4 & L5 )          2%    !              !

! [ Fig 2 The Giant Impact Theory ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-2-the-giant-impact-theory.jpg?w=572&h=664 )   
  
       ( Asteroids )       ( Gravitaional Parking Lots )   .                    .                  ( Oxygen Isotope Compositions )    .

17 Earth-Moon Dynamics Page – Would We have Had Evolution Without the Moon ? By : Dan Green B.Sc.  ( Hons ) .    
18 Tides on Earth – The Recession of the Moon By : Tim Thompson  ( Matt Rosenberghttp://geography.about.com/ )     
19 Scientific American – Without the Moon, Would There Be Life on Earth ? By : Bruce Dorminey  ( April 21, 2009 )     
20 Daily Galaxy -The Theia Hypothesis – New Evidence Emerges that Earth & the Moon Were Once the Same  [ July 5, 2008 ]     
21 NASA Hunts for Remnants of an Ancient Planet  ( Theia )  Near Earth  ( April 11, 2009 )     
22 Science Illustrated : The Lukiest Collision -New Findings The Moon ’ s Explosive Origins  ( Nov-Dec 2008 ]     
23 NASA Probes Seeks Remnants of Lost Theia Planet By : Lewis Page  ( Apr 14, 2009 )     
24 NASA Report -NASA ’ s STEREO Spacecraft Reveals Anatomy of Solar Storms By : Laura Layton Heliophysics News Team  ( April 14, 2009 )     
25\. Giant Impacy Hypothesis From Wikipedia  ( April 29, 2009 )

## 082    [ Asteroid ]         .

      
   !    
      
     
    
  !    
      
      
  !    
      
     
  !    
      
      
      
  !    
  

! [ nasa-probe-instruments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-probe-instruments.jpg?w=584&h=378 )   
  
    [ Bennu ]       4.5        .             .  
    
**   [      ] **  
  
       [ Asteroid ]      .  ,  ,   ,            .     ,     .  
    
**    [   ,    ] **  
  
! [ nasa-rocket-launching ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-rocket-launching.jpg?w=498&h=995 )   
    
**        .**  
  
2016  9              . 800         "  "   [ ASTEROID BENNU ]    '-'  [ OSIRIS-REx ]          .     500,000        .    . ,      ,    .   ,      .  
  
! [ nasas-target-asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasas-target-asteroid.jpg?w=514&h=618 )   
  
    2018  .     , 2020        .     300   [ 10  ]      .    ,      .   ,   ,  .    4% , 0.5%  .        .  
  
! [ asteroid-bennu ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/asteroid-bennu.jpg?w=500&h=484 )   
  
   "   "   [ Orbital Nudges ]      [ Yarkovsky Effect ]   .            .             .   2010        [ JAXA ]    "  "     ,    ,    . 2014    -2   "  "   [ RYUGU ]  ,    "  "   [ MASCOT ]     2020   .  
  
! [ nasa-selection-of-asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/nasa-selection-of-asteroid.jpg?w=440&h=670 )   
  
  
  
+++++++++++++  
    
**    **  
  
 “     ( Asteroid Belt )                   .         .          . ”   
    
**   ( NASA Administrator )     
**  
  
 “ 2025            .     “  ”    ( Dawn Space Probe )     . ”   
    
**  **  
  
  
  
! [ Fig 8 Japan Space Probe to Asteroid ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/07/fig-8-japan-space-probe-to-asteroid.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “                .            . ”   
    
**  ,    ( University of California, LA ) **  
  
 “        ( Metal Core )         .             .  
  
     .   20      . ”   
    
**  ,    ( UCLA ) **  
  
 “ ,           .        ( Inner Planets )     .     ( Outer Planets )    . ”   
    
**  ,    ( UCLA ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/asteroid-belt.jpg?w=512&h=417 )   
  
  
    
**      ** **.**  
  
     ,         “  ”   [ Asteroid Ceres ]     [ 2012  ]   . 2011  15              .           , 2012            .  
  
2007  7       2008  ,           2011  15         .     ,     .    93    [ 150 .. ]     .    [ One Astronomical Unit  ( 1 AU )  ]    .                ,   .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1-space-probe-dawn.jpg?w=530&h=639 )   
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/dawn-2012-may.jpg?w=795&h=729 )   
  
      ,        :    [ Ion Propulsion System ] .     16,300 .   7.3 ..   [ 2012  ]     166    [ 267  .. ]    .     37    [ 59  .. ]     .  
    
**      .**  
  
 2007               , 2011  17        ( Asteroid Belt )           ( Asteroid Vesta )    .                  .                     .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/dawn-orbital-path.jpg?w=810&h=509 )   
  
  
  
    530 ..  ( 300  )    .      .                    ( Asteroid Ceres )  2015   . 2015             3    .  
  
2007  27           -2   . 10 .           2011    , 2015       2015        3   ( 5  . )       .       475  .          ‘    ’   ( Flyby Gravity Force )        .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/asteroids-ceres-vesta.jpg?w=530&h=572 )   
  
   1807    ,         ,    326   ( 525 . ) .             .   117    ( 188  .. )          !            ,        ( Solar Electric Ion Engine )   .   6200        .       120   ( 200 . )        9      
  
                . ,       . , , , ,            .!        ,         .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/cover-image-6.jpg?w=400&h=397 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-3-dawn-launch.jpg?w=509&h=738 )   
  
      .        .    580   ( 930 . ) .           ( Dwarf Planet )     .   40 – 80   ( 60 – 120 . )           ( Sweet Water Storage )      .  
    
**     ?**  
  
  9   ,     5   .      10 .      ( Solar Electric Ion Engine )   .            ( Push by Impulse )   .       ( Xenon Ions )    .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1b-dawns-objective.jpg?w=520&h=765 )   
  
                .  
    
**    :**  
  
1\. ,   ,  ,  ,  .  
  
2\.   , ,  ,  .  
  
3\.  ,  .  
  
4\.         .  
  
  , ,     . 2011      120       .  ,  ,   ,  ,    .  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/11/ion-engine-principle.jpg?w=530&h=1071 )   
  
  
    
** (  ) **

  !   !    
   ! –     
    !    
   !  
    
***********  
  
        ,        .        .

   ,    
      
     
 !    
     
    
       
     
  !    
  ,    
     
     
  !    
     
  ,    
      
     
  !    
      
     
       
  !

! [ Comet Outbursts -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-outbursts-1.jpg?w=584&h=621 )   
  
   [ 2015 ]        ,            .         .  
  
         .          .  
    
**** **** ** [ ESA Rosetta Project Scientist ] **  
  
! [ Halley's comet -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/halleys-comet-2.jpg?w=500&h=1044 )   
  
     ,       [ Atum Region ]    [ Large Lobe ]      .         ,    [ Dust Cone ]       .        ,        .  
    
**   [ Eberhard Grun, Nuclear Physics, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] **  
  
! [ Which Instruments saw outbursts ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/which-instruments-saw-outbursts.jpg?w=584&h=646 )   
    
**2015       **  
  
   2015  19   -   [ Comet Name : 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko ]        [ Comet Outburst ]    . 20            [ ,  , ,     ]   [ Cameras, Dust Collectors, Gas & Plasma Analysers ]     .         .          [ Royal Astronomical Society ]   ,      .               [ Eberhard Grun, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] .  
  
! [ Comet Halley ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/comet-halley.jpg?w=501&h=1188 )   
  
   2016   9:40   [ GMT ]        [ Comet Dusty Coma ]          .      100       [ ALICE ]    .         [ Ultraviolet Brightness of the Sunlight Reflected by the Comet Nucleus ] .     6   . ,    [ ROSINA & RPC ]     [ 1.5 TO 2.5  ]   ,   .    [ MIRO ]      30.C  .  3  10      [ GIADA ]  200  .         [ Dust Grains ]   .         [ Comet Coma Density ]   .  
  
     ,       [ Atum Region ]    [ Large Lobe ]      .        ,    [ Dust Cone ]       .        ,        .         [ Thermal Stress ]           .               .  
  
++++++++++++++++

! [ Difficult landing ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/difficult-landing.jpg?w=584 )   
  
     [ Philae Lander ]       .          .     ,     .     .           .  
    
**   [     ] **  
  
240 ..  [ 150  ]         ,    180 ..  [ 110  ]   .  
    
**   [      ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta probe landing ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rosetta-probe-landing.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “             .      ,       .          . ”   
    
**    [ ESA Director General ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
 “    [ 2004 – 2014 ]    ,                 . ”   
    
**   [ ESA Director of Scince & Robotic Exploration ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
 “      ?       ?  ,        !       ,      !     [ Deep Impact ]       .  , ,  ,      ! ”   
    
**   [ Acting Diretor, Solar System Division, NASA ] **  
  
! [ Roetta Probe on comet -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/roetta-probe-on-comet-1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**Mothership Rosetta Drops Lander on the Comet**  
    
**     **  
  
2014  12          !     ** [ ESA -European Space Agency Spaceship Rosetta ] **         ** [ Philae Lander ] **     . 1969              . 2004   2       10   , 6.4  ..   [ 3.8   ]      ** [ Comet : 67P /Churyumov-Gerasimenko ] ** 2014  6    ,    ,    .    30 ..  , 34,000 mph  [ 55,000 kmh ]     .      ,  ,     .  
  
! [ First comet image from Philae ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/first-comet-image-from-philae.jpg?w=584 )   
  
      510  ..  [ 300   ]      .      ,         .        :   1 .  “ ,          .      ,     , ”      [ ESA Director of Human Spaceflight Operations ]  .    : 18 kms  [ 3600 mph ] .        .       : 1.6    [ 1.3   ]   
    
**   **  
  
    ,       .   60   .    12   !         ,       .        .         ,      .   2015       .            .    13          ,      .   [  6, 2014 ]     20 ..  [ 12  ]       .     8 ..  [ 5  ]       .   [ 2015  13 ]        185  ..  [  110    ]    .  
  
   ,          . 4.5           ,      ,           .  
  
! [ Comet chasing probe ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/comet-chasing-probe.jpg?w=584 )   
  
2014                 “  ”   [ Orion Spacecraft ]    7  14      [ Asteroid ]       .                .              . ”   
    
**  ,    [ Dr. Paul Abell, NASA Jonson Space Center, Houston ]     
**  
  
 “       !         !      !       !          ( Porous Organic Mass ) ,        . ”   
    
**  ,  ·  , **  
  
! [ Rosetta Mission ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-mission1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
                    ,     !      [ 1000  . ]     ,   ,         [ Gravity Assist Swing ]        [ Elliptical Path & Velocity ]  .               !            .               !  
  
           .                 !            .   [ Asteroids ]        .      ?            .  
  
! [ Philae Lander parts ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-parts.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
    : 1000    [   : 1.325   ]             [ European Space Agency  ( ESA )  ]   : , , , , , , ,  .          [ German Aerospace Research Institute  ( DLR )  ]      .  
  
     [ 3  x 2  x 2  ]  , ,  .  : 100  .    14     [ Solar Panels ]      .     64  .    2.2         .      .  
  
! [ ESA Control Room -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room-2.jpg?w=584 )   
    
****** 11   :**  
  
1\.  “  ”       [ ALlCE: Ultraviolet Imaging Spectrameter ]   
  
2\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
  
3\.  “  ”         [ COSIMA: Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyser ]   
  
4\.  “  ”    ,    [ GIADIA: Grain Impact Analyser & Dust Accumulator ]   
  
5\.  “  ”       [ MIDAS: Micro-Imaging Analysing System ]   
  
6\.  “  ”       [ MICRO: Microwave Instrument for Rosetta Orbiter ]   
  
7\.  “  ”       [ OSIRIS: Rosetta Orbiter Imaging System ]   
  
! [ Rosetta Program -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rosetta-program-1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
8\.  “  ”  ,         [ ROSINA: Rosetta Orbiter Spectrometer for Ion & Neutral Analysis ]   
  
9\.  “  ”       [ RPC: Rosetta Plasma Consortium ]   
  
10  “  ”       [ RSI: Radio Science Investigation ]   
  
11  “  ”  ,       [ VIRTIS: Visible & Infrared Mapping Spectrometer ]   
    
**    :**  
  
   9  :  
  
1\.  “  ”    -    [ APXS: Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ]   
  
2\.  “ / ”        [ CIVA/ROLIS: Rosetta Lander Imaging System ]   
  
3\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
    
**Philae Lander**  
  
! [ Philae Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/philae-lander.jpg?w=540 )   
  
4\.  “  ”        [ COSAC: Cometary Sampling & Composition Experiment ]   
  
5\.  “   ”      [ MODULUS PTOLEMY: Evolved Gas Analyser ]   
  
6\.  “  ”        [ MUPUS: Multi-Purpose Sensor for Surface & Subsurface Science ]   
  
7\.  “  ”   ,    [ ROMAP: RoLand Magentometer & Plasma Monitor ]   
  
8\.  “ 2 ”      [ SD2: Sample & Distribution Device ]   
  
9\.  “  ”     ,     [ SESAME: Surface Electrical & Acoustic Monitoring Experiment, Dust Impact Collector ]   
  
  :      [ European Space Operation Centre  ( ESOC ) , Darmstadt, Germany ]   :  , ,   [ New Norcia, Near Perth, Australia ]   
  
! [ Philae Lander components ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-components.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
2007  14         2014         ,         [ Asteroid ]            [ Orion Spacecraft ]   .           .       .                   .       ,        .             .        7  14      .           .  
    
**Rosetta Spaceship Launching**  
    
** [ March 2, 2004 ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta launching ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/rosetta-launching.jpg?w=540 )   
  
2004  2     -5   [ Ariane-5G+ ]   ,  .      [ Earth Gravity Assist  ( Earth ’ s Fly-by )  ]  2005  4   .  “   ”          [ Sling-shot like Effect ]  .        .         22,500    .            20        !          .       20    ,        .      ,          .  
  
! [ Philae touchdown-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-32.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
          [ Kourov, French Guiana ]    . 1993           .   ,   ,      “ - ”   ( Churyumov-Gerasimenko )     ( 67P )  .    ,        .     .    “  ”   [ Name from Rosetta Stone of Black Basalt with Egyptian Scripts about Ptolemy V ]    .   -5  [ Ariane 5 Generic Rocket Engine, Payload 6-9.5 Tons ]  2004  2    ,      .  
  
! [ Rosetta Orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  ,    , , ,    [ Astroids: Lutetia & Steins ]         [ Gravity Assist Maneuvers ]   . 2005  4       ,    .                 .   [ 2007  25 ]         [ Mars Fly-by ]   .       2007 , 2009   .  ,       2008 , 2010   .  
  
! [ Rosetta-comet orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-comet-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
          ,     ,    2014   . 2014       ,      .               .                 .     2015    .

## 085    .   &    
  
  
  
! [ Standard Model ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/standard-model.jpg?w=584&h=329 )   
    
** ( : 13 ) **  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
++++++++++++++++++++  
  
++++++++++++++++++++  
  
      
  !    
     
      
  !    
       
     
  !    
     
    !    
    
     
     
   ?    
     
    
   !    
     
 !    
     
  ,    
 !    
 !  !    
 !

! [ primary-cosmic-ray-showers.jpg ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/01/primary-cosmic-ray-showers.jpg?w=568&h=568 )   
  
   !    !           !          !  
    
**     [ Thomas Henry Huxley  ( 1825-1895 )  ] **  
  
    ( Apple Pie )         .  
  
     ,       !       ,       !           !  
  
        !  
    
**   ( Carl Sagan )   **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242b.jpg )   
  
        ( High Energy Astrophysics )     .       ,          .          .  
    
** ,  ( Kellie Jaeger, Astronomy Magazine ) **  
  
! [ Particles Forces ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/particles-forces.jpg?w=546&h=577 )   
    
**      !**  
  
      . :     ! : , , ,         !               !         7%-10%  ( Background Radiation Dose ) .        ,      .     / -,  , , , ,  , ,   .  
  
! [ Standard Model -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/standard-model-1.jpg?w=505&h=511 )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242a.jpg )   
  
       ( High Energy Particles )       .         !     , ,        100      ( Muons )  .      ,         .              .               !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242c.jpg )   
  
        .         .  
    
**    **  
  
         .   ,       ( Solar Corona )   ,     ( Acceleration )  .       10  100 MeV  ( Million Electron Volt Energy )    .     1-10 GeV  ( Gega Electron Volt Energy )     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242ae.jpg )   
  
          !              ( Solar Wind with Plasma & Electrons )    ( 240 / )  400 ./   .          !             !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242d.jpg )   
    
**     **  
  
    ( , , , ,  )       “    ”   ( Anomalous Cosmic Rays )   .       .           ( Electrically Neutral Interstellar Particles )  .    ,          !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242af.jpg )   
  
     ?      ( Periodic Table of Elements )       .    ( 88% )     (  ) , 10% , 1%   & 1% ..        ?   , , , ,  .       ,   , ,   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242e.jpg )   
    
**     **  
  
       “  ”   ( CERN Particle Accelerator )        ,        .          .      ,      .     7000   [  ( 1 Trillion = 10^12 )  1 followed by 12 Zeros ]       !        ,       50       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242ad.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
1960      12      .           ! 1961     ( Murray Gellmann )  8         ( Eightfold Way to Relate Particles by Mathematical Symmetry )   .       ( George Zweig )     “  ”    ,   .      .  1974     ( Burton Richter )       “    ”   ( Stanford Liner Accelerator )     .      ( Samuel Ting )    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801242ac.jpg )   
  
1977     ( Fermilab )     ( Leon Lederman )      .  1984        .   , , , , ,   ( Up, Down, Charm, Strange, Top & Bottom )    .          “ , ,  ”   .      ( Standard Model )     ,  ,  ,  [        ) .      ( Physical Forces ) .    .      .      ( Strong & Weaker Nuclear Forces, Electromagnetic Forces )     ( Bosons are Force Carriers ) .  (      ) .     . ,    ( Fermions )    .

 

  

 “              !    ,       ,     !    [ Crusts ]       [ Liquid Core ]      !   ,    [ Continental Drift & Plate Tectonics ]     [ Fossil Records ]      ” .  
    
**  ,    [ Dr. Alfred Wegener  ( 1880-1930 )  ] **

       
   !    
,     !    
     !

**   **  
  
2016  24       ,    6.2   .    470     !   5.1  .   [  25 ]   : 247,  : 368.    . 1500     .     ,    ,       .  ,       ,      !          100 .. [ 60  ]     [ Amatrice ]  .  1000   70     .          .           .  
  
! [ Image 2016 Aug -9 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/image-2016-aug-9.jpg?w=584&h=390 )   
  
2009      [ L'Aquila ]     ,    ,       .    ,     .   1200    .       .   ,  [ Red Cross Helpers ]     , ,    .     ,       ,     .  ,       .

**! [ fig-1c-earthquake-death-zones1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1c-earthquake-death-zones1.jpg?w=482&h=1027 ) **  
  
  
    
**     **  
  
2009  6      60   ( 100 . )      ( L ’ Aquila )     ( 5.8 – 6.3 )                   !   28,000  ( ? )    18,000       10,000       .   280  (  9 )  ,                   !   13        (  : 70,000 )  .  
  
! [ fig-1-italian-earthquake-scenes ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1-italian-earthquake-scenes.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   3000  10,000   !    1500   .        , ,        .       ( Sivio Berlusconi )  2009          !              !          30      ( 40.6   )    .       1000     .  
  
! [ fig-1b-the-faulty-tectonic-plates-under-italy ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1b-the-faulty-tectonic-plates-under-italy.jpg?w=543&h=761 )   
    
**       
**    
1980      6.5    2735    ! 2009           ( Aftershocks )     .         !    26          !          !         !    ,   ,    .  
  
     7000   .       2  3    ( 1.5-2.2   )   .      1.5    ( 1  =1000  ) .           .    60     !     5.6  .  
  
! [ fig-2-earthquake-force-in-tnt ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-2-earthquake-force-in-tnt.jpg?w=594&h=535 )   
    
**    !**  
  
1\.       98        .  
  
2\.             .          .  
  
3\. 22       23       !  
  
4\.           !  
  
! [ fig-1e-italian-zone-tectonic-plates-movements ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1e-italian-zone-tectonic-plates-movements.jpg?w=584&h=819 )   
    
**     **  
    
** ( Plate Tectonics Faults ) **  
  
            21     !          !                     !                     !  
  
! [ fig-1e-seismic-sensors ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-1e-seismic-sensors.jpg?w=602&h=483 )   
  
            ( Subduction )         ( Plate Tectonics Faults )      ! ·          !  40        “    ”   ( Back-Arc Spreading )   !          ·      ( Collision Zone )       !             .  
  
! [ fig-3-plate-tectonics-in-north-america ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-3-plate-tectonics-in-north-america.jpg?w=531&h=845 )   
  
  “    ”      ( The Crustal Plates that formed Italy ’ s Apennine Mountains )       .   ·               .         .   ,        .              !  
  
! [ fig-4-the-himalayan-fault-line ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-4-the-himalayan-fault-line.jpg?w=573&h=816 )   
    
**     **  
  
   2005  8             7.6     140           !        54,000   16   ,  79,000  [  20, 2005 ]      .        2     ,     !    2000    . 2005         20    ,        ! 2004               230,000   !      . 1991           140,000    .  
  
! [ fig-5-the-indian-plate-monitoring-satellite ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-5-the-indian-plate-monitoring-satellite.jpg?w=579&h=1127 )   
    
**    **  
  
        !        !             !   ·       !          !  ,        !  ·      ,   !        ,      !    ,        ,        !  
  
! [ fig-5-indo-eurasian-plate-movements ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/fig-5-indo-eurasian-plate-movements.jpg?w=519&h=1030 )   
  
      1.6   [ 40   ]    !     ,    [ Crust ]    !      .      ,        !    “   ”   [ Plate Subduction ]   .         [ Compressive Motion ]     [ Slip ]         [ Thrust Faults ]  .      : 2004      ,   ,      .  
  
! [ major-earthquakes-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/major-earthquakes-1.jpg?w=554&h=1085 )

14\. http://www.660news.com/2016/08/24/death-toll-in-italian-earthquake-rises-to-120/  [ August 24, 2016 ]   
  
15\. http://www.bing.com/news/search?q=Earthquake+In+Italy&qpvt=Earthquake+in+Italy&FORM=EWRE  
  
16\. http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/why-the-earthquake-in-italy-was-so-destructive/?print=true  [ August 24, 2016 ]   
  
17\. http://www.cnn.com/2016/08/23/europe/italy-earthquake-live-blog/index.html  [ August 24, 2016 ]   
  
18\. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_earthquakes_in_Italy  [ August 25, 2016 ]
