S. Jayabarathan  [ jayabarathans@gmail.com ]   ( April 25, 2016 )   
  
## 087            
  
  
  
  
  
 ! [ Funamental particles ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/funamental-particles.jpg?w=457&h=461 )   
    
**  
  
 **.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
    
**  
    
**++++++++++**  
  
  
    
**  **  
    
**  **  
    
** .**  
    
** ,  ,**  
    
**,   .**  
    
** **  
    
****  
    
**  !   ! **  
    
**  **  
    
** ?**  
    
**  **  
    
**   ?**  
    
**   **  
    
**   **  
    
**  **  
    
**  !**  
  
++++++++++++  
  
! [ Four Forces ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/four-forces.jpg?w=530&h=367 )   
    
**   **  
  
  ,    .         :  ,  ,  &    ** [ Gravitation, Electromagnetism, Strong & Weak Nuclear Forces ] . **        , ,        .  
    
**    [  Jonathan Feng, Physics & Astronomy, University of California ]   [ August 16, 2016 ] **  
  
         .   :      .    ,      ** [ Matter Particle or Force-carrying Particle ] **    .  
    
**  .**  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171a.jpg )   
    
**     .**  
  
    [ 2015 ]      ,   ,     2016  15   . 2015      ,     [ Subatomic Particle ]     .       [ Particle Accelerator ]        -8    [ Radioactive Decay ]     [ Anomaly ]  .       30       .        .      [ New Force ]      .  
  
      [ Particle Accelerator ]    -7   -8        ,    [ Matter Particle ]       [ Force-carrying Particle ]    .  
  
! [ Force-Carrying Particle ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/force-carrying-particle.jpg?w=499&h=700 )   
  
       [ Jonathan Feng ]    2015        ,     .   .           [ Four Fundamental Forces in Nature ] .  ,  ,  &   .  [ Strong & Weak Nuclear Forces ] .        ,      .  ,     .        [ Matter Particle ]       [ Force-carrying Particle ]      !       ,   ,    [ Dark Photon ]    . -8     ,      .          [ Protophobic X Boson ]   .       [ X Boson ]       .               .  
  
! [ LHC Experiments ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/lhc-experiments.jpg?w=584&h=647 )   
  
++++++++++++  
  
     !  
  
 ,   !  
  
    !  
  
    !  
  
     
  
    !  
    
** ,    [ Richard Wagner  ( 1813-1883 )  ] **  
  
! [ Particles Zoo ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/particles-zoo.jpg?w=496&h=630 )   
  
             .  
    
** ,  ( Scott Wakely )   ,   .  ( 2006 ) **  
  
   ,       ( Subatomic Particles ) .          . 1960         .     ,         .  
    
**  &  ·  ( Klaus Rith & Andreas Schafer ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171aa.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
      ( The Standard Model of Particle Physics )     ,           !  
    
** ,  ( Goron Kane )   ,   .**  
    
**      **  
  
   “    ”   ( General Theory of Relativity )             ( Space-Time Curvature )      .  
  
      “    ”   ( Quantum Mechanics )         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171ab.jpg )   
    
**   **  
  
  
  
 “  ”     ( Gluon )      ( Subatomic Particles )          ( Nuclear Force )   .  
  
     ( Electrons & Quarks )   1960 -1970    “     ”   ( Theory of Interactions – Standard Model )   .           .  
  
        “   ”   ( A Unified Theory of the Universe )         “   ”   ( One Dimensional Filament – The String Theory ) .        ,    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171b.jpg )   
    
**   **  
    
**      **  
  
    ( Superstring Theory )         !     ,     ( Particles & Fundamental Forces of Nature )        ( Vibrations of Tiny Supersymmetric Strings )    .     “   ”   ( Quantum Gravity )          !       “  ”   ( DNA )           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171c.jpg )   
  
  
    
** **  
  
           !   , ,    ( Superstring Theory, Hyperspace & Dark Matter )                 ,        !    ,    !      “   ”   ( Membraneous Bubbles )   !         !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171d.jpg )   
    
** & **  
  
  
    
**     **  
  
         ( DNA )       ( Matter )     ( Fundamental Particles )  .      . 1960      ·  ( 1871-1937 ) ,    ( 1885-1962 )        ,   ,      .  , ,         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171e.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
1960         ,     .        ( Quarks )   .      .   << , , , , ,  >>  ( Up, Down, Charm, Strange, Top, Bottom )        .   ,  .     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171f.jpg )   
    
** & **  
  
     ( Strongest Force )      .      !          .        ( Gluon )   .             .            .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171g.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
       .   .    ,       .          .     .           ?             !  ,    98%   !      ,      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171h.jpg )

** (  8, 2010 ) **  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
   !    
   !    
   !    
   !    
   !    
   !    
    !    
      
   !    
      
   !    
   !    
      
   !    
   !    
   !    
      
       
   !  
  
    
! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/CIKn83OffDj6Dodbp0dvVyU-ByLMaOzvY26VUkhAC0p70wNpZSEmnbiJ9AWntF2qehp9YSdGBRcnAzlzgOiyP7jK-OzNAoAoL94mxObnoltmAY1D9RpagZEADtEeIuFE6v0aFpY=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/first-manned-flight1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”   
    
**   ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab ) **  
  
 “      .  !  (    )     !     .    . ”   
    
**     ( Swiss Pilot Andre Borschberg ) **  
  
 “     .      .    . ”   
    
**   ( Flight Director & Former Space Shuttle Astronaut ) **

[  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Frpz6g-Nlr4T9wHeFpfWCiP8YbqMCNJPWhuvAJR92OWhj9VMShy5zIU7xr_zrDkKELhiJTm1RdfAFHBR1obyFAYnjZ2_LVP5CcISm5IC9zwb3R89jvd9Cbmy6uWdWfvXC7O_71ermysg7wB14UsUdtPhm4jO=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1-first-solar-powered-man-flight.jpg?w=584 )     
**  
    
**      **  
  
2010  8               26       ‘  ’     ( Payerne Airport, Swiss )  . 1903                    .           .         ( Bern )  50 ..  ( 30  )   .     12,000        .           .  10    ( 10 HP – 6 Kw Each )   .         ( Solar Cell Batteries )       .        8700   ( 28,500  ) .     :  ( 63  )  207 .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/mWFFM9UINvURwzMOxTG6_CWaLTOwMj3uK7KLxUc55yfrA_V_7ZxQeykkpfKWr95FRFTRV6cJhlSaQDDT9hkzo2cYbqdxKQ20O8RKlCsKFGYYnK9zbSuel0ji2AqJRiVvO6UdamBefBNDI5_XaxQwLE_ku2jRFDJF7A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1f-first-manned-solar-powered-flight.jpg?w=584 )          ,            .  
  
    ,             ..         ,   .              ( Former Fighter Jet Pilot, Andre Borschberg )     .   ‘     ’   ( Solar Impulse Deisgn Group )           !

[  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/M5Qib9-RG_jB8L7hU4d8TcUpUCNij-etMOZD-cXYTHUBkLdlHS0_lmqgwhpxb854pgtcHbpQsIFJk3fa2qdwA5zugAWxKmivDIE6HKfmRjMFBvblpj5dEeqEvLXpzUmpuswsfmMGoFhidTxFZfqAlHO0oyn3U-pzS9ReoA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1b-fact-file-of-the-solar-powered-plane.jpg?w=584 )   
  
            :    &       ( Andre Borschberg & Fellow Aviator Bertrand Piccard ) .  “           .       .     ,   3     .           .         .  ‘    ’     . ”      ( Aviator, Solar Impulse Design Lab )     !   2013              .

**     **  
  
       ( 57  )     26      !     1999        .  ,      .      : HB-SIA.    :      ( Bern )  50 .  ( 30  )       ( Payerne Airport ) .   : 2010  7   : 06:51.   : 2010  8   : 09:00.    : 8700   ( 28540  ) .   : 26  9 .       14      .           . 63   ( 207  )      ( Similar to A340 Airbus Wings Length )  12,000    .  10 HP        .

                 !      .        : 1.     . 2.    , . 3.            ! 2013–2014        ,        .        ( 75   )  95   !           ( 1600 . )   .

2007          , ,    . 12,000    200    .      400 .   –   ( Lithium Polymer Batteries )   .     ( Electric Motor )  10    ( 6 Kw )   .      : 3.5   ( 12  ) .   .   72 .   208 .  21 .   2200  .   1.6 .    22 mph.   43 mph.   75 mph.   27900   (   ) .   39000 .

[  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/GY8eM2QBJ8OhO-B4qrVmOVnzqHA01MoJ92tVrzS96CHdArV12LEvRnS0e-L6rf7LErCO9yIntE0wDh-grboFwmDZl7H8qcJOcqk3EzoQA5RsbaUzjcCN_EH7DJzeQmMEhRFPTPcmIfN9vSlH1XYDRc4XDYiVbqnkAfQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1c-test-flight-of-solar-powered-plane.jpg?w=584 )   
  
           .    ,    100 ..  (  60  )      .    ,      .    8000   ( 27000  )   -28         .  
    
**    /   :**  
  
1\. 2007  22 :       “   ”    .               .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/AnNFo5izvD9mWaHZigDfzEezM_FtZAk06NePN3hu9aTkoLfrdWTPfT3HBLfRpOmGKi0kPARmOoQWsN_G-8QyWXGiegG4lDtqN9uWbb5CC0-Kn4GW-Xs_osRCq4vxjUYs_bgOQHTdjvvSMriKBxNqa6vR=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-2-solar-powered-planes.jpg?w=529&h=1115 )   
  
2\. 2009  26 :      ****   ( Duebendorf )          ( Prototype Plane )   .  
  
3\. 2010  7 :    1.5     .  
  
4\. 2010  7 :              26       .  
  
5\. 2010  8 :   26         .    :    8564   ( 28540  ) .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/tnvNMcKlUXmTx_5kKmCFj3XiNo0T7m7egmJyluqXNqKP6-sHEnXLEIqvwL11PGJlkMWpgldhx_1DohU5cQvoGHfCWjP5lFypsNrJOs_1l-5dDT7iYyE3RX6cfwJ5ySi4vLdeGnrxbbI22YbVSy6T1qtacpBN_Ss=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-5-various-views-of-flights1.jpg?w=530&h=2128 )   
  
6\. 2011  :      ( HB-SIB )   ,       .  
  
7\. 2012   :   HB-SIB         
           ,         .  
  
8\. 2013 -2014 :     ( Large & Improved HB-SIB )    ,   .

5\. Wikipedia – Electric Aircraft – electric aircraft is an aircraft that runs on electric motors rather than internal combustion engines with electricity coming from fuel cells, solar cells, ultracapacitors, power beaming and/or batteries.

+++++++++++++  
  
       ,    25%   ,        .  
    
**    [   ] **  
  
         .     ,     [ Fluids or Solids ]   ,          .  CO2     .  
    
**    [   ] **  
  
  
  
! [ Al-CO2 electro-chemical cell with gases ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/l2d67jaexTVawKOyCNgEdM9mVMCb49oM8SNCruCeJkN6QN_ELX5gRZnwg6qkgszqs6a_vj5Ry-HUtoMm-UWWXBY25F9R8YTX7TR2N8mF6AW0JVMW1Ch0Mh6A8cFRFOr17VShNnCaqtORXCvQN2LR8ghVjTzYbcQaZ1cJ2C7k=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/al-co2-electro-chemical-cell-with-gases.jpg?w=584&h=646 )   
    
**   CO2   **  
  
    [ Fossil Fuels ]           .       .       ,             .  
  
    2016  20       ,         .    CO2   ,     .    2016  4       :   ,     :     [ Wajdi Al Sadat ] .  
  
! [ Changing CO2 into batteries ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ZJk8ELzZUXODCByBCHTK-aiKz_42Gwnc92AYkd-ctIpJ7UsICdOERlw86QR6pxc-3NkPR9ubtjqDcjMPUedm84gL_zK7vKdCzvpFtMDpwcVuFt-lUnvDgOeTnUe1vyUGu3CE8f1Uv4kBtidjz3EzhsUr=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/changing-co2-into-batteries.jpg?w=584&h=277 )   
  
         [ Electrochemical Cell ]    ,  [ Anode ]         [ Sponge cathode ]  .    CO2 & O2  .         CO2     ,     [ C2O4 ]   .     .  
  
  :       [ Electrochemical Cell ]     13 ampere hours per gram of porous Carbon as Cathode at discharge potential of 1.4 volts   .           , ,       [ Electrolyte ]      [   ]   [ Sensitive to Water or Affinity to Water ]  .        .     CO2    .  
  
+++++++++++++

! [ Picture -11 ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/DGvBdu3BoFi8Acki8sU7VWtuAy9zPogeqCjpBZT5atGO4-VgDf5scMFUOgT0zBX8ko8KdPefrYnt7r_mnjBeI0VzSEQ7CvZEvLQPJFNlb30ppBdN1k-nygHHkg=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-11.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**2013      CO2  **  
  
      2013     CO2    6,673    .          ,  ,   ,    .         :   [ CO2 ] ,   [ CH4 ] ,  .  [ N2O ] .        [ 1840 ]    ,  32%  CO2   .          CO2, CH4   .     [ Kyoto Protocol ]  ,   2012 ,     [  CO2, CH4, N2O, Hydrofluorocarbons, Perfluorocarbons, Sulphur Hexafluoride ] ,     .    ,   .  2015      2020   .  N2O   CO2  300     .  
  
! [ Picture -6 ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dROt7ga1B3ijPSapsbz9WkewueEGAdArP43TCX-hLY91G4yG0i2FTngjeYntmcAtnOgGmV2G-YghFIiNIOMZbdhAbEqj_w-R88YKbBwjdAD2q_8dGGFlUf8p=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-6.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “    2050   9.1   !  , , ,        . 15     [ Mount Kilimanjaro, Tanzania, Africa ]      !         20    .       !       !         !     ,        !       ?       ?   ,          . ”   
    
**      [ Al Gore, American Former Senator/Vice President  ( June 5, 2005 )  ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0HM0p_2ZhSKWf3833L1A5U4O_j16rA-JlgWowC33hURYB9pXPU4BlRxigFq8ZxYvj5cXH7DKFz_pD8EH5LT90wLHkOyw2uvGPhU=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211aa.jpg )   
  
 “            ( WMO )        [      ,      ]      .     , ,  ,         .      [ Super Computer Models ] ,   ,     ,     .            ,    . ”   
    
**    [ World Meteorological Organization  ( WMO )  ] **! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/_nY7x393LfY0AchL9E7VnTsxjx4KjhG_Dyvm9OlQAvv9_L8j66uDlvO-VUFYV4l6AY3NN-Zvl8t4zt6GBw-SC9QZkhzjRopr2g=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211b.jpg )   
  
 “ 2500                .           ,  ,          !           !         . ”   
    
**     [ Intergovernmental Panel for Climate Change  ( IPCC )  April 2, 2001 ] **  
  
! [ Picture -7 ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/MWHwc7IgaOo1Kc6PEgnIaU3jAHdNaoueMkUi075br7U9aotiW_CqhKzoxowH-QT7ZSHQ5zeNKwHJvJ2URUKaA4GMh9am-tk3TNdSVBKZOygNps2C7MQ5qQzn=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-7.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “           !       . ”   
    
**   [       ( 23  1999 )  ] **  
  
        !  ,        ,   !    ,      ,          !  
    
**     [ American Geophysical Union  ( Dec 2003 ] **

! [  ]  ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/HG30oOa_TQFzuTi2yJM2h16xC4-HfHPi7kpz2Y46727Q1hCACIrzq959VaC0BZXa24VGCt7utyo518i0zcG9Sk6SaULYXnKuoQ=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211d.jpg )   
  
 “        .            25%-30%  .  
    
**   :**  
  
1\.   1900  1  F  ( 0.5 C )   .  
  
2\. 20        1990   .   1998      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/x-rqdiv77cWhBnxHtO6KPu9BgEnkZDSYTnzo3neB4Nszc1jhWUZJ7Qj3Bil_rJho0P0gr-k8-Yv7etJsqWLoKb3LkClkUvE_og=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211e.jpg )   
  
3\.  3000        20       !  
  
4\.   , ,  279    !      2      !  
  
5\.  ( 1986-1995 )            .  
    
**  ,  [ Dr. Cecilia Bitz, Physicist, University of Washington, Polar Science Center ] **

**        **  
  
    ,          !             ,       !            .    ( 1979-1989 )         ,    !      ,             .     “    ”   [ Chloro Fluro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]

**    **  
  
        ,    !      [ Volume ]    ,     , !       ,      [ Carbon Dioxide ]         [ Density ]  !    ,    ,   .    “    ”    “    ”   [ Greenhouse Effect ]    .       !            ,       .  .·.  [ Chloro Fluoro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]            ,        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/QQ-n4fWA1ZPQ8sWuz03u6gRTOA0V-67I9-UTT4VhN3Q4NwRaoTa955wWn8sZpY0dApcYtvExSm5qQpYQG57ig7RcQ7cNxpbVGA=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211f.jpg )   
  
     ,       !           .         .           ,        .           ,        . 1940       1972     !         ,        !       !  
  
! [ Pollution groups ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/HgnC-oZAimfJBF_2Qc7dJfmu_gLwovo-P6_rCarGR_wzo0n4tfasdKc6Sz4hCj6hFEe1gt9Ev9a5cjbUg2CHv6AdQIrEEcvsUpqgEkbQpyx7ePznNjwnRjRecGEvF0NjQO-byz1Q2A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/pollution-groups.jpg?w=584&h=446 )   
  
     ,           [ Volumetric Thermal Expansion ] .          !       .    [ Tide Gauge Data ]         .  100       10-25 ..  !        100  2-7 ..   !       2-5 ..   !  4-13 ..      . 21                  !

**Al Gore Book**  
    
**    :**  
  
               .    , ,           [ CO2 ] .        [ Methane Gas ] .      [ Waste Treatment Plants ]   ,       [ Halo-Carbons ]  .    CO2    [ CO2 Equivalence ]  , 2003    CO2  : 2692.  2002   CO2    10.6%    !  
  
2003     300,000        1810   CO2   “     ”   [ Glaxo Smith Kline ]  !    614       , 2002   91.5   CO2   2003   .     50  ,     12.6   CO2      !

## 090           
  
  
  
  
    
****  
  
! [ Al-CO2 electro-chemical cell ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/n_DrCH-CYPCPlUp1B0ZDt6SfmCqicPomncMp2FJBxJr0t1peWE6e-JM6wml9M2iHwQiw6s0qA_LIHtPJSQn5SnpbC4pCIMgBoekrUvOkLILck8ZILvfb23KBpAQdsYJHBF8v7kQLxyD0FhC-uM58Sh-Ojw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/al-co2-electro-chemical-cell.jpg?w=584&h=646 )

**   **  
  
   !    
    
   !    
, , ,     
   !    
   !    
    !    
, , ,    
, ,     
   !    
  ,    
      
    !    
      
,    
   !    
  ,    
,   !    
, ,    
      
  !  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
       ,    25%   ,        .  
    
**    [   ] **  
  
         .     ,     [ Fluids or Solids ]   ,          .  CO2     .  
    
**    [   ] **  
  
  
  
! [ Al-CO2 electro-chemical cell with gases ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/l2d67jaexTVawKOyCNgEdM9mVMCb49oM8SNCruCeJkN6QN_ELX5gRZnwg6qkgszqs6a_vj5Ry-HUtoMm-UWWXBY25F9R8YTX7TR2N8mF6AW0JVMW1Ch0Mh6A8cFRFOr17VShNnCaqtORXCvQN2LR8ghVjTzYbcQaZ1cJ2C7k=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/al-co2-electro-chemical-cell-with-gases.jpg?w=584&h=646 )   
    
**   CO2   **  
  
    [ Fossil Fuels ]           .       .       ,             .  
  
    2016  20       ,         .    CO2   ,     .    2016  4       :   ,     :     [ Wajdi Al Sadat ] .  
  
! [ Changing CO2 into batteries ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ZJk8ELzZUXODCByBCHTK-aiKz_42Gwnc92AYkd-ctIpJ7UsICdOERlw86QR6pxc-3NkPR9ubtjqDcjMPUedm84gL_zK7vKdCzvpFtMDpwcVuFt-lUnvDgOeTnUe1vyUGu3CE8f1Uv4kBtidjz3EzhsUr=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/changing-co2-into-batteries.jpg?w=584&h=277 )   
  
         [ Electrochemical Cell ]    ,  [ Anode ]         [ Sponge cathode ]  .    CO2 & O2  .         CO2     ,     [ C2O4 ]   .     .  
    
**  :       [ Electrochemical Cell ]     13 ampere hours per gram of porous Carbon as Cathode at discharge potential of 1.4 volts   .           , ,       [ Electrolyte ]      [   ]   [ Sensitive to Water or Affinity to Water ]  .        .     CO2    .**  
  
+++++++++++++

 [ Jeffrey Kluger, Senior Writer Time Magazine ]

! [ Picture -11 ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/DGvBdu3BoFi8Acki8sU7VWtuAy9zPogeqCjpBZT5atGO4-VgDf5scMFUOgT0zBX8ko8KdPefrYnt7r_mnjBeI0VzSEQ7CvZEvLQPJFNlb30ppBdN1k-nygHHkg=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-11.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**2013      CO2  **  
  
      2013     CO2    6,673    .          ,  ,   ,    .         :   [ CO2 ] ,   [ CH4 ] ,  .  [ N2O ] .        [ 1840 ]    ,  32%  CO2   .          CO2, CH4   .     [ Kyoto Protocol ]  ,   2012 ,     [  CO2, CH4, N2O, Hydrofluorocarbons, Perfluorocarbons, Sulphur Hexafluoride ] ,     .    ,   .  2015      2020   .  N2O   CO2  300     .  
  
! [ Picture -6 ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dROt7ga1B3ijPSapsbz9WkewueEGAdArP43TCX-hLY91G4yG0i2FTngjeYntmcAtnOgGmV2G-YghFIiNIOMZbdhAbEqj_w-R88YKbBwjdAD2q_8dGGFlUf8p=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-6.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “    2050   9.1   !  , , ,        . 15     [ Mount Kilimanjaro, Tanzania, Africa ]      !         20    .       !       !         !     ,        !       ?       ?   ,          . ”   
    
**      [ Al Gore, American Former Senator/Vice President  ( June 5, 2005 )  ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0HM0p_2ZhSKWf3833L1A5U4O_j16rA-JlgWowC33hURYB9pXPU4BlRxigFq8ZxYvj5cXH7DKFz_pD8EH5LT90wLHkOyw2uvGPhU=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211aa.jpg )   
  
 “            ( WMO )        [      ,      ]      .     , ,  ,         .      [ Super Computer Models ] ,   ,     ,     .            ,    . ”   
    
**    [ World Meteorological Organization  ( WMO )  ] **! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/_nY7x393LfY0AchL9E7VnTsxjx4KjhG_Dyvm9OlQAvv9_L8j66uDlvO-VUFYV4l6AY3NN-Zvl8t4zt6GBw-SC9QZkhzjRopr2g=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211b.jpg )   
  
 “ 2500                .           ,  ,          !           !         . ”   
    
**     [ Intergovernmental Panel for Climate Change  ( IPCC )  April 2, 2001 ] **

 “           !       . ”   
    
**   [       ( 23  1999 )  ] **  
  
        !  ,        ,   !    ,      ,          !  
    
**     [ American Geophysical Union  ( Dec 2003 ] **

 “        .            25%-30%  .  
    
**   :**  
  
1\.   1900  1  F  ( 0.5 C )   .  
  
2\. 20        1990   .   1998      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/x-rqdiv77cWhBnxHtO6KPu9BgEnkZDSYTnzo3neB4Nszc1jhWUZJ7Qj3Bil_rJho0P0gr-k8-Yv7etJsqWLoKb3LkClkUvE_og=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211e.jpg )   
  
3\.  3000        20       !  
  
4\.   , ,  279    !      2      !  
  
5\.  ( 1986-1995 )            .  
    
**  ,  [ Dr. Cecilia Bitz, Physicist, University of Washington, Polar Science Center ] **  
  
! [ Picture -10 ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Lf_FWuNBuE4HjNxSWGPRcSJWQFqMr7HwOPsPn4ro58hNdwY48_nwYLD7pO1_q6ZM9_9FL4J7TeTiXnZk5OlSVSccG_DV4t5KT-b-YZFnELRAv40-4DqWaaYX1B4=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-102.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**        **  
  
    ,          !             ,       !            .    ( 1979-1989 )         ,    !      ,             .     “    ”   [ Chloro Fluro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]   
  
! [ Picture -8 ]  ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ZDwqFMqlRPCIwiw6Sv1OtbspOX1SYQb71LsO80Q6q5E-di9K-cfzu5m4b6Ga5-RvqeTnKjYb7NPdU0D-ie-2XifFlGDjeE0WTYHU0fYRydSOJ9R77c8oSRct9ACzWHyQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/picture-8.jpg?w=584&h=429 )   
    
**    **  
  
        ,    !      [ Volume ]    ,     , !       ,      [ Carbon Dioxide ]         [ Density ]  !    ,    ,   .    “    ”    “    ”   [ Greenhouse Effect ]    .       !            ,       .  .·.  [ Chloro Fluoro Carbons  ( CFC )  ]            ,        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/QQ-n4fWA1ZPQ8sWuz03u6gRTOA0V-67I9-UTT4VhN3Q4NwRaoTa955wWn8sZpY0dApcYtvExSm5qQpYQG57ig7RcQ7cNxpbVGA=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211f.jpg )   
  
     ,       !           .         .           ,        .           ,        . 1940       1972     !         ,        !       !  
  
! [ Pollution groups ]  ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/HgnC-oZAimfJBF_2Qc7dJfmu_gLwovo-P6_rCarGR_wzo0n4tfasdKc6Sz4hCj6hFEe1gt9Ev9a5cjbUg2CHv6AdQIrEEcvsUpqgEkbQpyx7ePznNjwnRjRecGEvF0NjQO-byz1Q2A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/04/pollution-groups.jpg?w=584&h=446 )   
  
     ,           [ Volumetric Thermal Expansion ] .          !       .    [ Tide Gauge Data ]         .  100       10-25 ..  !        100  2-7 ..   !       2-5 ..   !  4-13 ..      . 21                  !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/l6KWoQ2Ie6gK-_09691EoiDcIrmfTCRTPSv9Wl5SDQXntN2dTCFjQ2j_tTB94ef6627pShBBnraQzkv2mTxckEf7D63__jgitw=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706211g.jpg )   
    
**Al Gore Book**  
    
**    :**  
  
               .    , ,           [ CO2 ] .        [ Methane Gas ] .      [ Waste Treatment Plants ]   ,       [ Halo-Carbons ]  .    CO2    [ CO2 Equivalence ]  , 2003    CO2  : 2692.  2002   CO2    10.6%    !  
  
2003     300,000        1810   CO2   “     ”   [ Glaxo Smith Kline ]  !    614       , 2002   91.5   CO2   2003   .     50  ,     12.6   CO2      !

 .    
 ,  .    
  !    
 ,    
 .    
   .    
   !    
      
   ,    
  

! [ Comet -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-1.jpg?w=450&h=401 )   
  
    **,          [ Icy Trans-Neptunian Objects  ( TNO )  ] **      [ Short-lived Radioactive Substances ]  .       .        ,        .       400 ..  [ 240  ]   .         . 4.6    ,   ,          .  
    
**   [ Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California, USA ] **  
  
! [ How comets are born-2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/how-comets-are-born-2.jpg?w=584&h=365 )

       .                   .      .            .  
    
**   [ ESA Rosetta Project Scientist ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta launch ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/rosetta-launch.jpg?w=584&h=365 )   
  
! [ Rosetta Spacecraft ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/rosetta-spacecraft.jpg?w=600&h=595 )   
    
**      ?**  
  
     ,        [ 2016  29 ]         .           .   ,       .  67 -  [ 67P Churyumov-Gerasimenko ]       ,        .       :   ,   ,        [ Low Density ] ,  [ High Porosity ] ,  [ Double-Lobed Body ] .       ,        .  
  
! [ comets -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comets-2.jpg?w=521&h=688 )   
  
       ,        .  ,   ,    [ Structures & Features ]       .  
  
   ,    ,   ,       .      .      ,     [ Lumpiness ]  or  [ Goosebumps ]      .  
  
   ,   ,  .    ,, ,    [ Carbon monoxide, Oxygen, Nitrogen & Argon ]  .       ,       ,  3   [ 5 . ]       .

! [ Comet Size ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-size.jpg?w=529&h=700 )   
  
 “             .      ,       .          . ”   
    
**    [ ESA Director General ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
 “    [ 2004 – 2014 ]    ,                 . ”   
    
**   [ ESA Director of Scince & Robotic Exploration ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
! [ How comets are born-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/how-comets-are-born-1.jpg?w=584&h=1482 )   
    
** [ Click to Enlarge ] **  
  
 “      ?       ?  ,        !       ,      !     [ Deep Impact ]       .  , ,  ,      ! ”   
    
**   [ Acting Diretor, Solar System Division, NASA ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta drops the Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-drops-the-lander.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**Mothership Rosetta Drops Lander on the Comet**  
    
**     **  
  
2014  12          !     ** [ ESA -European Space Agency Spaceship Rosetta ] **         ** [ Philae Lander ] **     . 1969              . 2004   2       10   , 6.4  ..   [ 3.8   ]      ** [ Comet : 67P /Churyumov-Gerasimenko ] ** 2014  6    ,    ,    .    30 ..  , 34,000 mph  [ 55,000 kmh ]     .      ,  ,     .  
  
! [ Mission details ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/mission-details.jpg?w=530&h=793 )   
  
      510  ..  [ 300   ]      .      ,         .        :   1 .  “ ,          .      ,     , ”      [ ESA Director of Human Spaceflight Operations ]  .    : 18 kms  [ 3600 mph ] .        .       : 1.6    [ 1.3   ]   
  
! [ Philae touchdown -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-2.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
    ,       .   60   .    12   !         ,       .        .         ,      .   2015       .            .    13          ,      .   [  6, 2014 ]     20 ..  [ 12  ]       .     8 ..  [ 5  ]       .   [ 2015  13 ]        185  ..  [  110    ]    .  
  
   ,          . 4.5           ,      ,           .  
  
! [ Mothership & Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/mothership-lander.jpg?w=505&h=628 )   
  
2014                 “  ”   [ Orion Spacecraft ]    7  14      [ Asteroid ]       .                .              . ”   
    
**  ,    [ Dr. Paul Abell, NASA Jonson Space Center, Houston ]     
**  
  
 “       !         !      !       !          ( Porous Organic Mass ) ,        . ”   
    
**  ,  ·  , **  
  
! [ Rosetta Mission ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-mission1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
                    ,     !      [ 1000  . ]     ,   ,         [ Gravity Assist Swing ]        [ Elliptical Path & Velocity ]  .               !            .               !  
  
           .                 !            .   [ Asteroids ]        .      ?            .  
  
! [ Philae Lander parts ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-parts.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
    : 1000    [   : 1.325   ]             [ European Space Agency  ( ESA )  ]   : , , , , , , ,  .          [ German Aerospace Research Institute  ( DLR )  ]      .  
  
     [ 3  x 2  x 2  ]  , ,  .  : 100  .    14     [ Solar Panels ]      .     64  .    2.2         .      .  
  
! [ ESA Control Room -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room-2.jpg?w=584 ) ****  
    
** 11   :**  
  
1\.  “  ”       [ ALlCE: Ultraviolet Imaging Spectrameter ]   
  
2\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
  
3\.  “  ”         [ COSIMA: Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyser ]   
  
4\.  “  ”    ,    [ GIADIA: Grain Impact Analyser & Dust Accumulator ]   
  
5\.  “  ”       [ MIDAS: Micro-Imaging Analysing System ]   
  
6\.  “  ”       [ MICRO: Microwave Instrument for Rosetta Orbiter ]   
  
7\.  “  ”       [ OSIRIS: Rosetta Orbiter Imaging System ]   
  
! [ ESA Control Room ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room.jpg?w=584 )   
  
8\.  “  ”  ,         [ ROSINA: Rosetta Orbiter Spectrometer for Ion & Neutral Analysis ]   
  
9\.  “  ”       [ RPC: Rosetta Plasma Consortium ]   
  
10  “  ”       [ RSI: Radio Science Investigation ]   
  
11  “  ”  ,       [ VIRTIS: Visible & Infrared Mapping Spectrometer ]   
    
**    :**  
  
   9  :  
  
1\.  “  ”    -    [ APXS: Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ]   
  
2\.  “ / ”        [ CIVA/ROLIS: Rosetta Lander Imaging System ]   
  
3\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
    
**Philae Lander**  
  
! [ Philae Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/philae-lander.jpg?w=540 )   
  
4\.  “  ”        [ COSAC: Cometary Sampling & Composition Experiment ]   
  
5\.  “   ”      [ MODULUS PTOLEMY: Evolved Gas Analyser ]   
  
6\.  “  ”        [ MUPUS: Multi-Purpose Sensor for Surface & Subsurface Science ]   
  
7\.  “  ”   ,    [ ROMAP: RoLand Magentometer & Plasma Monitor ]   
  
8\.  “ 2 ”      [ SD2: Sample & Distribution Device ]   
  
9\.  “  ”     ,     [ SESAME: Surface Electrical & Acoustic Monitoring Experiment, Dust Impact Collector ]   
  
  :      [ European Space Operation Centre  ( ESOC ) , Darmstadt, Germany ]   :  , ,   [ New Norcia, Near Perth, Australia ]   
  
! [ Philae Lander components ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-components.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
2007  14         2014         ,         [ Asteroid ]            [ Orion Spacecraft ]   .           .       .                   .       ,        .             .        7  14      .           .  
    
**Rosetta Spaceship Launching**  
    
** [ March 2, 2004 ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta launching ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/rosetta-launching.jpg?w=540 )   
  
2004  2     -5   [ Ariane-5G+ ]   ,  .      [ Earth Gravity Assist  ( Earth ’ s Fly-by )  ]  2005  4   .  “   ”          [ Sling-shot like Effect ]  .        .         22,500    .            20        !          .       20    ,        .      ,          .  
  
! [ Philae touchdown-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-32.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
          [ Kourov, French Guiana ]    . 1993           .   ,   ,      “ - ”   ( Churyumov-Gerasimenko )     ( 67P )  .    ,        .     .    “  ”   [ Name from Rosetta Stone of Black Basalt with Egyptian Scripts about Ptolemy V ]    .   -5  [ Ariane 5 Generic Rocket Engine, Payload 6-9.5 Tons ]  2004  2    ,      .  
  
! [ Rosetta Orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  ,    , , ,    [ Astroids: Lutetia & Steins ]         [ Gravity Assist Maneuvers ]   . 2005  4       ,    .                 .   [ 2007  25 ]         [ Mars Fly-by ]   .       2007 , 2009   .  ,       2008 , 2010   .  
  
! [ Rosetta-comet orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-comet-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
          ,     ,    2014   . 2014       ,      .               .                 .     2015    .

## 092         
  
  
  
! [ How comets are born ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/how-comets-are-born.jpg?w=505&h=757 )   
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
    
**https://youtu.be/ZwEADPlHdEE**  
    
**https://youtu.be/29byorgwMGY**

   ,    
      
     
!    
      
     
   ,    
     
  !    
  ,    
     
     
  !    
      
   ,    
      
     
  !    
     
      
      
  !  
  
+++++++++++++++  
  
! [ Comet -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-1.jpg?w=450&h=401 )   
  
    **,          [ Icy Trans-Neptunian Objects  ( TNO )  ] **      [ Short-lived Radioactive Substances ]  .       .        ,        .       400 ..  [ 240  ]   .         . 4.6    ,   ,          .  
    
**   [ Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California, USA ] **  
  
! [ How comets are born-2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/how-comets-are-born-2.jpg?w=584&h=365 )   
    
** [ Click to Enlarge ] **  
  
       .                   .      .            .  
    
**   [ ESA Rosetta Project Scientist ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta Spacecraft ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/rosetta-spacecraft.jpg?w=600&h=595 )   
    
**      ?**  
  
     ,        [ 2016  29 ]  ,         .            
  
.   ,       .  67 -  [ 67P Churyumov-Gerasimenko ]       ,        .       :   ,   ,        [ Low Density ] ,  [ High Porosity ] ,  [ Multi-layered Double-Lobed Body ] .       ,        .  
  
! [ comets -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comets-2.jpg?w=521&h=688 )   
  
       ,        .  ,   ,    [ Structures & Features ]       .  
  
   ,    ,   ,       .      .      ,     [ Lumpiness ]  or  [ Goosebumps ]      .  
  
   ,   ,  .    ,, ,    [ Carbon monoxide, Oxygen, Nitrogen & Argon ]  .       ,       ,  3   [ 5 . ]       .

! [ Comet Size ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-size.jpg?w=529&h=700 )   
  
 “             .      ,       .          . ”   
    
**    [ ESA Director General ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
 “    [ 2004 – 2014 ]    ,                 . ”   
    
**   [ ESA Director of Scince & Robotic Exploration ]   [ November 12, 2014 ] **  
  
! [ How comets are born-1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/how-comets-are-born-1.jpg?w=584&h=1482 )   
    
** [ Click to Enlarge ] **  
  
 “      ?       ?  ,        !       ,      !     [ Deep Impact ]       .  , ,  ,      ! ”   
    
**   [ Acting Diretor, Solar System Division, NASA ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta drops the Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-drops-the-lander.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**Mothership Rosetta Drops Lander on the Comet**  
    
**     **  
  
2014  12          !     ** [ ESA -European Space Agency Spaceship Rosetta ] **         ** [ Philae Lander ] **     . 1969              . 2004   2       10   , 6.4  ..   [ 3.8   ]      ** [ Comet : 67P /Churyumov-Gerasimenko ] ** 2014  6    ,    ,    .    30 ..  , 34,000 mph  [ 55,000 kmh ]     .      ,  ,     .  
  
! [ Mission details ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/mission-details.jpg?w=530&h=793 )   
  
      510  ..  [ 300   ]      .      ,         .        :   1 .  “ ,          .      ,     , ”      [ ESA Director of Human Spaceflight Operations ]  .    : 18 kms  [ 3600 mph ] .        .       : 1.6    [ 1.3   ]   
  
! [ Philae touchdown -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-2.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
    ,       .   60   .    12   !         ,       .        .         ,      .   2015       .            .    13          ,      .   [  6, 2014 ]     20 ..  [ 12  ]       .     8 ..  [ 5  ]       .   [ 2015  13 ]        185  ..  [  110    ]    .  
  
   ,          . 4.5           ,      ,           .  
  
! [ Mothership & Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/mothership-lander.jpg?w=505&h=628 )   
  
2014                 “  ”   [ Orion Spacecraft ]    7  14      [ Asteroid ]       .                .              . ”   
    
**  ,    [ Dr. Paul Abell, NASA Jonson Space Center, Houston ]     
**  
  
 “       !         !      !       !          ( Porous Organic Mass ) ,        . ”   
    
**  ,  ·  , **  
  
! [ Rosetta Mission ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-mission1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     ?**  
  
                    ,     !      [ 1000  . ]     ,   ,         [ Gravity Assist Swing ]        [ Elliptical Path & Velocity ]  .               !            .               !  
  
           .                 !            .   [ Asteroids ]        .      ?            .  
  
! [ Philae Lander parts ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-parts.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
    : 1000    [   : 1.325   ]             [ European Space Agency  ( ESA )  ]   : , , , , , , ,  .          [ German Aerospace Research Institute  ( DLR )  ]      .  
  
     [ 3  x 2  x 2  ]  , ,  .  : 100  .    14     [ Solar Panels ]      .     64  .    2.2         .      .  
  
! [ ESA Control Room -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room-2.jpg?w=584 ) ****  
    
** 11   :**  
  
1\.  “  ”       [ ALlCE: Ultraviolet Imaging Spectrameter ]   
  
2\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
  
3\.  “  ”         [ COSIMA: Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyser ]   
  
4\.  “  ”    ,    [ GIADIA: Grain Impact Analyser & Dust Accumulator ]   
  
5\.  “  ”       [ MIDAS: Micro-Imaging Analysing System ]   
  
6\.  “  ”       [ MICRO: Microwave Instrument for Rosetta Orbiter ]   
  
7\.  “  ”       [ OSIRIS: Rosetta Orbiter Imaging System ]   
  
! [ ESA Control Room ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room.jpg?w=584 )   
  
8\.  “  ”  ,         [ ROSINA: Rosetta Orbiter Spectrometer for Ion & Neutral Analysis ]   
  
9\.  “  ”       [ RPC: Rosetta Plasma Consortium ]   
  
10  “  ”       [ RSI: Radio Science Investigation ]   
  
11  “  ”  ,       [ VIRTIS: Visible & Infrared Mapping Spectrometer ]   
    
**    :**  
  
   9  :  
  
1\.  “  ”    -    [ APXS: Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ]   
  
2\.  “ / ”        [ CIVA/ROLIS: Rosetta Lander Imaging System ]   
  
3\.  “  ”      [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]   
    
**Philae Lander**  
  
! [ Philae Lander ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/philae-lander.jpg?w=540 )   
  
4\.  “  ”        [ COSAC: Cometary Sampling & Composition Experiment ]   
  
5\.  “   ”      [ MODULUS PTOLEMY: Evolved Gas Analyser ]   
  
6\.  “  ”        [ MUPUS: Multi-Purpose Sensor for Surface & Subsurface Science ]   
  
7\.  “  ”   ,    [ ROMAP: RoLand Magentometer & Plasma Monitor ]   
  
8\.  “ 2 ”      [ SD2: Sample & Distribution Device ]   
  
9\.  “  ”     ,     [ SESAME: Surface Electrical & Acoustic Monitoring Experiment, Dust Impact Collector ]   
  
  :      [ European Space Operation Centre  ( ESOC ) , Darmstadt, Germany ]   :  , ,   [ New Norcia, Near Perth, Australia ]   
  
! [ Philae Lander components ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-components.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
2007  14         2014         ,         [ Asteroid ]            [ Orion Spacecraft ]   .           .       .                   .       ,        .             .        7  14      .           .  
    
**Rosetta Spaceship Launching**  
    
** [ March 2, 2004 ] **  
  
! [ Rosetta launching ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/rosetta-launching.jpg?w=540 )   
  
2004  2     -5   [ Ariane-5G+ ]   ,  .      [ Earth Gravity Assist  ( Earth ’ s Fly-by )  ]  2005  4   .  “   ”          [ Sling-shot like Effect ]  .        .         22,500    .            20        !          .       20    ,        .      ,          .  
  
! [ Philae touchdown-3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-32.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
          [ Kourov, French Guiana ]    . 1993           .   ,   ,      “ - ”   ( Churyumov-Gerasimenko )     ( 67P )  .    ,        .     .    “  ”   [ Name from Rosetta Stone of Black Basalt with Egyptian Scripts about Ptolemy V ]    .   -5  [ Ariane 5 Generic Rocket Engine, Payload 6-9.5 Tons ]  2004  2    ,      .  
  
! [ Rosetta Orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
  ,    , , ,    [ Astroids: Lutetia & Steins ]         [ Gravity Assist Maneuvers ]   . 2005  4       ,    .                 .   [ 2007  25 ]         [ Mars Fly-by ]   .       2007 , 2009   .  ,       2008 , 2010   .  
  
! [ Rosetta-comet orbit ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-comet-orbit.jpg?w=584 )   
  
          ,     ,    2014   . 2014       ,      .               .                 .     2015    .

## 093    .      
