! [ Stellar Outburst -3 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/stellar-outburst-3.jpg?w=559&h=804 )   
  
  [ ALMA ]       .         .    .    ,    ,   .    , 40 AU  [ 1 AU =     ]    .       .  
    
**   [  ,    ,  ] **  
  
  [ Young Star ]     ,    .      .   ,   , ,     [ Protoplanetary Disks ]     .              .  
    
**   [ Zhaohuan Zhu ]   [     ,   ] **  
  
! [ Fig 1F High Energy Observatories ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1f-high-energy-observatories.jpg?w=606&h=488 )   
    
**    [ Stellar Outburst ]   **  
  
2016  13  V883     [ Young Star V883 Orionis ]  ,       [ Protoplanetary Disk ]       .  ,         .     ,       [ Water Snowline ]   .        **  [ ALMA - Atacama Large Millimeter/ Submillimeter Array ] . 2016  14      [ Nature Magazine ]  . **  
  
  3 AU   [ 1 AU =     ] , 450  ..     ,   . V883        40 AU  [ 6  .. ]   .     [ Agglomeration of Dust Grains ]      .    , ,      .  ,        [ Snowballs ]  .  
  
! [ Magnetar ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/magnetar.jpg?w=523&h=699 )   
  
 “   ( Milky Way )   100    ( Magnetars )  .     !           ( Gamma Ray Bursts )  .       !      (  )     !            ( Mass Extinction ) . ”   
    
**   ( Donald Figer, Rochester Institute of Tecnology, USA ) **  
  
      ( Magnetic Field of Magnetar )      !        ( 0.5 Gauss )   ( Gauss – Unit of Magnetism ) .      100 .            ( Quadrillion Gauss —> 10^15 Gauss. USA )  !       !              !    
**    
    ( Science Illustrated Magazine )   ( Jan-Feb 2009 ) **  
    
**! [ Inside Magnetar ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/inside-magnetar.jpg?w=526&h=494 ) **  
  
  
    
**      !**  
  
1987           ( Robert Duncan & Christopher Thompson )         .    “   ”   ( Magnetars )    “   ”   ( Deadly Magnetars )    .             ( Mammoth Bursts of Energetic Gamma Rays )        !                .  
  
! [ Fig 1B Gamma Ray Flares from Magnetars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1b-gamma-ray-flares-from-magnetars.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 ,  ,    ( Neutron Star, Pulsar & Magnetar )        .        ?    ( Supernova )      ( Massive Star )          ( Dense Remnant )   !           12   ( 20 .. )        !           !      ( Radiation Beams )         !       ?        ( Normal Staus )            .  
  
! [ Fig 1B Magnetar SGR 1806-20 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1b-magnetar-sgr-1806-20.jpg?w=584 )   
  
      2007        .        !        !           !      ?        ?           ?       ( Abundance )   ?         !  
  
! [ Fig 1C The Mighty Magnetar SGR 1806-20 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1c-the-mighty-magnetar-sgr-1806-20.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**     **  
  
1992        ,       .   1979            .            .   ( Supernova )          ( Super-Dense Magnetars )      1000       !            ( Neutron Stars )  !        .           ( High Energy Electromagnetic Radiation )   ,    ( X-Rays & Gammar Rays )   .  
  
! [ Fig 1E Magnetars Discovered ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1e-magnetars-discovered1.jpg?w=571&h=1080 )   
  
  ( 2007 )   16    .    .   :  “ SGR ”     “    ெ  ”   ( Soft Gamma Ray Repeaters ) .   : AXP    “      ( Anomalous X-Ray Pulsars ) .            : SGR 1806-20.     : 2 X  ( 10^11 )  Teslas OR 2 X  ( 10^15 )  Gauss  ( 1 Teslas = 10,000 Gauss ) .            .    :  .     “      ”   ( MRI – Magnetic Resonance Imaging Machine )  32,000 .        : 40   ( 400,000  ) .  
  
! [ Fig 1E Neutron Stars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1e-neutron-stars.jpg?w=606&h=752 )   
    
**     **  
  
2007   16   .  , ,  ,      .  1979      SGR 1806-20  27 2004          .      250,000       .   : 0.2  !   :  1    ( 1000,000 Photons per Sec )  !     -    ( Pulsating X-Ray Source ) .  50,000   .    : 7.56   .     : 10^15   ( Gauss ) .       : 0.6  !    2004  27           .               ( Magnetar ’ s Crust )       !         ( Earth ’ s Tectonics Fault Line )   . 1998   20,000    SGR 1900+14        -   !  
  
! [ Fig 2 Making a Magnetar ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-2-making-a-magnetar.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**   **  
  
            .    4  8          !         ,    !           .           !        ,      ( 1  + 1  = 1  )   .       .  
  
! [ Fig 2 Neutron Stars & Magnetars ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-2-neutron-stars-magnetars.jpg?w=584 )   
  
    20 .  ( 12  )   .      1.4 .     ,    ( Mass is Dense with High Density ) .          .     ,      .          ( 2 X 10^11 )    !           1    !  
  
! [ Fig 4 Spitzer Space Telescope ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-4-spitzer-space-telescope.jpg?w=527&h=981 )   
  
   ( Supernova Remnants )     !     !    ( Binary Systems )    !        .     ,    1.4   (   )   .           !   ( Black Holes )     “   ”            !  
  
! [ Fig 3 Supervova Explosion ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-3-supervova-explosion.jpg?w=633&h=509 )   
  
  
    
**         
**    
               ( Star Clusters )    100       .    ,  ,  - ,        .     [ Gamma-Ray Large Area Space Telescope  ( GLAST )  ]     .  ,    . ,  ,     .   10%    .              .  2004  27               !        , , ,            .  
  
! [ Fig 6 Gamma Ray Bursts Initiate Extinction ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-6-gamma-ray-bursts-initiate-extinction.jpg?w=515&h=910 )

## 094         [ Plasma ]  

**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
+++++++++++  
  
     
  .    
      
     
    !    
     
  !    
   !    
     
   !    
     
     
    
  !    
 ,     
     
   !    
       
     
     
 !    
     
 !    
      
     
 !

! [ Solar cycles 22-23-24 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/solar-cycles-22-23-24.jpg?w=584&h=440 )   
  
            .     ,   .     ,       .       ,    .  
    
**   [  ,   ,  ] **  
  
! [ Solar Superflares ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/solar-superflares.jpg?w=560&h=680 )   
    
**     **  
  
.. 775                .        10  100  .         .     ,    ,    ,     .      [ Auroras ]    .  
  
! [ Solar Flares ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/solar-flares.jpg?w=503&h=804 )   
  
1859        [ Solar Eruptions ]        .      [ Solar Dark Spots ]      !  **   [ Carrington Event ] **   .  ,    **   [ Superflares ] **      !       ,  ,    .     .      ** [ Earth 's Protective Ozone Layer ] **         [ Ice Records ]  .  
  
! [ Solar magnetic field -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/solar-magnetic-field-1.jpg?w=524&h=532 )   
  
    10,000         .          100,000            .  
  
++++++++++++++++++++++  
  
           1972     ( Wolff )    .               .  
    
**    ( Dr. Sergei Zharkov )   ( UCL ’ s Mullard Space Science Laboratory ) **! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/fig-1f-various-faces-of-sun1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 “      :          !      ( Climate & Weather Change )                ·  )   . ”   
    
**   ( Mitchel Battros )   ( Solar Rain   )     
**    
 “    ( Solar Maximum )     (    )   !     ( Sunspots )       .          . ”   
    
**   ( David Hathaway, Solar Physicist, Marshal Space Flight Center ) **  
    
**! [ Fig 1E Solar Weather & Atmosphere ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1e-solar-weather-atmosphere.jpg?w=540 ) **  
  
   ( Heliosphere )        !         .      ( Dipole Magnetic Field )           .         !   ,     .         .   “   ”        .  
    
** .  (  9, 2005 ) **  
  
 “        “   ”      ( Heliosphere Bubble )   .   50 AU  100 AU         .  [ 1 Astronomical Unit  ( AU )  = Unit Distance Between Sun & Earth ] .            . ”   
    
**   ( Steve Suess, Solar Physicist, Marshal Space Flight Center ) **  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/fig-1g-space-dynamic-weather.jpg?w=584 ) **  
    
**      **  
  
2012  30         ( UCL ’ s Mullard Space Science Laboratory )       ( Dr. Sergei Zharkov )      ( National Astronomy Conference )            .    ,      ( Solar Eruptions )      ( Sunquakes )   .  :        ( Magnetic Structure )     .        1990     :  &   ( Kosovichev & Zharkov )  .           ( Solar Flares )       ( Impact of Powerful Beams of Particles )       ( Sunquakes )      .  2012        “     ”   ( CME Coronal Mass Ejections )       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/fig-1e-seismic-wave-travel.jpg?w=584 )   
  
   2011  15       2011       9.0    1000       .           .           .        600 ..   ( 600 km/sec )   ( 360 mps ) .     ( Geomagnetic Storm )      .  
  
               ( Energy and Momentum )       .  
  
           1972     ( Wolff )    .                 **  **  ( Dr. Sergei Zharkov )  . 2012        2013    ,       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/suns-huge-corona.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**      ?**  
  
    ( Plate Tectonics )                 !    :        ( Mantle )      ( Lithosphere )    .         ,   .        2.5  4         .      .  
  
         !        !         !         !               !             !             ,  .  
  
! [ Fig 2 The Corona Heating Mystery ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-2-the-corona-heating-mystery.jpg?w=540 )   
  
             !     .     .     10,000   .        5000  ( 2X5000 =10,000 )  . 1900   2009  6.1  9.5    50    !  2004     9             250,000   !  ,      !      !  
  
! [ Fig 1C Solar Magnetic Field ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1c-solar-magnetic-field.jpg?w=537&h=680 )   
    
**     **  
  
              !          !      ?     ?     ?      “   ”   ( Lithosphere )     .   100   ( 60  )  .   “   ”   ( Asthenosphere )      .     “   ”   ( Tectonic Plates )           !      1  1.8 ,  ,   , ,       ( Plate Boundaries )    .   , , ,    ( Peru )       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/fig-2-earths-rotating-core.jpg?w=584 )   
  
               .          “    ”   ( Internal Geodynamo )       .            .                .  
    
**   **  
  
     ( Earth Change TV )        ( Mitchel Battros )               ( Sunspot Effect Equation )   .     ( Solar Rain )    .       :  
    
**Mitch Buttros Equation :**  
    
**Sunspots == >> Solar Flares ==>>  ( Solar )  Magnetic Field Shift ==>>  ( Earthern )  Shifting Ocean & Jet Stream Currents ==>> Extreme Weather & Human Disruption**  
  
! [ Fig 3 The Equation for Sunspots & Extreme Weather ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-3-the-equation-for-sunspots-extreme-weather.jpg?w=514&h=905 )   
    
**   :**  
  
  ==>>   ==>>     ==>>       ==>>      .  
  
              ( Dr. Peter Olson )  &        ·  ( Dr. Nicola Scafetta )         .  
    
**     **  
  
     ( Climate & Weather Change )            .     ( Global Warming Trend )      .      !               !      ( ,  )     ,     ,    ,       .  
  
! [ Fig 1A The Sun's Core ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-1a-the-suns-core.jpg?w=580&h=867 )   
  
          ( Highly Charged Core )   .  , ,   ( Core, Mantle & Crust )           ** “     ” **  [ Corona Mass Ejection  ( CME )  ]         ( Charged Particles )          !  
    
**     **  
  
1950                             .            .       !  1960                 “    ”    ( Parallel to the Mid-Atlantic Ridge )  .           !       .  
  
! [ Fig 4 The Nature of Solar Flares ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/fig-4-the-nature-of-solar-flares.jpg?w=540 )   
    
**    !**  
  
1962     ( Lawrence Morley )           .  ,   , ·        2.5 .     .          .        .         .          .      “     ”   ( Giant Tape Recorder )    !             .            !

## 095     !     !

 **.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **

  



  

**   **  
  
+++++++++++  
  
     !  
  
 ,   !  
  
    !  
  
    !  
  
     
  
    !  
    
** ,    [ Richard Wagner  ( 1813-1883 )  ] **  
  
! [ Funamental particles ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/funamental-particles.jpg?w=546&h=551 )   
  
             .  
    
** ,  ( Scott Wakely )   ,   .  ( 2006 ) **  
  
   ,       ( Subatomic Particles ) .          . 1960         .     ,         .  
    
**  &  ·  ( Klaus Rith & Andreas Schafer ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171aa.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
  
  
  
  
      ( The Standard Model of Particle Physics )     ,           !  
    
** ,  ( Goron Kane )   ,   .**  
    
**      **  
  
   "    "   ( General Theory of Relativity )             ( Space-Time Curvature )      .  
  
      "    "   ( Quantum Mechanics )         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171ab.jpg )   
    
**   **  
  
  
  
 "  "     ( Gluon )      ( Subatomic Particles )          ( Nuclear Force )   .  
  
     ( Electrons & Quarks )   1960 -1970    "     "   ( Theory of Interactions - Standard Model )   .           .  
  
        "   "   ( A Unified Theory of the Universe )         "   "   ( One Dimensional Filament - The String Theory ) .        ,    .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171b.jpg )   
    
**   **  
    
**      **  
  
    ( Superstring Theory )         !     ,     ( Particles & Fundamental Forces of Nature )        ( Vibrations of Tiny Supersymmetric Strings )    .     "   "   ( Quantum Gravity )          !       "  "   ( DNA )           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171c.jpg )   
  
  
    
** **  
  
           !   , ,    ( Superstring Theory, Hyperspace & Dark Matter )                 ,        !    ,    !      "   "   ( Membraneous Bubbles )   !         !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171d.jpg )   
    
** & **  
  
  
    
**     **  
  
         ( DNA )       ( Matter )     ( Fundamental Particles )  .      . 1960      ·  ( 1871-1937 ) ,    ( 1885-1962 )        ,   ,      .  , ,         .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171e.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
1960         ,     .        ( Quarks )   .      .   << , , , , ,  >>  ( Up, Down, Charm, Strange, Top, Bottom )        .   ,  .     .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171f.jpg )   
    
** & **  
  
     ( Strongest Force )      .      !          .        ( Gluon )   .             .            .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171g.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
       .   .    ,       .          .     .           ?             !  ,    98%   !      ,      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801171h.jpg )   
    
** & **  
  
  
  
 (  )

## 096           

**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **

      
       
     
  !    
      
  !    
 2020      
   .    
      
     
       
      
   !    
     
      
     
      
  !    
      
      
  .    
    
     
       
     
     
    !  
  
++++++++++++++++++++  
  
     ,        ,   .            . !             .  
    
** **  
  
! [ Earth & Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/earth-moon.jpg?w=505&h=675 )   
  
  
  
         2016  5  .    -     [ First Lunar Photobomb ]     [ 2015 ]   16  .   ,      ,     [ Deep Space Climate Observatory Satellite  ( DSCOVR )  ]     .  
    
**   [   ,     ] **  
    
**     .**  
  
,          !     ,  ,      .    ,      .      ,     .  ,   ,        .     "  "   [ DSCOVR ]  2015  16 & 2016  5       ,    .            .          .  
  
! [ Relative Size of Planets -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/relative-size-of-planets-2.jpg?w=483&h=348 )   
  
    ,     &     [ National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration  ( NOAA )  ]       .         [ EPIC - Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera ]  .      [ Lunar Photobomb ]    .         ,     [ Vegetation ] ,  ,     [ Aerosols ]   .      , ,     [ NASA, NOAA, U.S. AIR FORCE ]    .  
  
! [ Far side of Moon ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/09/far-side-of-moon.jpg?w=471&h=690 )   
  
  2020       .  
  
       -4   2020   .           .  ,       .       [ Clean Electromagnetic Environment ]  .        [ Low Frequency Radio Study ]  .  
    
**   [   ,    ] **  
  
2017     5  [ Chen ’ ge -5 ]   .       .        . 400,000 ..  [ 240,000  ]      [ Unmanned Docking ]     .  
    
**.   [  -4   ] **

+++++++++++++++++  
    
**2020       **  
  
               
  
2015  10    .  2020   -4   .         .  
  
,        ,       .        .       [ Clean Electromagnetic Environment ]  .  
  
       [ Low Frequency Radio Study ]  .      ,      . 2013           .  
  
! [ Return of Capsule ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/return-of-capsule.jpg?w=492&h=606 )   
  
 “          . ”   
    
**   ( 1957 )  –     ( Mao Tse-Tung, China Liberator ) ** ** ( 1893-1976 ) **  
    
**         **  
  
2014  24      -4   [ Chang ’ e -4 ]                   .       ,  , 50       .             . 140 .        840,000 ..  [ 504,000  ]     .      [ Data Capsule ]    ,   [ Chang ’ e -5 ]      2017         .  
  
! [ The Reurn Capsule ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/the-reurn-capsule.jpg?w=584 )   
  
1970          . 50          . 2013      [ Yutu Rover ]       .         .      [ Chinese Space Station ]  ,    2020       . 2017  31   [ 14 . ]    -5  [ Chang ’ e -5 ]           [ Three Stage of Lunar Test Run to bring Moon Samples ]        .      25,000 mph.              !   ,   2017            .  
  
! [ Chinese Moon Rover 2013 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/chinese-moon-rover-20131.jpg?w=510&h=483 )   
  
 “      ,   40   ,         . ”   
    
**   (      ) **  
  
 “     -3   15    ,    -3    1  5     .      ,    10   -3.    100  . ”   [       [ Fusion Power Reactor ]   -3  .  
    
**   ( Ouyang Ziyuan )  Head of First Phase of Lunar Exploration**  
  
 “  , ,           .   .      .       -3   . ”   
    
**  ,     [  26, 2008 ]   ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies ) **  
  
! [ Lunar Module Returned ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/lunar-module-returned.jpg?w=406&h=726 )   
    
**       **  
  
2013   14     -3  [ Chang ’ e -3 ]     ,      .    ,        .          .       ,  , 37         .     [ Chang ’ e -3,  -3 ]           -3  [ March -3B ] .    12  ,    .                   .  2020             .  
  
! [ Moon Rover ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/moon-rover.jpg?w=873 )   
  
  ,   , 250   [ 400 .. ]     .    :    [ Latin Name, Sinus Iridum ] .   :    [ Bay of Rainbows ] .  ,       .     .       .    :  200 .   [ 660  ]   . 30       .  
  
 -3        .    : **  .    [ Yutu or Jade Rabbit ]  .**    -3         .        [ Ground Penetrating Radar ]  .   ,    .    120 ..  [ 260  ]  .       .   -238      .        .  
  
! [ Yutu Rover ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/yutu-rover1.jpg?w=516&h=895 )   
    
**     **  
  
2010         ( Xichang Satellite Launch Centre – XSLC )    “  -2 ”   ( Chang ’ e -2 )         “   CZ-3C ”   ( Long-March CZ-3C )   .  -2   9   ( 15 . )   6      .      “  -1 ”  2007    16       .  -2     -1   !  -1  120   ( 200 .. )    .  -2    :         .     -3 &  -4       .        .  -2   60   ( 100 .. )     .        9   ( 15 . )         .  
  
,  21          -3 .  “    -3   15    ,    -3    1  5     .      ,    10   -3.    100  . ”      ( Ouyang Ziyuan )   ( Head of First Phase of Lunar Exploration )  .          25   -3 !         -3    .  
  
! [ Chinese spacecraft control center ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/chinese-spacecraft-control-center.jpg?w=873 )   
    
**    **  
  
   ,   “     ”   ( Trans-Lunar Orbit )        .       ( Apogee )  : 230,000   ( 380,000 .. )     ( Perigee )  120   ( 200 .. )      5     .      -1   12  .  -2     : 33   ( 10  ) .  -1    : 400   ( 120  ) . 180   ( 54  )    345     .       : 4 .   : 2.5 .     “  ”       !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-2-chinese-first-trip-to-moon.jpg?w=813&h=2774 )   
  
    6   2013     -3       .  “    -2       ,       ,    !        . ”        ,    ( Wu Weiren, Chief Designer, China ’ s Lunar Orbiter Project )  .         134    ( 2010    900   ) .  
    
**! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-2-star-trek.jpg?w=795&h=1610 ) **  
    
**    **  
  
1957              .         .     1958    !             ! 1969   20           20      .   1972  5           .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-3-fist-chinese-trip-to-moon.jpg?w=795&h=1106 )   
  
  , ,           . 1958           .       1970  . 1990-2002    “  I, II, III & IV ”   ( Chang ’ e -1, 2, 3, & 4 )       ( Shenzhou I to IV Spacecraft Developments )  .  
  
2003         ( Manned Space Mission )    -5   ( Shenzhou V )       !    2005   -6         .  2007    -1      ! 2008           20           .  
    
**    **  
  
1998             ( International Space Station )            .    2020          .       12  16  .            ( China Space Station )   .   “  -1  ( Tiangong -1 Space Module )     2011     .    “   ”   ( Tiangong = Heavenly Palace )   .   8.5  .            .          -8  ( Shenzhov -8 )    /   ( Docking )    .    “   ”   ( Divine Vessel )    !  -9 & -10          ,      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-5-chinese-future-lunar-lander.jpg?w=810&h=1059 )   
    
**      !**  
  
     1975  300    90   .        2008  19     -1   ( Chandrayaan-1 )   .   -1           !             !       91    ( 4   )   ( 2008   )    ! 2016                   1970  . 2003           !  2005        .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-7-chinese-astronaut-zhari-zhigang.jpg?w=720&h=726 )   
  
,               , ,  ,       .               !  
  
2017            .  2020                .                 !              ,  “         ”     !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-8-return-from-spacewalk.jpg?w=812&h=1352 )   
    
**    **  
  
1956         .      [ Changzheng  ( CZ )  ]     . 1970         ,       . 1992       . 1995    CZ–2E    6  . 1999  20      14       ! 2002    -3   108     .    29   -4  2003  4  . 2003  15   -5     14    .  2007  -1         . 2008        . 2010     -2      .   , ,               !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/10/fig-4-chinese-space-programs.jpg?w=795&h=1331 )

 **.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **

 "    . "   
    
**    ( Lucretius )  ..  ( 99-55 ) **  
  
 "             ! . . .         :      ,     ! "   
    
** ,       ( 1975 ) **  
  
 "      .      .    . "   
    
**..   ( G.K. Chesterson )   ( 1874-1936 ) **  
  
! [ Multi-universe -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multi-universe-1.jpg?w=520&h=672 )   
    
** **  
    
**    ?**  
  
         ( Parallel Universe )     .       !  " Multiverse "           ( 1848-1910 ) .          "   "   ( Multiverses )     !     ,       .   , ,    !               !              .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801101b.jpg )   
    
**Superstring Universe**  
    
**     !**  
  
    ( Superstring Theory )         !     ,     ( Particles & Fundamental Forces of Nature )        ( Vibrations of Tiny Supersymmetric Strings )    .     "   "   ( Quantum Gravity )          !       "  "   ( DNA )           !  
  
           !   , ,    ( Superstring Theory, Hyperspace & Dark Matter )                 ,       !    ,    !      "   "   ( Membraneous Bubbles )   !         !  
  
! [ Multiverse Raising ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multiverse-raising.jpg?w=481&h=741 )   
    
**    **  
  
           ?       ( Neil Turok ) ,         ( Burt Ovrut ) , &        ( Paul Steinhardt )             !   ?          <<   >>  !          !         !  
  
! [ Multiverse -5 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multiverse-5.jpg?w=453&h=696 )   
  
       .    ;             "    "   ( Space-Time Chain Event )    .    !             !               ?        !  
  
! [ Multiverse -4 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multiverse-4.jpg?w=490&h=450 )   
    
**     **  
  
 "   "    "   "   ( Multiverse, Multi-Domain Universes or Meta-Universe )              ( Hypothesis of Possible Multiple Universes ) .     .      !     ( Structures of the Multiverse ) ,      ( The Nature of Each Universe ) ,      ( The Relationship between the Constituent Universes ) ,       .  " Multiverse "          ( 1848-1910 ) .   ( Alternate Universes, parallel Universes, Quantum Universes, Parallel Worlds, Alternate Realities & Alternate Timelines )   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801101e.jpg )   
    
**Parallel Universe**  
  
   -1,  -2,  -3 &  -4  ( Level I, Level II, Level III & Level IV )     .      : 1.    ( George Ellis ) . 2. .   ( U. Kirchner )  & 3\. . .   ( W.R. Stoeger ) .    "   "   ( Tegmark Classification )   .  
    
**1\.    ( Multi-Domain Universes ) **  
    
** : 1  (    ) **  
  
           .          .  
  
 ( Level : 1 A Generic Prediction of Cosmic Inflation is an infinite Ergodic Universe which, being infinite, must contain Hubble Volumes, realizing all initial conditions )   
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801101f.jpg )   
    
**Superstring Univers.**  
    
**2\.       ( Universes with Different Physical Constants ) **  
    
** : 2  (     )   ( Andrei Linde 's Bubble Theory ) **  
  
     ,   ,    .  
  
 ( Level : 2 In Chaotic Inflation other Thermalized Regions may have different Effective Physical Constants Dimensionality & Particle Content. Also it includes Wheeler's Oscillating Universe Theory )   
    
**3\.    ( Multiverses ) **  
  
! [ Multiverse -1 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multiverse-1.jpg?w=467&h=872 )   
    
** : 3**  
  
             . 2007     ( David Deutsch )         
  
 ( Level : III An Interpretation of Quantum Mechanics that proposes of Multiple Universes which are identical but exist in possibly different States )   
    
**4\.     ( Ensemble Theory of Tegmark - Ultimate Ensemble ) **  
    
** : 4        .**  
  
 ( Level : IV Other Mathematical Structures give different fundamental Equations of Physics )   
    
**     ( Bubble Theory of Infinite Universes ) **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801101g.jpg )   
    
**Level IV Universes**  
  
 -2             .     .     ?     ( Quantum Foam )    "   "   ( Parent Universe )      !  
  
 "   "           ( Parallel Worlds By : Michio Kaku )   2004     :  
  
   "   "               .    ,        .            ,     .             .  
  
! [ Multiverse -2 ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/multiverse-2.jpg?w=500&h=379 )   
    
** **

## 098        
  
  
  
! [ Juno Orbits Jupiter ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/juno-orbits-jupiter.jpg?w=532&h=563 )   
    
** [ Juno Spacecraft Orbits Jupiter ] **    
** ( 2011 – 2016 ) **  
    
**.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
  
+++++++++++++++  
  
    [  4, 2016 ]     ,           .    .          .          [ Radiation Belts ]    .      ,   ,        .  
    
**   [ NASA Space Program Administrator ] **  
  
  1.7     ,   .      [ Jupiter Orbit Insertion ]  ,       .         .  
    
**   [  JPL Juno Project Manager ] **  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/cover-image-juno.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**    **  
  
2016  4       ,       .         ,     .       .      .       .        ,  .     ?    ?          ?    ,    ?      1.1  .  
  
! [ Juno Space Project ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/juno-space-project.jpg?w=500&h=673 )   
  
       37  3000   [ 5000 .. ]   ,   .   1995        2003     .       .       [ Gravitational Field ]   .     ?  ,   ?   ?          .  
  
 54     [ 54 Day Slow Speed Orbit ]  ,  14     [ 14 Day Fast Speed Orbit ]     .        20,000    .      20   [ 240  ]    .    67   .       .  
    
**     **  
  
2016  4      650    ** [ Newton Thrusters ] ** 35  ,        .    1212 mph  [ 542 mps  ( meter per sec ]   ,        .      18,698        .  
  
+++++++++++++++  
  
 “      ( Solar Panel Powered )    ,            .          . ”   
    
** ,    **  
  
 (   )     :  
  
1\.      ?  
  
2\.                 ?  
    
** **

 “        ,            ”   
    
**  ( 1564-1642 ) **  
  
  .   .       ,       .          .  
    
**   [ Thomas Huxley ]   ( 1825-1895 ) **  
  
    
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/juno-mission-to-jupiter.jpg?w=529&h=1032 ) ! [ Inside Jupiter ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/inside-jupiter.jpg?w=575&h=575 )     
    
**2011       **  
  
        2011  5        200   ( 60  )    -5   ( Atlas -5 Rocket )         .   5  1740        ,    ,     ( Asteroid Belt )  , 2016         .  -5            ,      .  5          .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-1b-juno-payload1.jpg?w=584 )   
  
       ,          ( Earth Flyby )        .  390    ( 640  .. )              ( Solar-Panelled Mission )        .     30 .  9 .            25  .           .   ,            .    , 120       18,000    ( Solar Cells )   .      33   3000   ( 5000 .. )        .                  .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-1-juno-to-jupiter1.jpg?w=584 )   
    
**      ?**  
  
        .      .                 .      ‘    ’   ( Remote Sensing Instruments )       , ,  ,     ,    .        .   300      ‘   ’   ( Violently-Active Red Spot )     .              ,      ..                    .    ,      .       ( Polar Magnetosphere )           .  ‘   ,    ’   ( Polar Auroras )   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-1a-juno-path-to-jupiter1.jpg?w=584 ) **     **  
  
    ( 1997- 2004 )        ,   ,   ,     .      ‘    ’   [ Father of Modern Physics ]     ,     ,     ‘  ’   [ Space Probe ]   !        ,      , !            , !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-1g-galileo-probe-launch.jpg?w=584 )   
  
 1972   -10, -11  [ Pioneer-10, Pioneer-11 ] , 1977   -1, -2  [ Voyager-1, Voyager-2 ]          ,        . 1987        , 1995     ,   ,    [ Probe Module ]    ,    .   ‘  ’   [ Orbiter ]    ‘   ’   [ Atmospheric Probe ]   ,        .    ,    .    ,     .      [ PuO2 ]     ‘    ’   [ RTG, Radioisotope Thermal Generators ]   .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-6-great-red-spot-of-jupiter.jpg?w=584 )   
    
** !    !**  
  
         !          ,        .    ,     ,   [ Bands ]  !   ,    24     11     !        360 mph!  
  
    ‘    ‘   [ Great Red Spot ]       , 300     !   !      .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-5-jupiter-clouds.jpg?w=529&h=439 )   
  
   ,   [ Ultraviolet ]   ,   [ Sulfur ] ,   [ Phosphorus ]      [ Compounds ] .       16200  ; 8700  .  
  
       ! ,  ,  ,   .     ,      [ Gas Bubbles ]  ,     !       ,    ,  , ,   ,  ,    !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/08/fig-8-galileo-images.jpg?w=584 )

## 099     !     !   !  
  
  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031e.jpg )   
  
 ** ( : 10 ) **  
    
**  
  
 **.  B.E. ( Hons )  P.Eng  ( Nuclear )  **  
    
**  
  
+++++++++++  
  
  
    
**  **  
  
2007    20       &    ( Robert Rutledge & Derek Fox )    , -  "  "    ( ROSAT Space Probe )              !      ( Ursa Minor Constellation )      . 1990-1999      18,000 -     .         ,    ( Objects with Visible Light, Infrared Light & Radio Waves )       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031a.jpg )   
  
  
  
       "  "   ( Calvera )    .      .          ( Supernova Remnant )   !     ( Binary Companion )   !       ( Radio Pulsations )  !     ,  8.1           .        .     250-1000      !  
  
! [ Pulsar geometry ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/pulsar-geometry.jpg?w=584&h=467 )   
    
**Pulsar Star**  
    
**     ?**  
  
            .    4  8          !         ,    !           .           !        ,      ( 1  + 1  = 1  )   .       .  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031c.jpg )   
    
**Structure of a Neutron Star**  
  
    20 .  ( 12  )   .      1.4 .     ,    ( Mass is Dense with High Density ) .          .     ,      .          [ 2 x 10 to the power of 11  ( 2 X 10^11 )  ]    !           1    !  
  
   ( Supernova Remnants )     !     !    ( Binary Systems )    !        .     ,    1.4   (   )   .           !   ( Black Holes )     "   "            !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031d.jpg )   
    
**Colliding Neutron Stars**  
    
**   ( Pulsars )    ?**  
  
1967       ( Jocelyn Bell Burnell )                  !         !       !         .               .           .  
  
! [ Neutron Star Inside ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/neutron-star-inside.jpg?w=551&h=337 )   
  
  
  
     .          . .. 1054          !     ( Einstein X-Ray Observatory )            .  
  
    ,       .           .         !    "    "   ( Accretion Process between Binary System Stars )   .           !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031f.jpg )   
    
**Pulsar Signals**  
    
**   !**  
  
   ,        [ Milky Way Galaxy ] !        !   ,       ,        !          ,  100     !      !   !   !    !    !     !         ,   ,  ,  ,  ,    [ Light Spectrum ]  ,        !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031g.jpg )   
    
**Life & Death of Pulsars**  
  
        .      5000-10,000   !     [ Nova Star ]   .   [ Supernova ]          100    .    , , , , ,        ,      !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031h.jpg )   
    
**Pulsar Beams & Spins**  
  
   1.4   [ 1.4 times Solar Mass ]        [ White Dwarf ]      .  [      ( Mass )  ,        .   !     [ Density ]    ! ]       ,    [ Supernova Explosion ]       ,     [ Neutron Star ]  .   10    ,    
  
,     [ Black Hole ]  .     ,  ,           .  
  
! [ Making a neutron star ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/07/making-a-neutron-star.jpg?w=584&h=467 )   
  
     [ Final Collapse ]   ,       [ Heavier Elements ]      !      [ Supernova ]       [ Galaxies ]      !    ,    ,     [ Core ]   !   ,     ,      !      [ Extremely Dense ]   ,    ,     [ Neutron Star ]  !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031j.jpg )   
    
**  **  
  
         [ Beams of Radio Waves ]  ,           [ Pulses ]  !       [ Pulsar ]   .     9  !        !  
  
! [  ]  ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/01/40801031k.jpg )

## 100      
  
  
  
! [ Walt Whitman ]  ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/walt-whitman.jpg?w=213&h=321 )   
    
** ( 1819-1892 ) **  
    
** ( ** **** **** ** ) **  
    
**** **:** **** ****  
    
**** **:** **** **,** **** **,** ****  
  
  
    
**** **** **** **** **:**  
  
     1819    ,  ,  .  12     .  11             .        .     ,     .  17       . 27      .  
  
             .       .          “   ”   [ Leaves of Grass ]        .         ,   ,        !    ,          [ Free Verse ]   .          [ Ralph Waldo Emerson ] .  
  
1855  12    “   ”   .   300  .      . 1848       .           ,       .       1848      “   “   [ Free Soil ]      .       [ I Sing the Body Electric ]  &     [ Song of Myself ]       ,  ,   .  
  
              .     “   ”   [ Civil War ]    .   ,  “   ”      .    ,   6 30,000 .                . D.C.   .       100,000    .   D.C.,      600    .    ,      ,            .          .    ,    .          “  ,   ”     .  
  
19        20       .   ,     ,  ,  [  ]     [  ]    .      :      “   ” ,  “    ” ,  “    ” ,  , ”   “   . ”   [ Drum-Taps, Beat ! Beat ! Drums ! ”   “ When Lilacs Last in the Dooryard Boom ’ d ” , Democratic Vistas, ”   “ A Passage to India. ”  ] . 1873     [ Stroke ]          .      1892       73   .  
  
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

** ( Beginning My Studies ) **

  :  
  
   ,  
  
 ,  
  
 ,  
  
  ,  
  
  , ,  
  
, ,   !  
  
   ,  
  
  

   
  
   !  
  
,  ,  
  
   
  
   
  
 !  
  
+++++++++++++++++  
    
**  **  
    
** ( To Him I Sing ) **  
    
** [   ] **  
  
    
  
  
  
   
  
  !  
  
    
  
    
  
   
  
    
  
   !  
  
    
  
  
  
 .  
  
    
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
 !  
  
++++++++++++++  
    
** **  
    
** [ To the States ] **  
  
  
  
    
  
  
  
     
  
    
  
   
  
  :  
  
   !  
  
    
  
  !  
  
     
  
     
  
   
  
 ,  
  
    ,  
  
   
  
 ,  
  
  ,  
  
    
  
    
  
 !  
  
+++++++++++++  
    
**** **** ****  
    
** ( To The Historian ) **  
    
** [ ** **** ******** ** ] **  
  
   
  
  !  
  
   ,  
  
   
  
 ,  
  
   
  
   
  
   !  
  
  
  
 ,  
  
  
  
   
  
  
  
   
  
  !  
  
 *  !  
  
    
  
  
  
 .  
  
   
  
  
  
    
  
   
  
   !  
  
   
  
  
  
   
  
  
  
 !  
  
   
  
  
  
  
  
  !  
  
+++++++++++++  
  
  à Alleghenies Inhabitant.  
  
+++++++++++++  
    
**  **  
    
** ( As I Ponder in Silence ) **  
    
** [   ] **  
  
    
  
   
  
    
  
   !  
  
   
  
 , ,  
  
  
  
    
  
  !  
  
   
  
   
  
  
  
    
  
,  
  
   
  
    !  
  
    :  
  
   ?  
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
   ?  
  
   !  
  
   
  
   !  
  
    
  
 .  
  
   
  
   
  
   
  
   !  
  
    
  
    
  
  
  
   ,  
  
,  
  
  
  
 , ,  
  
  ,  
  
 [    ]   
  
    
  
,   
  
    
  
   !  
  
    
  
   ,  
  
    
  
 !  
  
+++++++++++++  
    
****  
    
** ( Beginners ) **  
    
** **  
  
   
  
  
  
   
  
    ?  
  
    
  
    ?  
  
    
  
  ?  
  
     
  
   
  
    
  
   !  
  
    
  
    !  
  
     
  
   
  
  ?  
  
    
  
     ?  
  
    
  
    
  
    
  
   ?  
  
   
  
     
  
   
  
   
  
  ?
